atk-vin02a1:7_0: Khuddakānaṃ ayaṃ dāni, tesaṃ bhavati vaṇṇanā.
atk-vin02a1:8_1: Tattha musāvādavaggassa tāva paṭhamasikkhāpade hatthakoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:8_3: Buddhakāle kira sakyakulato asīti purisasahassāni pabbajiṃsu,
atk-vin02a1:8_5: Vādakkhittoti “vādaṃ karissāmī”ti evaṃ parivitakkitena vādena paravādisantikaṃ khitto pakkhitto pahito pesitoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:8_7: Yatra yatra vādo tatra tatreva sandissatītipi vādakkhitto.
atk-vin02a1:8_8: Avajānitvā avajānātīti attano vāde kañci dosaṃ sallakkhento “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti avajānitvā puna kathento
atk-vin02a1:8_9: kathento niddosataṃ sallakkhetvā “mameva ayaṃ vādo”ti paṭijānāti.
atk-vin02a1:8_10: Paṭijānitvā avajānātīti kismiñcideva vacane ānisaṃsaṃ sallakkhento “ayaṃ mama vādo”ti paṭijānitvā puna
atk-vin02a1:8_11: kathento kathento tattha dosaṃ sallakkhetvā “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti avajānāti.
atk-vin02a1:8_12: Aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena kāraṇena aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicarati paṭicchādeti ajjhottharati,
atk-vin02a1:8_14: Kurundiyaṃ pana “etassa paṭicchādanahetuṃ aññaṃ bahuṃ kathetī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:8_19: Puna mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “avajānitvā paṭijānanto paṭijānitvā avajānanto eva ca aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:8_21: Saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādetīti purebhattādīsu “asukasmiṃ nāma kāle asukasmiṃ nāma padese vādo hotū”ti saṅketaṃ
atk-vin02a1:8_22: katvā saṅketato pure vā pacchā vā gantvā “passatha bho,
atk-vin02a1:9_0: 2. Sampajānamusāvādeti jānitvā jānantassa ca musā bhaṇane.
atk-vin02a1:10_5: vācāyeva hi aññesampi diṭṭhānugatimāpajjantānaṃ pathabhūtato byappathoti vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:11_0: Evaṃ sampajānamusāvādaṃ dassetvā idāni ante vuttānaṃ sampajānamusāvādasaṅkhātānaṃ anariyavohārānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ dassento “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:11_1: Tattha adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ meti evaṃ vadato vacanaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā vā cetanā eko anariyavohāroti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:11_4: ghānādivasena munitvā tīhi indriyehi ekābaddhaṃ viya katvā patvā aggahitaṃ amutaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:11_5: aññatra pañcahi indriyehi suddhena viññāṇeneva aggahitaṃ aviññātanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:11_6: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “adiṭṭhaṃ nāma na cakkhunā diṭṭha”nti evaṃ oḷārikeneva nayena desanā katāti.
atk-vin02a1:11_7: Diṭṭhādīsu ca attanāpi parenapi diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhameva.
atk-vin02a1:11_9: Aparo nayo yaṃ attanā diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhameva taṃ.
atk-vin02a1:12_1: Idāni tesaṃ anariyavohārānaṃ vasena āpattiṃ āropetvā dassento “tīhākārehī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:12_2: Tassattho “tīhi ākārehi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassā”ti
atk-vin02a1:12_4: Kevalañhi tattha “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji”nti idha “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me”ti,
atk-vin02a1:12_5: tattha ca “āpatti pārājikassā”ti “idha āpatti pācittiyassā”ti evaṃ vatthumatte āpattimatte ca viseso,
atk-vin02a1:13_1: Tīhākārehi diṭṭhe vematikotiādīnampi attho “diṭṭhassa hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭhe vematiko”ti
atk-vin02a1:13_4: atthe pana satheravāde kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a1:14_1: Sahasā bhaṇatīti avīmaṃsitvā anupadhāretvā vā vegena diṭṭhampi “adiṭṭhaṃ me”ti bhaṇati.
atk-vin02a1:14_2: Aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇatīti mandattā jaḷattā pakkhalanto “cīvara”nti vattabbe “cīra”nti ādiṃ bhaṇati.
atk-vin02a1:14_3: Yo pana sāmaṇerena “api bhante mayhaṃ upajjhāyaṃ passitthā”ti vutto keḷiṃ kurumāno “tava upajjhāyo dārusakaṭaṃ
atk-vin02a1:14_4: yojetvā gato bhavissatī”ti vā siṅgālasaddaṃ sutvā “kassāyaṃ bhante saddo”ti vutto “mātuyā te yānena gacchantiyā
atk-vin02a1:14_5: kaddame laggacakkaṃ uddharantānaṃ ayaṃ saddo”ti vā evaṃ neva davā na ravā aññaṃ bhaṇati,
atk-vin02a1:14_8: eko gāme thokaṃ telaṃ labhitvā vihāraṃ āgato sāmaṇeraṃ bhaṇati –
atk-vin02a1:14_10: gāmo ekatelo ahosī”ti vā pacchikāya ṭhapitaṃ pūvakhaṇḍaṃ labhitvā “ajja gāme pacchikāhi pūve cāresu”nti vā,
atk-vin02a1:15_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:18_0: 12. Dutiyasikkhāpade omasantīti ovijjhanti. Khuṃsentīti akkosanti. Vambhentīti padhaṃsenti.
atk-vin02a1:19_1: Bhūtapubbanti idaṃ vatthuṃ bhagavā omasavādagarahaṇatthaṃ āhari.
atk-vin02a1:19_2: Nandivisālo nāmāti nandīti tassa balībaddassa nāmaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:19_5: Bodhisatto tena samayena nandivisālo nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:19_8: Tattheva aṭṭhāsīti ahetukapaṭisandhikālepi parakhuṃsanaṃ amanāpatoyeva paccesi,
atk-vin02a1:19_10: Sakaṭasataṃ atibaddhaṃ pavaṭṭesīti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā heṭṭhārukkhe datvā ekābaddhaṃ katvā muggamāsavālukādīhi puṇṇaṃ sakaṭasataṃ pavaṭṭento,
atk-vin02a1:19_11: kiñcāpi pubbe patiṭṭhitārappadesaṃ puna are patte pavaṭṭitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:19_12: bodhisatto pana purimasakaṭena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne pacchimasakaṭaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ sakaṭasatappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ pavaṭṭesi.
atk-vin02a1:19_14: Tena cattamano ahūti tena brāhmaṇassa dhanalābhena attano kammena ca so nandivisālo attamano ahosi.
atk-vin02a1:20_1: Akkosenapīti ettha pana yasmā parato “dve akkosā –
atk-vin02a1:20_2: hīno ca akkoso ukkaṭṭho ca akkoso”ti vibhajitukāmo,
atk-vin02a1:20_3: tasmā yathā pubbe “hīnenapi akkosena khuṃsentī”ti vuttaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:22_6: Yakārena vā bhakārena vāti yakārabhakāre yojetvā yo akkoso.
atk-vin02a1:23_1: Idāni tesaṃ jātiādīnaṃ pabhedavasena āpattiṃ āropetvā dassento “upasampanno upasampanna”ntiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:23_2: Tattha khuṃsetukāmo vambhetukāmo maṅkukattukāmoti akkositukāmo padhaṃsitukāmo garahitukāmo nittejaṃ kattukāmoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:24_0: Ettha ca hīnena hīnaṃ vadanto kiñcāpi saccaṃ vadati,
atk-vin02a1:24_2: Ukkaṭṭhena hīnaṃ vadanto ca kiñcāpi alikaṃ bhaṇati,
atk-vin02a1:24_3: omasitukāmatāya pana imināva sikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin02a1:25_1: Santi idhekacceti vāre pana pariharitvā vuttabhāvena dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:25_5: Corosi gaṇṭhibhedakosītiādivacanehi pana upasampannepi anupampannepi sabbavāresu dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin02a1:25_6: Davakamyatāya pana upasampannepi anupasampannepi sabbavāresu dubbhāsitaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:25_8: Imasmiñca sikkhāpade ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunīādayo sabbasattā anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:26_5: mā tamo tamaparāyaṇo ahosī”tiādinā nayena kathento anusāsanīpurekkhāro nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:27_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:30_5: evaṃ vutte evaṃ vakkhāmā”tiādikaṃ sakasakapakkhe sammantanaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:31_2: bhikkhuto sutvā bhikkhunā bhikkhussa upasaṃhaṭapesuññeti attho.
atk-vin02a1:32_2: Piyakamyassa vāti “evaṃ ahaṃ etassa piyo bhavissāmī”ti attano piyabhāvaṃ patthayamānassa vā.
atk-vin02a1:32_3: Bhedādhippāyassa vāti “evamayaṃ etena saddhiṃ bhijjissatī”ti parassa parena bhedaṃ icchantassa vā.
atk-vin02a1:32_5: Idhāpi bhikkhuniṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe anupasampannā nāma.
atk-vin02a1:33_0: Na piyakamyassa na bhedādhippāyassāti ekaṃ akkosantaṃ ekañca khamantaṃ disvā “aho nillajjo,
atk-vin02a1:33_1: īdisampi nāma bhavantaṃ puna vattabbaṃ maññissatī”ti evaṃ kevalaṃ pāpagarahitāya bhaṇantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:33_4: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:37_1: Padaso dhammaṃ vāceyyāti ekato padaṃ padaṃ dhammaṃ vāceyya;
atk-vin02a1:37_3: Yasmā pana taṃ koṭṭhāsanāmakaṃ padaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:37_4: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ “padaṃ anupadaṃ anvakkharaṃ anubyañjana”nti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:38_0: Idāni padaṃ nāma ekato paṭṭhapetvā ekato osāpentīti gāthābandhaṃ dhammaṃ vācento “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti
atk-vin02a1:38_1: ekamekaṃ padaṃ sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ ekato ārabhitvā ekatoyeva niṭṭhāpeti.
atk-vin02a1:38_3: Anupadaṃ nāma pāṭekkaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ekato osāpentīti therena “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti vutte sāmaṇero
atk-vin02a1:38_4: taṃ padaṃ apāpuṇitvā “manoseṭṭhā manomayā”ti dutiyapadaṃ ekato bhaṇati,
atk-vin02a1:38_5: ime pāṭekkaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ekato osāpenti nāma.
atk-vin02a1:38_7: Anvakkharaṃ nāma rūpaṃ aniccanti vuccamāno “rū”ti opātetīti “rūpaṃ aniccanti bhaṇa sāmaṇerā”ti vuccamāno rūkāramattameva ekato vatvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-vin02a1:38_10: Anubyañjanaṃ nāma rūpaṃ aniccanti vuccamāno vedanā aniccāti saddaṃ nicchāretīti “rūpaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:38_12: vedanā aniccā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vācayamāno therena “rūpaṃ anicca”nti vuccamāno sāmaṇero sīghapaññatāya “vedanā
atk-vin02a1:38_13: aniccā”ti imaṃ aniccapadaṃ therassa “rūpaṃ anicca”nti etena aniccapadena saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇanto vācaṃ
atk-vin02a1:38_17: imesu padādīsu yaṃ yaṃ ekato bhaṇati tena tena āpattiṃ āpajjatīti.
atk-vin02a1:39_0: Buddhabhāsitoti sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ dhammapadaṃ cariyāpiṭakaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:39_1: jātakaṃ suttanipāto vimānavatthu petavatthu brahmajālādīni ca suttāni.
atk-vin02a1:39_4: bāvariyassa antevāsikānaṃ soḷasannaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ pucchāti evamādi.
atk-vin02a1:40_4: tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhadhammaṃyeva pana padaso vācentassa āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:40_6: Tisso saṅgītiyo anāruḷhepi kulumbasuttaṃ rājovādasuttaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ catuparivaṭṭaṃ nandopanandanti īdise āpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:40_20: āpattīti vatvā avasesesu yaṃ buddhavacanato āharitvā vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:41_1: Ekato uddisāpentoti anupasampannena saddhiṃ ekato uddesaṃ gaṇhantopi ekato vadati anāpattīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:42_1: upasampanno ca anupasampanno ca nisīditvā uddisāpenti.
atk-vin02a1:42_2: Ācariyo nisinnānaṃ bhaṇāmīti tehi saddhiṃ ekato vadati,
atk-vin02a1:42_13: Sace bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antare eko sāmaṇero nisinno hoti,
atk-vin02a1:42_14: tasmiṃ nisinne padaso dhammaṃ vācentassa ācariyassa acittakāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:42_15: Sace sāmaṇero upacāraṃ muñcitvā ṭhito vā nisinno vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:42_17: tesu apariyāpannattā ekena disābhāgena palāyanakaganthaṃ nāma gaṇhātīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:42_19: Ekato sajjhāyaṃ karontopi anupasampannena saddhiṃ upasampanno ekato sajjhāyaṃ karonto tena saddhiṃyeva bhaṇati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:42_20: Anupasampannassa santike uddesaṃ gaṇhantassapi tena saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:42_21: Ayampi hi ekato sajjhāyaṃ karoticceva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:43_0: Yebhuyyena paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ bhaṇantaṃ opātetīti sace ekagāthāya eko pādo na āgacchati,
atk-vin02a1:43_4: Taṃ opātentassa evaṃ bhaṇāhīti ekatopi bhaṇantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:43_5: Osārentaṃ opātetīti suttaṃ uccārentaṃ parisamajjhe parisaṅkamānaṃ evaṃ vadehīti tena saddhiṃ ekatopi vadantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:43_6: Yaṃ pana mahāpaccariyādīsu “mayā saddhiṃ mā vadā”ti vutto yadi vadati,
atk-vin02a1:44_1: vācato ca vācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:47_2: muṭṭhassatī asampajānāti pubbabhāge satisampajaññassa akaraṇavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:47_3: bhavaṅgotiṇṇakāle pana kuto satisampajaññanti! Vikūjamānāti vippalapamānā.
atk-vin02a1:47_4: Kākacchamānāti nāsāya kākasaddaṃ viya niratthakasaddaṃ muñcamānā.
atk-vin02a1:48_1: Etadavocunti “bhagavatā āvuso rāhula sikkhāpadaṃ paññatta”nti bhikkhū sikkhāpadagāraveneva etaṃ avocuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:48_2: Pakatiyā pana te bhagavati ca gāravena āyasmato ca rāhulassa sikkhākāmatāya tassa āyasmato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:48_3: āgatassa cūḷamañcakaṃ vā apassenaṃ vā yaṃ atthi taṃ paññapetvā cīvaraṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā ussīsakaraṇatthāya denti.
atk-vin02a1:48_5: bhikkhū kira taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā muṭṭhisammuñjaniñca kacavarachaḍḍanakañca bahi khipanti.
atk-vin02a1:48_6: Athaññehi “āvuso kenidaṃ pātita”nti vutte aññe evaṃ vadanti – “bhante,
atk-vin02a1:48_9: So panāyasmā “na mayhaṃ bhante idaṃ kamma”nti ekadivasampi avatvā taṃ paṭisāmetvā bhikkhū khamāpetvā gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:48_10: Vaccakuṭiyā seyyaṃ kappesīti taṃyeva sikkhākāmataṃ anubrūhanto dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānaānandattherādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:48_11: santikaṃ agantvā bhagavato vaḷañjanakavaccakuṭiyaṃ seyyaṃ kappesi.
atk-vin02a1:48_12: Sā kira kuṭi kavāṭabaddhā gandhaparibhaṇḍakatā samosaritapupphadāmā cetiyaṭṭhānamiva tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:49_1: Uttaridirattatirattanti bhagavā sāmaṇerānaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya tirattaṃ parihāraṃ adāsi.
atk-vin02a1:49_2: Na hi yuttaṃ kuladārake pabbājetvā nānuggahetunti.
atk-vin02a1:49_6: Tattha senāsanaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “seyyā nāma sabbacchannā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:49_7: Kāyappasāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ anupasampanne nipanne bhikkhu nipajjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:49_9: “senāsanasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ pavisitvā kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ kappeyya vidaheyya sampādeyyā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:49_10: Sabbacchannātiādinā pana tassā senāsanasaṅkhātāya seyyāya lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:49_11: Tasmā yaṃ senāsanaṃ upari pañcahi chadanehi aññena vā kenaci sabbameva paṭicchannaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:49_13: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana pākaṭavohāraṃ gahetvā vācuggatavasena “sabbacchannā nāma pañcahi chadanehi channā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:49_15: Atha kho dussakuṭiyaṃ vasantassāpi na sakkā anāpatti kātuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:49_16: tasmā yaṃ kiñci paṭicchādanasamatthaṃ idha chadanañca paricchannañca veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:49_17: Pañcavidhacchadaneyeva hi gayhamāne padaracchannepi sahaseyyā na bhaveyya.
atk-vin02a1:49_18: Yaṃ pana senāsanaṃ bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāva chadanaṃ āhacca pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenāpi parikkhittaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:49_20: Chadanaṃ anāhacca sabbantimena pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā parikkhittāpi sabbaparicchannāyevāti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:49_21: Yassā pana upari bahutaraṃ ṭhānaṃ channaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:49_25: ayaṃ yebhuyyena channā yebhuyyena paricchannā nāma.
atk-vin02a1:49_26: Iminā hi lakkhaṇena samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmako pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti,
atk-vin02a1:49_29: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “catutthe divase atthaṅgate sūriye anupasampanne nipanne bhikkhu nipajjati,
atk-vin02a1:50_6: Bhikkhussa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjane pana bhikkhusseva payogena bhikkhussa āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:50_7: Sace pana sambahulā bhikkhū eko sāmaṇero sabbesaṃ āpattiṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a1:51_1: Yo hi ekasmiṃ āvāse ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti,
atk-vin02a1:51_3: Yopi ekasmiṃyeva āvāse nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassapi.
atk-vin02a1:51_4: Yopi nānāāvāsesu ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassapi.
atk-vin02a1:51_5: Yopi nānāāvāsesu nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṃ yojanasatampi gantvā sahaseyyaṃ kappeti,
atk-vin02a1:52_0: Ayañca sahaseyyāpatti nāma “bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā”ti vacanato tiracchānagatenapi saddhiṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:52_1: tatra tiracchānagatassa paricchedo methunadhammāpattiyā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:52_2: Tasmā sacepi godhābiḷālamaṅgusādīsu koci pavisitvā bhikkhuno vasanasenāsane ekūpacāraṭṭhāne sayati,
atk-vin02a1:53_0: Yadi pana thambhānaṃ upari katapāsādassa uparimatalena saddhiṃ asambaddhabhittikassa bhittiyā upari ṭhitasusiratulāsīsassa
atk-vin02a1:53_1: susirena pavisitvā tulāya abbhantare sayitvā teneva susirena nikkhamitvā gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:53_4: tena pavisitvā antochadane vasitvā teneva pakkamati,
atk-vin02a1:54_0: Sabhāsaṅkhepena kate aḍḍhakuṭṭakasenāsane sayitassa vāḷasaṅghāṭādīsu kapotādayo pavisitvā sayanti,
atk-vin02a1:54_3: Parimaṇḍalaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā ekacchadanāya gabbhamālāya satagabbhaṃ cepi senāsanaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:54_4: tatra ce ekena sādhāraṇadvārena pavisitvā visuṃ pākārena aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre sabbagabbhe pavisanti,
atk-vin02a1:54_5: ekagabbhepi anupasampanne nipanne sabbagabbhesu nipannānaṃ āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:54_7: pamukhassa upari acchannaṃ uccavatthukaṃ cepi hoti,
atk-vin02a1:54_8: pamukhe sayito gabbhe sayitānaṃ āpattiṃ na karoti.
atk-vin02a1:54_9: Sace pana gabbhacchadaneneva saddhiṃ sambaddhacchadanaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:54_10: tatra sayito sabbesaṃ āpattiṃ karoti. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:54_13: Eteneva hi nayena aṭṭhakathāsu lohapāsādaparikkhepassa catūsu dvārakoṭṭhakesu āpatti vuttā.
atk-vin02a1:55_0: Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattīti bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā pamukhaṃ sandhāya kathina”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:55_1: taṃ andhakaraṭṭhe pāṭekkasannivesā ekacchadanā gabbhapāḷiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:55_5: Dasahatthubbedhāpi hi jagati parikkhepasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:55_6: Tasmā yampi tattha dutiyasikkhāpade jagatiyā pamāṇaṃ vatvā “etaṃ ekūpacāraṃ paricchannaṃ nāma hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:55_8: Yepi ekasāladvisālatisālacatussālasannivesā mahāpāsādā ekasmiṃ okāse pāde dhovitvā paviṭṭhena sakkā honti sabbattha anuparigantuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:55_10: Sace tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne upacāraṃ paricchinditvā katā honti,
atk-vin02a1:56_0: Dvīhi dvārehi yuttassa sudhāchadanamaṇḍapassa majjhe pākāraṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a1:56_1: ekena dvārena pavisitvā ekasmiṃ paricchede anupasampanno sayati,
atk-vin02a1:56_6: Na hi chiddena gehaṃ ekūpacāraṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:56_11: Na hi dvārapidahanena gehaṃ nānūpacāraṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:56_15: Sace pana taṃ dvāraṃ puna iṭṭhakāhi pidahanti,
atk-vin02a1:56_21: dvinnaṃ kavāṭānaṃ antare anupasampanno antocetiyaghare sayantassa āpattiṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a1:57_0: Tatra yassa “siyā ayaṃ ekūpacāranānūpacāratā nāma udositasikkhāpade vuttā,
atk-vin02a1:57_1: idha pana ‘seyyā nāma sabbacchannā sabbaparicchannā yebhuyyena channā yebhuyyena paricchannā’ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:57_3: Tasmā tattha anto sayiteneva saddhiṃ āpatti,
atk-vin02a1:57_8: “Kiṃ pana gabbhe pihite chadanaṃ viddhastaṃ hotī”ti?
atk-vin02a1:57_10: gabbhena saddhiṃ pamukhassa sabbaparicchannatā na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:57_14: Evaṃ dūrampi gantvā puna ekūpacāranānūpacārataṃyeva paccāgamissati.
atk-vin02a1:58_0: Apica yadi byañjanamatteyeva attho suviññeyyo siyā,
atk-vin02a1:58_1: sabbacchannāti vacanato pañcannaṃ aññatarena chadanena channā eva seyyā siyā,
atk-vin02a1:58_10: “paṭicchannaṃ nāma āsanaṃ kuṭṭena vā kavāṭena vā kilañjena vā sāṇipākārena vā rukkhena vā thambhena vā
atk-vin02a1:58_11: koṭṭhalikāya vā yena kenaci paṭicchannaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:58_12: Tasmā yathā tattha yena kenaci paṭicchannaṃ paṭicchannameva,
atk-vin02a1:58_14: Tasmā senāsanaṃ khuddakaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ vā aññena saddhiṃ sambaddhaṃ vā asambaddhaṃ vā dīghaṃ vā vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā ekabhūmakaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a1:58_16: yaṃ yaṃ ekūpacāraṃ sabbattha yena kenaci paṭicchādanena sabbacchanne sabbaparicchanne yebhuyyena vā channe
atk-vin02a1:59_1: Upaḍḍhacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha sabbacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanneti evamādīsupi mahāpaccariyaṃ dukkaṭamevāti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:59_8: pāḷiyaṃ vuttapācittiyena saddhiṃ satta pācittiyānī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:59_13: pāḷiyaṃ dukkaṭena saha pañca dukkaṭānī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:60_3: sabbacchanne sabbaaparicchanneti ca ettha senambamaṇḍapavaṇṇaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:61_1: kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:64_3: Paññattaṃ hotīti puññakāmatāya katvā ṭhapitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:64_4: Yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkamīti asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne āvasathāgāraṃ paññattaṃ atthīti manussānaṃ sutvā upasaṅkami.
atk-vin02a1:64_7: Sāṭakaṃ nikkhipitvāti appeva nāmassa imampi vippakāraṃ passantassa rāgo uppajjeyyāti cintetvā evamakāsi.
atk-vin02a1:64_10: Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto.
atk-vin02a1:64_14: Yakkhīpetīhi dissamānakarūpāhi tiracchānagatitthiyā ca methunadhammavatthubhūtāya eva dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:67_8: Dhammo desetabboti ayaṃ saraṇasīlādibhedo dhammo kathetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:67_11: purisaviggahaṃ gahetvāpi ṭhitena na yakkhena na petena na tiracchānagatena.
atk-vin02a1:68_1: Anāpatti viññunā purisaviggahenāti viññunā purisaviggahena saddhiṃ ṭhitāya bahumpi dhammaṃ desentassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:68_2: Chappañcavācāhīti chahi pañcahi vācāhi yo deseti,
atk-vin02a1:68_4: Tattha eko gāthāpādo ekavācāti evaṃ sabbattha vācāpamāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:68_5: Sace aṭṭhakathaṃ dhammapadaṃ jātakādivatthuṃ vā kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:68_7: Pāḷiyā saddhiṃ kathentena ekapadaṃ pāḷito pañca aṭṭhakathātoti evaṃ cha padāni anatikkāmetvāva kathetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:68_8: Padasodhamme vuttappabhedo hi idhāpi sabbo dhammoyeva.
atk-vin02a1:68_12: Aññissā mātugāmassāti ekissā desetvā puna āgatāgatāya aññissāpi desetīti evaṃ ekāsane nisinno mātugāmasatasahassannampi desetīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:68_13: Mahāpaccariyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ samaṃ nisinnānaṃ mātugāmānaṃ “tumhākaṃ ekekissā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ desessāmi,
atk-vin02a1:68_15: Paṭhamaṃ ekekissā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ kathessāmīti ābhogaṃ katvā jānāpetvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:68_17: Pañhaṃ pucchati pañhaṃ puṭṭho kathetīti mātugāmo “dīghanikāyo nāma bhante kimatthaṃ dīpetī”ti pucchati.
atk-vin02a1:68_18: Evaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho bhikkhu sabbaṃ cepi dīghanikāyaṃ katheti, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:72_9: attano guṇe ārocayamāne pana aññe na paṭisedhesuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:73_0: “Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesu”ntiādimhi pana ye uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu,
atk-vin02a1:73_2: “Kacci pana vo bhikkhave bhūta”nti pucchite pana sabbepi “bhūtaṃ bhagavā”ti paṭijāniṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:73_4: Atha bhagavā ariyamissakattā “moghapurisā”ti avatvā “kathañhi nāma tumhe bhikkhave”ti vatvā “udarassa kāraṇā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:73_5: Tattha yasmā ariyā aññesaṃ sutvā “ayyo kira, bhante,
atk-vin02a1:73_6: sotāpanno”tiādinā nayena pasannehi manussehi pucchiyamānā apaññatte sikkhāpade anādīnavadassino suddhacittatāya
atk-vin02a1:73_8: Evaṃ paṭijānantehi ca tehi yaṃ aññe udarassa kāraṇā uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvā piṇḍapātaṃ uppādesuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:73_9: taṃ suddhacittatāya sādiyantehipi udarassa kāraṇā uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇo bhāsito viya hoti.
atk-vin02a1:73_12: udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissathā”ti āha.
atk-vin02a1:73_14: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅgepi kevalaṃ tattha pārājikañceva thullaccayañca idha bhūtattā pācittiyañceva dukkaṭañca ayaṃ viseso.
atk-vin02a1:74_2: Parinibbānakāle hi antarā vā atikaḍḍhiyamānena upasampannassa bhūtaṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:74_5: “Ummattakassā”ti idaṃ pana idha na vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:74_6: Diṭṭhisampannānaṃ ummādassa vā cittakkhepassa vā abhāvāti.
atk-vin02a1:74_7: Mahāpaccariyampi hi vicāritaṃ “jhānalābhī pana parihīne jhāne ummattako bhaveyya,
atk-vin02a1:75_0: Bhūtārocanaṃ nāmetaṃ pubbe avuttehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti –
atk-vin02a1:78_2: duṭṭhullā nāma āpatti cattāri ca pārājikāni terasa ca saṅghādisesāti imissā pāḷiyā “pārājikāni duṭṭhullasaddatthadassanatthaṃ vuttāni,
atk-vin02a1:78_3: saṅghādisesaṃ pana idha adhippeta”nti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:78_5: sace pārājikaṃ ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ na bhaveyya,
atk-vin02a1:78_7: bhikkhunīnaṃ upasampannasadde yattha bhikkhunī anadhippetā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:78_8: tattha bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampannoti vuccati;
atk-vin02a1:78_9: evamidha samānepi pārājikasaṅghādisesānaṃ duṭṭhullasadde yadi pārājikaṃ anadhippetaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:78_10: “duṭṭhullā nāma āpatti terasa saṅghādisesā”ti etadeva vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-vin02a1:78_13: tasmā tassa āpattiṃ ārocento dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:78_17: “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
atk-vin02a1:78_18: tañce asuddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadati,
atk-vin02a1:78_20: Evaṃ pāḷiyā vicāriyamānāya pārājikaṃ ārocentassāpi pācittiyameva dissati.
atk-vin02a1:78_22: atha kho sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttattā aṭṭhakathācariyāva ettha pamāṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:79_2: Bhikkhusammutiyā ca ārocanaṃ āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāya puna tathārūpaṃ āpattiṃ anāpajjanatthāya bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:79_5: na ca pārājikaṃ āpannassa puna tathārūpāya āpattiyā anāpajjanena bhikkhubhāvo nāma atthi.
atk-vin02a1:79_7: saṅghādisesaṃ pana idhādhippeta”nti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:80_1: Atthi bhikkhusammuti āpattipariyantātiādīsu pana yā ayaṃ bhikkhusammuti vuttā,
atk-vin02a1:80_3: idha vuttattāyeva pana abhiṇhāpattikaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā evamesa paresu hirottappenāpi āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjissatīti
atk-vin02a1:80_4: tassa bhikkhuno hitesitāya tikkhattuṃ apaloketvā saṅghena kātabbāti veditabbāti.
atk-vin02a1:81_1: Aduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ āroceti āpatti dukkaṭassāti pañcapi āpattikkhandhe ārocentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:81_2: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana pārājikaṃ ārocentassāpi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:81_3: Anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṃ vā aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāranti ettha ādito pañca sikkhāpadāni duṭṭhullo nāma ajjhācāro,
atk-vin02a1:82_3: attakāmaṃ āpanno” kāyasaṃsaggaṃ āpannoti evaṃ vadantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:82_5: saṅghādisesaṃ thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ āpanno”ti vadati anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:82_6: “Ayaṃ asuciṃ mocetvā saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno”tiādinā pana nayena vatthunā saddhiṃ āpattiṃ ghaṭetvā ārocentasseva āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:83_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:86_2: jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavīti imehi padehi jātapathaviñca ajātapathaviñca dasseti.
atk-vin02a1:86_3: Appapāsāṇādīsu appā pāsāṇā etthāti appapāsāṇāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:86_9: Yebhuyyena paṃsukāti tīsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā paṃsu,
atk-vin02a1:86_15: Hatthikucchiyaṃ kira ekapacchipūraṃ āharāpetvā doṇiyaṃ dhovitvā pathaviyā yebhuyyena sakkharabhāvaṃ ñatvā sayaṃ bhikkhū pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇiṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:86_16: Yāni pana majjhe “appapaṃsu appamattikā”ti dve padāni,
atk-vin02a1:86_17: tāni yebhuyyenapāsāṇādipañcakameva pavisanti tesaṃyeva hi dvinnaṃ pabhedadassanametaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:86_18: Sayaṃ khaṇati āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha pahāre pahāre pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:86_19: Sakiṃ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti sacepi sakaladivasaṃ khaṇati,
atk-vin02a1:86_23: Taṃ āṇāpetvā khaṇāpentassa vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:87_6: imasmiṃ okāse pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇā”ti vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:87_10: imasmiṃ okāse kandaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā khaṇā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:87_11: Pokkharaṇiṃ sodhentehi yo kuṭehi ussiñcituṃ sakkā hoti tanukakaddamo,
atk-vin02a1:88_5: deve atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhepi udakeyeva udakassa patitattā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:88_10: Udake pariyādiṇṇe soṇḍiṃ sodhentehi taṃ vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:88_14: Tattha hi deve vassantepi udakeyeva udakaṃ patatīti.
atk-vin02a1:88_18: Sace pana akatapabbhāre vammiko uṭṭhito hoti,
atk-vin02a1:89_4: Purāṇasenāsanaṃ hoti acchadanaṃ vā vinaṭṭhacchadanaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a1:89_6: Tato avasesaṃ chadaniṭṭhakaṃ vā gopānasīādikaṃ upakaraṇaṃ vā “iṭṭhakaṃ gaṇhāmi gopanasiṃ bhittipādaṃ
atk-vin02a1:89_7: padarattharaṇaṃ pāsāṇatthambhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti saññāya gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:89_10: Sace yā yā atintā taṃ taṃ gaṇhāti, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:90_5: yattakaṃ tintaṃ taṃ kappiyakārakehi kappiyavohārena apanāmetvā sesaṃ yathāsukhaṃ vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:90_6: Udakena temetvā ekābaddhāyeva hi jātapathavī hoti,
atk-vin02a1:91_2: Tattha laggapaṃsuṃ pana allahatthena chupitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:91_6: Abbhokāse ṭhitamaṇḍapatthambhaṃ ito cito ca sañcāletvā pathaviṃ vikopentena gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:91_8: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṃ vā sukkhakhāṇukaṃ vā gaṇhantassa eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:91_9: Navakammatthaṃ pāsāṇaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā daṇḍakehi uccāletvā pavaṭṭentā gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:91_12: Atha pana tena apadesena pathaviṃ bhinditukāmāyeva honti, āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:91_13: Sākhādīni kaḍḍhantānampi pathaviyaṃ dārūni phālentānampi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:92_0: Pathaviyaṃ aṭṭhisūcikaṇṭakādīsupi yaṃkiñci ākoṭetuṃ vā pavesetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:92_1: Passāvadhārāya vegena pathaviṃ bhindissāmīti evaṃ passāvampi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:92_3: Visamabhūmiṃ samaṃ karissāmīti sammuñjaniyā ghaṃsitumpi na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:92_9: Vīriyasampaggahatthaṃ pana samaṇadhammaṃ karontena suddhacittena caṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:92_12: Aghaṃsantena pana allahatthaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapetvā rajaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:92_13: Keci kaṇḍukacchuādīhi ābādhikā chinnataṭādīsu aṅgapaccaṅgāni ghaṃsanti na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:93_1: Khaṇati vā khaṇāpeti vāti antamaso pādaṅguṭṭhakenapi sammajjanīsalākāyapi sayaṃ vā khaṇati,
atk-vin02a1:93_3: Bhindati vā bhedāpeti vāti antamaso udakampi chaḍḍento sayaṃ vā bhindati,
atk-vin02a1:93_5: Dahati vā dahāpeti vāti antamaso pattampi pacanto sayaṃ vā dahati,
atk-vin02a1:93_7: Yattakesu ṭhānesu aggiṃ deti vā dāpeti vā tattakāni pācittiyāni.
atk-vin02a1:93_8: Pattaṃ pacantenapi hi pubbe pakkaṭṭhāneyeva hi pacitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:93_9: Adaḍḍhāya pathaviyā aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:93_10: Pattapacanakapālassa pana upari aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:93_12: so aggi tāni dahanto gantvā pathaviṃ dahati,
atk-vin02a1:94_0: Tatrāpi hi iṭṭhakādīnaṃyeva upari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:94_2: Na hi tāni aggissa upādānasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
atk-vin02a1:94_4: Sace pana pathaviṃ appattameva nibbāpetvā gamissāmīti deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:94_7: Tiṇukkaṃ gahetvā gacchanto hatthe ḍayhamāne bhūmiyaṃ pāteti, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:94_8: Patitaṭṭhāneyeva upādānaṃ datvā aggiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:94_9: Daḍḍhapathaviyā ca yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ usumāya anugataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:94_11: Yo pana ajānanako bhikkhu araṇīsahitena aggiṃ nibbattetvā hatthena ukkhipitvā “kiṃ karomī”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:94_16: Sace hatthe ḍayhamāne pāteti “pathaviṃ dahissāmī”ti apātitattā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:94_17: Patitaṭṭhāne pana aggiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:95_1: Anāpatti imaṃ jānātiādīsu “imassa thambhassa āvāṭaṃ jāna,
atk-vin02a1:95_12: imaṃ paṃsuṃ kappiyaṃ karohī”ti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:96_0: Asañciccāti pāsāṇarukkhādīni vā pavaṭṭentassa kattaradaṇḍena vā āhacca āhacca gacchantassa pathavī bhijjati,
atk-vin02a1:96_1: sā “tena bhindissāmī”ti evaṃ sañcicca abhinnattā asañcicca bhinnā nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:96_3: Asatiyāti aññavihito kenaci saddhiṃ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena vā kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā pathaviṃ vilikhanto tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:96_4: evaṃ asatiyā vilikhantassa vā bhindantassa vā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:96_5: Ajānantassāti antogehe ovaṭṭhaṃ channaṃ pathaviṃ “akappiyapathavī”ti na jānāti,
atk-vin02a1:97_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:102_3: Dārakassa bāhuṃ ākoṭesīti ukkhittaṃ pharasuṃ niggahetuṃ asakkonto manussānaṃ cakkhuvisayātīte mahārājasantikā
atk-vin02a1:102_4: laddhe rukkhaṭṭhakadibbavimāne nipannassa dārakassa bāhuṃ thanamūleyeva chindi.
atk-vin02a1:102_5: Na kho metaṃ patirūpantiādimhi ayaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā –
atk-vin02a1:102_9: Rukkhadhammo nāma rukkhe chijjamāne rukkhadevatāya manopadosassa akaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:102_10: Tattha yā devatā rukkhadhamme aṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:102_12: Iti sā devatā imañca rukkhadhamme aṭṭhānapaccayaṃ ādīnavaṃ addasa,
atk-vin02a1:102_13: bhagavato ca sammukhā sutapubbadhammadesanānusārena tathāgatassa chaddantādikāle pubbacaritaṃ anussari.
atk-vin02a1:102_17: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ āroceyyanti idaṃ panassā “ayaṃ bhikkhu sapitiko putto,
atk-vin02a1:102_18: addhā bhagavā imaṃ imassa ajjhācāraṃ sutvā mariyādaṃ bandhissati,
atk-vin02a1:102_20: Sacajja tvaṃ devateti sace ajja tvaṃ devate.
atk-vin02a1:102_22: Evañca pana vatvā bhagavā taṃ devataṃ saññāpento –
atk-vin02a1:103_0: “Yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃva vāraye;
atk-vin02a1:104_0: Tamahaṃ sārathiṃ brūmi, rasmiggāho itaro jano”ti. ;
atk-vin02a1:106_0: “Yo uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ, visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehi;
atk-vin02a1:107_0: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇa”nti. ;
atk-vin02a1:108_4: Atha bhagavā dhammaṃ desentoyeva tassā devatāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āvajjanto patirūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ disvā “gaccha, devate,
atk-vin02a1:108_9: yassa devaputtassa pariggaho ahosi, so cuto;
atk-vin02a1:108_11: Tato paṭṭhāya ca pana sā devatā sammāsambuddhato laddhaparihārā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā ahosi.
atk-vin02a1:108_13: tadā mahesakkhadevatāsu āgacchantīsu aññā appesakkhā devatā yāva mahāsamuddacakkavāḷapabbatā tāva paṭikkamanti.
atk-vin02a1:108_14: Ayaṃ pana attano vasanaṭṭhāne nisīditvāva dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-vin02a1:108_18: Cattāro ca mahārājānopi bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā gacchantā taṃ devataṃ disvāva gacchanti.
atk-vin02a1:109_2: jāyanti vaḍḍhanti jātā vaḍḍhitā cāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:110_1: Idāni taṃ bhūtagāmaṃ vibhajitvā dassento bhūtagāmo nāma pañca bījajātānītiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:110_2: Tattha bhūtagāmo nāmāti bhūtagāmaṃ uddharitvā yasmiṃ sati bhūtagāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:110_3: taṃ dassetuṃ “pañca bījajātānī”ti āhāti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:110_4: Evaṃ santepi “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūle jāyantī”tiādīni na samenti.
atk-vin02a1:110_15: bījāni ca tāni vijātāni ca pasūtāni nibbattapaṇṇamūlānīti bījajātāni.
atk-vin02a1:110_16: Etena allavālikādīsu ṭhapitānaṃ nibbattapaṇṇamūlānaṃ siṅgiverādīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti.
atk-vin02a1:111_0: Idāni yehi bījehi jātattā rukkhādīni bījajātānīti vuttāni,
atk-vin02a1:111_3: Niddese yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūle jāyanti mūle sañjāyantīti ettha bījato nibbattena bījaṃ dassitaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:111_5: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi āluvakaserukamaluppalapuṇḍarīkakuvalayakandapāṭalimūlādibhede mūle gacchavallirukkhādīni jāyanti sañjāyanti,
atk-vin02a1:111_6: tāni yamhi mūle jāyanti ceva sañjāyanti ca tañca,
atk-vin02a1:111_7: pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ haliddādi ca sabbampi etaṃ mūlabījaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a1:112_1: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiya”nti tattha saññāvasena āpattānāpattibhedaṃ pātabyatābhedañca dassento bīje bījasaññītiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:112_2: Tattha yathā “sālīnaṃ cepi odanaṃ bhuñjatī”tiādīsu sālitaṇḍulānaṃ odano “sālīnaṃ odano”ti vuccati,
atk-vin02a1:112_3: evaṃ bījato sambhūto bhūtagāmo “bīja”nti vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:112_4: Yaṃ pana “bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato”tiādīsu vuttaṃ bhūtagāmaparimocanaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ bījaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:112_6: Atha vā yadetaṃ “bhūtagāmo nāmā”ti sikkhāpadavibhaṅgassa ādipadaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:112_7: tena saddhiṃ yojetvā yaṃ bījaṃ bhūtagāmo nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:112_8: tasmiṃ bīje bījasaññī satthakādīni gahetvā sayaṃ vā chindati aññena vā chedāpeti,
atk-vin02a1:112_9: pāsāṇādīni gahetvā sayaṃ vā bhindati aññena vā bhedāpeti,
atk-vin02a1:112_10: aggiṃ upasaṃharitvā sayaṃ vā pacati aññena vā pacāpeti,
atk-vin02a1:112_12: Yathārutaṃ pana gahetvā bhūtagāmavinimuttassa bījassa chindanādibhedāya pātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ na vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:113_1: bhūtagāmaṃ vikopentassa pācittiyaṃ bhūtagāmaparimocitaṃ pañcavidhampi bījagāmaṃ vikopentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:113_4: Tattha udakaṭṭho sāsapamattikā tilabījakādibhedā sapaṇṇikā apaṇṇikā ca sabbā sevālajāti antamaso udakapappaṭakaṃ upādāya “bhūtagāmo”ti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:113_7: Tattha yassa sevālassa mūlaṃ orūhitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:113_11: Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ yattha katthaci vikopentassa uddharitvā vā ṭhānantaraṃ saṅkāmentassa pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:113_13: Hatthehi pana ito cito ca viyūhitvā nhāyituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:113_15: Tasmā na so ettāvatā ṭhānantaraṃ saṅkāmito hoti.
atk-vin02a1:113_16: Udakato pana udakena vinā sañcicca ukkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:113_17: udakena saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā puna udake pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:113_20: Uppalinīpaduminīādīni jalajavallitiṇāni udakato uddharantassa vā tattheva vikopentassa vā pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:113_23: Tilabījakasāsapamattakasevālopi udakato uddhato amilāto aggabījasaṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:113_31: Asampuṇṇabhūtagāmo nāma tatiyo koṭṭhāso neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāsu āgato.
atk-vin02a1:114_6: Kadaliyā pana aphalitāya khāṇu bhūtagāmena saṅgahito,
atk-vin02a1:114_21: Tattha maṇḍapatthāya vā vatiatthāya vā valliāropanatthāya vā bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇanti,
atk-vin02a1:114_22: mūlesu ceva paṇṇesu ca niggatesu puna bhūtagāmasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
atk-vin02a1:114_23: Mūlamattesu pana paṇṇamattesu vā niggatesu bījagāmena saṅgahitā eva.
atk-vin02a1:115_0: Yāni kānici bījāni pathaviyaṃ vā udakena siñcitvā ṭhapitāni,
atk-vin02a1:115_1: kapālādīsu vā allapaṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā nikkhittāni honti,
atk-vin02a1:115_2: sabbāni mūlamatte paṇṇamatte vā niggatepi bījāniyeva.
atk-vin02a1:115_3: Sacepi mūlāni ca upari aṅkuro ca niggacchati,
atk-vin02a1:115_6: Muggādīnaṃ pana paṇṇesu uṭṭhitesu vīhiādīnaṃ vā aṅkure harite nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇe jāte bhūtagāmasaṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-vin02a1:115_7: Tālaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭhamaṃ sūkaradāṭhā viya mūlaṃ niggacchati.
atk-vin02a1:115_8: Niggatepi yāva upari pattavaṭṭi na niggacchati,
atk-vin02a1:115_10: Nāḷikerassa tacaṃ bhinditvā dantasūci viya aṅkuro niggacchati,
atk-vin02a1:115_13: Mūle aniggatepi tādisāya pattavaṭṭiyā jātāya amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:116_1: Vandākā vā aññā vā yā kāci rukkhe jāyitvā rukkhaṃ ottharati,
atk-vin02a1:116_3: taṃ vikopentassa vā tato uddharantassa vā pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:116_8: yāva dve tīṇi pattāni na sañjāyanti tāva aggabījasaṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:116_10: Tasmā tādisesu ṭhānesu sudhālepampi dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:117_4: Allarukkhato pana ahicchattakaṃ gaṇhanto rukkhattacaṃ vikopeti,
atk-vin02a1:117_7: Yā pana indasālakakudhādīnaṃ pappaṭikā rukkhato muccitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:117_9: Niyyāsampi rukkhato muccitvā ṭhitaṃ sukkharukkhe vā laggaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:117_12: Rukkhaṃ cāletvā paṇḍupalāsaṃ vā pariṇatakaṇikārādipupphaṃ vā pātentassa pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a1:117_13: Hatthakukkuccena mudukesu indasālanuhīkhandhādīsu vā tatthajātakatālapaṇṇādīsu vā akkharaṃ chindantassāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:118_0: Sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphaṃ ocinantānaṃ sākhaṃ onāmetvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:118_1: Tehi pana pupphehi pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:118_5: Yaṃkiñci gacchaṃ vā lataṃ vā uppāṭentehi sāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:118_6: Tesaṃ pana ussāhajananatthaṃ anākaḍḍhantena kaḍḍhanākāraṃ dassentena viya agge gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:118_8: tesaṃ sākhaṃ makkhikābījanādīnaṃ atthāya kappiyaṃ akārāpetvā gahitaṃ tace vā patte vā antamaso nakhenapi vilikhantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:118_10: Sace pana kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā sītale padese ṭhapitassa mūlaṃ sañjāyati,
atk-vin02a1:118_14: Mūle ca nīlaṅkure ca jāte na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:119_0: Chindati vā chedāpeti vāti antamaso sammuñjanosalākāyapi tiṇāni chindissāmīti bhūmiṃ sammajjanto sayaṃ vā chindati,
atk-vin02a1:119_2: Bhindati vā bhedāpeti vāti antamaso caṅkamantopi chijjanakaṃ chijjatu,
atk-vin02a1:119_4: caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmīti sañcicca pādehi akkamanto tiṇavalliādīni sayaṃ vā bhindati aññena vā bhedāpeti.
atk-vin02a1:119_5: Sacepi hi tiṇaṃ vā lataṃ vā gaṇṭhiṃ karontassa bhijjati,
atk-vin02a1:119_7: Tālarukkhādīsu pana corānaṃ anāruhanatthāya dārumakkaṭakaṃ ākoṭenti,
atk-vin02a1:119_14: kandaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā uppāṭehī”ti vattumpi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:119_16: Niyāmetvā pana “imaṃ rukkhaṃ chindā”tiādi vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:119_17: Nāmaṃ gahetvāpi “ambarukkhaṃ caturassavalliṃ āluvakandaṃ muñjatiṇaṃ asukarukkhacchalliṃ chinda bhinda uppāṭehī”tiādivacanampi aniyāmitameva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:120_0: Pacati vā pacāpeti vāti antamaso pattampi pacitukāmo tiṇādīnaṃ upari sañcicca aggiṃ karonto sayaṃ vā pacati,
atk-vin02a1:120_1: aññena vā pacāpetīti sabbaṃ pathavīkhaṇanasikkhāpade vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:120_5: ime māse pacā”ti evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:121_1: imaṃ mūlaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā dehi,
atk-vin02a1:121_2: imaṃ rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā āhara,
atk-vin02a1:121_3: iminā pupphena vā phalena vā paṇṇena vā attho,
atk-vin02a1:121_4: imaṃ rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā phalaṃ vā kappiyaṃ karohī”ti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:121_6: Paribhuñjantena pana bījagāmaparimocanatthaṃ puna kappiyaṃ kāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:122_3: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ aggiparijitaṃ satthaparijitaṃ nakhaparijitaṃ abījaṃ nibbaṭṭabījameva pañcama”nti.
atk-vin02a1:122_4: Tattha “aggiparijita”nti agginā parijitaṃ adhibhūtaṃ daḍḍhaṃ phuṭṭhanti attho.
atk-vin02a1:122_5: “Satthaparijita”nti satthena parijitaṃ adhibhūtaṃ chinnaṃ viddhaṃ vāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:122_8: Agginā kappiyaṃ karontena kaṭṭhaggigomayaggiādīsu yena kenaci antamaso lohakhaṇḍenapi ādittena kappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:122_9: Tañca kho ekadese phusantena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:122_10: Satthena karontena yassa kassaci lohamayasatthassa antamaso sūcinakhacchedanānampi tuṇḍena vā dhārāya
atk-vin02a1:122_11: vā chedaṃ vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:122_12: Nakhena kappiyaṃ karontena pūtinakhena na kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:122_13: Manussānaṃ pana sīhabyagghadīpimakkaṭādīnaṃ sakuntānañca nakhā tikhiṇā honti,
atk-vin02a1:122_21: tehi tatthajātakehipi uddharitvā gahitakehipi chedaṃ vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:123_0: Tattha sacepi bījānaṃ pabbatamatto rāsi rukkhasahassaṃ vā chinditvā ekābaddhaṃ katvā ucchūnaṃ vā mahābhāro bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti,
atk-vin02a1:123_1: ekasmiṃ bīje vā rukkhasākhāya vā ucchumhi vā kappiye kate sabbaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:123_2: Ucchū ca dārūni ca ekato baddhāni honti,
atk-vin02a1:123_5: Sace pana yāya rajjuyā vā valliyā vā baddhāni,
atk-vin02a1:123_9: ekasmiṃ khaṇḍe kappiye kate sabbaṃ katameva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:123_14: Yāguyā pakkhittāni pana ekābaddhāni hutvā na santiṭṭhanti,
atk-vin02a1:123_16: Kapitthaphalādīnaṃ anto miñjaṃ kaṭāhaṃ muñcitvā sañcarati,
atk-vin02a1:124_0: Asañciccāti pāsāṇarukkhādīni vā pavaṭṭentassa sākhaṃ vā kaḍḍhantassa kattaradaṇḍena vā bhūmiṃ paharitvā gacchantassa tiṇāni chijjanti,
atk-vin02a1:124_1: tāni tena chindissāmīti evaṃ sañcicca acchinnattā asañcicca chinnāni nāma honti.
atk-vin02a1:125_0: Asatiyāti aññavihito kenaci saddhiṃ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena vā hatthena vā tiṇaṃ vā lataṃ vā chindanto tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:126_0: Ajānantassāti etthabbhantare bījagāmoti vā bhūtagāmoti vā na jānāti,
atk-vin02a1:126_2: kevalaṃ vatiyā vā palālapuñje vā nikhādanaṃ vā khaṇittiṃ vā kudālaṃ vā saṅgopanatthāya ṭhapeti,
atk-vin02a1:126_4: tatra ce tiṇāni chijjanti vā ḍayhanti vā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:126_5: Manussaviggahapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu “sace bhikkhu rukkhena vā ajjhotthaṭo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:126_6: opāte vā patito sakkā ca hoti rukkhaṃ chinditvā bhūmiṃ vā khaṇitvā nikkhamituṃ,
atk-vin02a1:126_8: Aññena pana bhikkhunā bhūmiṃ vā khaṇitvā rukkhaṃ vā chinditvā allarukkhato vā daṇḍakaṃ chinditvā taṃ rukkhaṃ pavaṭṭetvā nikkhāmetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:126_14: parittaṃ kātu”nti idaṃ pana ekameva suttaṃ dissati.
atk-vin02a1:126_16: aññassa vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ na sakkā laddhuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:126_17: Attano atthāya karonto attasinehena akusalacitteneva karoti,
atk-vin02a1:126_22: Sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu pana vuttattā na sakkā paṭisedhetuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:127_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:130_4: Aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena vacanena aññaṃ vacanaṃ paṭicarati paṭicchādeti ajjhottharati;
atk-vin02a1:130_8: āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno “ko āpanno”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a1:130_10: Atha “pācittiyaṃ vā dukkaṭaṃ vā”ti vutte vatthuṃ pucchanto “ahaṃ kismiṃ āpanno”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a1:130_11: Tato “asukasmiṃ nāma vatthusmi”nti vutte “ahaṃ kathaṃ āpanno,
atk-vin02a1:130_13: Atha “idaṃ nāma karonto āpanno”ti vutte “kaṃ bhaṇathā”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a1:131_4: tipumaṇḍalaṃ eta”nti bhaṇanto vā “tvaṃ suraṃ pivanto diṭṭho,
atk-vin02a1:131_7: bhesajjatthāya sampāditaṃ ariṭṭha”nti bhaṇanto vā “tvaṃ paṭicchanne āsane mātugāmena saddhiṃ nisinno diṭṭho,
atk-vin02a1:131_10: so kissa na diṭṭho”ti bhaṇanto vā,
atk-vin02a1:131_11: “īdisaṃ tayā kiñci diṭṭha”nti puṭṭho “na suṇāmī”ti sotamupanento vā,
atk-vin02a1:132_1: Aññavādake vihesake pācittiyanti ettha aññaṃ vadatīti aññavādakaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:133_0: 100. Aropite aññavādaketi kammavācāya anāropite aññavādake. Aropite vihesaketi etasmimpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:134_1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññītiādīsu yaṃ taṃ aññavādakavihesakaropanakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:134_3: so ca bhikkhu tasmiṃ dhammakammasaññī aññavādakañca vihesakañca karoti,
atk-vin02a1:134_4: athassa tasmiṃ aññavādake ca vihesake ca āpatti pācittiyassāti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:135_1: Ajānanto pucchatīti āpattiṃ vā āpannabhāvaṃ ajānantoyeva “kiṃ tumhe bhaṇatha,
atk-vin02a1:135_3: Gilāno vā na kathetīti mukhe tādiso byādhi hoti,
atk-vin02a1:135_5: Saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vātiādīsu saṅghamajjhe kathite tappaccayā saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vā kalaho vā vivādo vā bhavissati,
atk-vin02a1:135_6: so mā ahosīti maññamāno na kathetīti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:139_2: dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpentīti “chandāya dabbo mallaputto”tiādīni vadantā taṃ āyasmantaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi avajānāpenti,
atk-vin02a1:139_9: attano attano sandiṭṭhasambhattānaṃ paṇītāni paññapetīti adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:140_1: Ujjhāpanake khiyyanake pācittiyanti ettha yena vacanena ujjhāpenti,
atk-vin02a1:141_1: Ujjhāpanakaṃ nāma upasampannaṃ saṅghena sammataṃ senāsanapaññāpakaṃ vā…pe…
atk-vin02a1:141_2: appamattakavissajjanakaṃ vāti etesaṃ padānaṃ “maṅkukattukāmo”ti iminā sambandho.
atk-vin02a1:141_3: Avaṇṇaṃ kattukāmo ayasaṃ kattukāmoti imesaṃ pana vasena upasampannantiādīsu “upasampannassā”ti evaṃ vibhattivipariṇāmo kātabbo.
atk-vin02a1:141_4: Ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vā āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha pana yasmā “khiyyanakaṃ nāmā”ti evaṃ mātikāpadaṃ
atk-vin02a1:141_5: uddharitvāpi “ujjhāpanakaṃ nāmā”ti imassa padassa vuttavibhaṅgoyeva vattabbo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:141_7: tasmā taṃ visuṃ anuddharitvā avibhajitvā nigamanameva ekato katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:141_8: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññītiādīsu yaṃ tassa upasampannassa sammutikammaṃ kataṃ tañce dhammakammaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:141_9: so ca bhikkhu tasmiṃ dhammakammasaññī ujjhāpanakañca khiyyanakañca karoti,
atk-vin02a1:141_10: athassa tasmiṃ ujjhāpanake ca khiyyanake ca āpatti pācittiyassāti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:142_0: Anupasampannaṃ ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vāti ettha upasampannaṃ saṅghena sammataṃ aññaṃ anupasampannaṃ ujjhāpeti avajānāpeti,
atk-vin02a1:142_1: tassa vā taṃ santike khiyyatīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:142_2: Upasampannaṃ saṅghena asammatanti kammavācāya asammataṃ kevalaṃ “taveso bhāro”ti saṅghena āropitabhāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:142_3: bhikkhūnaṃ vā phāsuvihāratthāya sayameva taṃ bhāraṃ vahantaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:142_4: yatra vā dve tayo bhikkhū viharanti,
atk-vin02a1:142_5: tatra vā tādisaṃ kammaṃ karontanti adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:142_6: Anupasampannaṃ saṅghena sammataṃ vā asammataṃ vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi anupasampannassa terasa sammutiyo dātuṃ na vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin02a1:142_7: Atha kho upasampannakāle laddhasammutiko pacchā anupasampannabhāve ṭhito,
atk-vin02a1:142_9: Yassa pana byattassa sāmaṇerassa kevalaṃ saṅghena vā sammatena vā bhikkhunā “tvaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ karohī”ti bhāro kato,
atk-vin02a1:143_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:146_3: Kāyaṃ otāpentāti mañcapīṭhādīsu nisinnā bālātapena kāyaṃ otāpentā.
atk-vin02a1:146_4: Kāle ārociteti yāgubhattādīsu yassa kassaci kāle ārocite.
atk-vin02a1:146_5: Ovaṭṭhaṃ hotīti himavassena ovaṭṭhaṃ tintaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:147_1: Avassikasaṅketeti vassikavassānamāsāti evaṃ apaññatte cattāro hemantike cattāro ca gimhike aṭṭha māseti attho.
atk-vin02a1:147_2: Maṇḍape vāti sākhāmaṇḍape vā padaramaṇḍape vā.
atk-vin02a1:147_3: Rukkhamūle vāti yassa kassaci rukkhassa heṭṭhā.
atk-vin02a1:147_4: Yattha kākā vā kulalā vā na ūhadantīti yattha dhuvanivāsena kulāvake katvā vasamānā ete kākakulalā vā aññe vā sakuntā taṃ senāsanaṃ na ūhadanti,
atk-vin02a1:147_6: Tasmā yattha gocarappasutā sakuntā vissamitvā gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:147_8: Yasmiṃ pana dhuvanivāsena kulāvake katvā vasanti,
atk-vin02a1:147_10: “Aṭṭha māse”ti vacanato yesu janapadesu vassakāle na vassati,
atk-vin02a1:147_11: tesupi cattāro māse nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:147_13: tattha hemantepi ajjhokāse nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:147_14: Gimhe pana sabbattha vigatavalāhakaṃ visuddhaṃ nabhaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:147_15: evarūpe kāle kenacideva karaṇīyena ajjhokāse mañcapīṭhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:148_3: Saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantena vettena vā vākena vā vītamañcako gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:148_5: Tasmimpi asati navavāyimo vā onaddhako vā gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:148_6: Gahetvā ca pana “ahaṃ ukkaṭṭharukkhamūliko ukkaṭṭhaabbhokāsiko”ti cīvarakuṭimpi akatvā asamaye ajjhokāse
atk-vin02a1:148_7: rukkhamūle vā paññapetvā nipajjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:148_8: Sace pana catugguṇenapi cīvarena katakuṭi atementaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-vin02a1:149_0: Araññe paṇṇakuṭīsu vasantānaṃ sīlasampadāya pasannacittā manussā navaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ denti “saṅghikaparibhogena
atk-vin02a1:149_1: paribhuñjathā”ti vasitvā gacchantehi sāmantavihāre sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ pesetvā gantabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:149_4: Cetiyaṅgaṇe sammajjaniṃ gahetvā bhojanasālaṅgaṇaṃ vā uposathāgāraṅgaṇaṃ vā pariveṇadivāṭṭhānaaggisālādīsu
atk-vin02a1:149_5: vā aññataraṃ sammajjitvā dhovitvā puna sammajjanīmāḷakeyeva ṭhapetabbā.
atk-vin02a1:149_6: Uposathāgārādīsu aññatarasmiṃ gahetvā avasesāni sammajjantassāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:150_0: Yo pana bhikkhācāramaggaṃ sammajjantova gantukāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:150_1: tena sammajjitvā sace antarāmagge sālā atthi,
atk-vin02a1:150_5: tāva na vassissatī”ti jānantena yattha katthaci nikkhipitvā puna paccāgacchantena pākatikaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbā.
atk-vin02a1:150_8: Sace pana tatra tatreva sammajjanatthāya sammajjanī nikkhittā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:150_9: taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā tatra tatreva nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:151_1: Masārakoti mañcapāde vijjhitvā tattha aṭaniyo pavesetvā kato.
atk-vin02a1:151_2: Bundikābaddhoti aṭanīhi mañcapāde ḍaṃsāpetvā pallaṅkasaṅkhepena kato.
atk-vin02a1:151_6: Āhaccapādakoti ayaṃ pana “āhaccapādako nāma mañco aṅge vijjhitvā kato hotī”ti evaṃ parato pāḷiyaṃyeva vutto,
atk-vin02a1:151_7: tasmā aṭaniyo vijjhitvā tattha pādasikhaṃ pavesetvā upari āṇiṃ datvā katamañco “āhaccapādako”ti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:151_9: Anto saṃveṭhetvā baddhaṃ hotīti heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthataṃ majjhe saṅkhittaṃ paṇavasaṇṭhānaṃ katvā baddhaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:151_14: Anupasampannaṃ santharāpeti tassa palibodhoti yena santharāpitaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:151_16: Leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassāti thāmamajjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamantassa pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:152_1: thero bhojanasālāyaṃ bhattakiccaṃ katvā daharaṃ āṇāpeti “gaccha divāṭṭhāne mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapehī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:152_3: Thero yathāruciṃ vicaritvā tattha gantvā thavikaṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā ṭhapeti,
atk-vin02a1:152_8: Sace pana thero tattha thavikaṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā aṭṭhapetvā caṅkamantova daharaṃ “gaccha tva”nti bhaṇati,
atk-vin02a1:152_14: neva nisīdituṃ na nipajjituṃ demī”ti daharaṃ tajjetiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:152_15: Daharena “bhante sukhaṃ sayathā”ti kappaṃ labhitvā vanditvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:153_0: Atha pana āṇattikkhaṇeyeva daharo “mayhaṃ bhante bhaṇḍakadhovanādi kiñci karaṇīyaṃ atthī”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:153_1: thero ca naṃ “tvaṃ paññapetvā gacchāhī”ti vatvā bhojanasālato nikkhamitvā aññattha gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:153_3: Sace tattheva gantvā nisīdati purimanayeneva cassa leḍḍupātātikkame āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:153_5: sāmaṇere tattha mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā nisinnepi bhojanasālato aññattha gacchanto pāduddhārena kāretabbo.
atk-vin02a1:153_6: Gantvā nisinno puna gamanakāle leḍḍupātātikkame āpattiyā kāretabbo.
atk-vin02a1:153_7: Sace pana āṇāpento mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā tattheva nisīdāti āṇāpeti,
atk-vin02a1:153_9: Sayaṃ pana pākatikaṃ akatvā gacchantassa leḍḍupātātikkame pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:153_10: Antarasannipāte mañcapīṭhāni paññapetvā nisinnehi gamanakāle ārāmikānaṃ imaṃ paṭisāmethāti vattabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:154_0: Mahādhammasavanaṃ nāma hoti tattha uposathāgāratopi bhojanasālatopi āharitvā mañcapīṭhāni paññapenti.
atk-vin02a1:154_2: Sace āgantukā “idaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyassa idaṃ ācariyassā”ti gaṇhanti,
atk-vin02a1:154_4: Gamanakāle pākatikaṃ akatvā leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamantānaṃ āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:154_10: Sace te anuddharitvā vā anuddharāpetvā vā gacchanti, dukkaṭaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:154_12: Dhammāsane paññatte yāva ussārako vā dhammakathiko vā nāgacchati,
atk-vin02a1:154_16: añño ussārako vā dhammakathiko vā uṭṭhahati,
atk-vin02a1:154_20: Uṭṭhahantena pana “idamāsanaṃ tumhākaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:154_21: Sacepi itarasmiṃ anāgateyeva paṭhamaṃ nisinno uṭṭhāya gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:154_24: Sace pana itarasmiṃ anāgateyeva paṭhamaṃ nisinno uṭṭhāyāsanā leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamati,
atk-vin02a1:154_27: dutiye pācittiya”nti ayaṃ nayo mahāpaccariyaṃ vutto.
atk-vin02a1:155_1: Cimilikaṃ vātiādīsu cimilikā nāma sudhādiparikammakatāya bhūmiyā vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ katā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:155_2: taṃ heṭṭhā pattharitvā upari kaṭasārakaṃ pattharanti.
atk-vin02a1:155_3: Uttarattharaṇaṃ nāma mañcapīṭhānaṃ upari attharitabbakaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:155_5: Taṭṭikaṃ nāma tālapaṇṇehi vā vākehi vā katataṭṭikā.
atk-vin02a1:155_7: Aṭṭhakathāsu hi senāsanaparibhoge paṭikkhittacammaṃ nāma na dissati,
atk-vin02a1:155_9: Pādapuñchanī nāma rajjukehi vā pilotikāhi vā pādapuñchanatthaṃ katā.
atk-vin02a1:155_14: “ādhārakaṃ pattapidhānaṃ pādakathalikaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ bījanīpattakaṃ yaṃkiñci dārubhaṇḍaṃ antamaso pānīyauḷuṅkaṃ
atk-vin02a1:155_16: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana esa nayo dutiyasikkhāpade dassito.
atk-vin02a1:155_17: Ajjhokāse rajanaṃ pacitvā rajanabhājanaṃ rajanauḷuṅko rajanadoṇikāti sabbaṃ aggisālāya paṭisāmetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:155_20: Tasmimpi asati yattha olokentā bhikkhū passanti,
atk-vin02a1:156_0: Aññassa puggaliketi yasmiṃ vissāsaggāho na ruhati,
atk-vin02a1:156_3: tassa santakaṃ attano puggalikamiva hotīti mahāpaccariyādīsu vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:157_1: Āpucchaṃ gacchatīti yo bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hoti,
atk-vin02a1:157_5: Otāpento gacchatīti ātape otāpento āgantvā uddharissāmīti gacchati;
atk-vin02a1:157_7: Kenaci palibuddhaṃ hotīti senāsanaṃ kenaci upaddutaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:157_8: Sacepi hi vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu uṭṭhāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:157_9: sacepi yakkho vā peto vā āgantvā nisīdati,
atk-vin02a1:157_12: sīhabyagghādīsu vā pana taṃ padesaṃ āgantvā ṭhitesupi senāsanaṃ palibuddhaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:157_13: Evaṃ kenaci palibuddhe anuddharitvāpi gacchato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:161_8: Parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassāti ettha paṭhamapādaṃ atikkāmentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:161_10: Aparikkhittassa upacāro nāma senāsanato dve leḍḍupātā.
atk-vin02a1:162_0: Anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyāti ettha bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:162_3: tasmimpi asati yena vihāro kārito so vihārasāmiko,
atk-vin02a1:162_4: tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:162_5: Tasmimpi asati catūsu pāsāṇesu mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā mañce avasesamañcapīṭhāni āropetvā upari bhisiādikaṃ dasavidhampi
atk-vin02a1:162_6: seyyaṃ rāsiṃ karitvā dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānāni pidahitvā gamiyavattaṃ pūretvā
atk-vin02a1:162_9: chadanatthañca tiṇaṃ vā iṭṭhakā vā ānītā honti,
atk-vin02a1:162_19: ajjhokāsepi pāsāṇānaṃ upari mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva nikkhipitvā tiṇehi ca paṇṇehi ca paṭicchādetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:162_21: taṃ aññesaṃ tattha āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upakāraṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-vin02a1:163_7: atha kho vihāroti antogabbho vā aññaṃ vā sabbaparicchannaṃ guttasenāsanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:163_8: Vihārassa upacāreti tassa bahi āsanne okāse.
atk-vin02a1:163_10: Maṇḍape vāti aparicchanne paricchanne vāpi bahūnaṃ sannipātamaṇḍape.
atk-vin02a1:163_12: Āpatti dukkaṭassāti vuttappakārañhi dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ antogabbhādimhi guttaṭṭhāne paññapetvā gacchantassa
atk-vin02a1:163_16: Bahi pana upaṭṭhānasālādīsu paññapetvā gacchantassa seyyāmattameva nasseyya,
atk-vin02a1:163_19: Mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vāti ettha yasmā na sakkā mañcapīṭhaṃ sahasā upacikāhi khāyituṃ,
atk-vin02a1:163_20: tasmā taṃ vihārepi santharitvā gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:163_21: Vihārūpacāre pana taṃ vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantāpi disvā paṭisāmessanti.
atk-vin02a1:164_1: Uddharitvā gacchatīti ettha uddharitvā gacchantena mañcapīṭhakavāṭaṃ sabbaṃ apanetvā saṃharitvā cīvaravaṃse laggetvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:164_2: Pacchā āgantvā vasanakabhikkhunāpi puna mañcapīṭhaṃ vā paññapetvā sayitvā gacchantena tatheva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:164_3: Antokuṭṭato seyyaṃ bahikuṭṭe paññapetvā vasantena gamanakāle gahitaṭṭhāneyeva paṭisāmetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:164_4: Uparipāsādato oropetvā heṭṭhāpāsāde vasantassapi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:164_5: Rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvāpi gamanakāle puna gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:165_1: yā tāva bhūmiyaṃ dīghasālā vā paṇṇasālā vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:165_5: Tasmiñhi katipayāni divasāni ajaggiyamāne vammikāva santiṭṭhanti.
atk-vin02a1:165_6: Yaṃ pana pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ siluccayaleṇaṃ vā sudhālittasenāsanaṃ vā yattha upacikāsaṅkā natthi,
atk-vin02a1:165_7: tato pakkamantassa āpucchitvāpi anāpucchitvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:165_9: Sace tādisepi senāsane ekena passena upacikā ārohanti,
atk-vin02a1:165_11: Yo pana āgantuko bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ gahetvā vasantaṃ bhikkhuṃ anuvattanto attano senāsanaṃ aggahetvā vasati,
atk-vin02a1:165_14: Yadā pana so senāsanaṃ gahetvā attano issariyena vasati,
atk-vin02a1:165_21: Tesu ce paṭhamaṃ gacchanto ‘pacchimo jaggissatī’ti ābhogaṃ katvā gacchati vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:165_26: Aññato mañcapīṭhādīni ānetvā aññatra vasitvāpi gamanakāle tattheva netabbāni.
atk-vin02a1:165_27: Sace aññāvāsato ānetvā vasamānassa añño vuḍḍhataro āgacchati,
atk-vin02a1:165_31: Tena ‘evaṃ karissāmī’ti sampaṭicchite itarassa gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:165_32: Evamaññattha haritvāpi saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā corehi vā haṭaṃ gīvā na hoti,
atk-vin02a1:165_34: Aññassa mañcapīṭhaṃ pana saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena vā paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ gīvāyeva”.
atk-vin02a1:166_0: Kenaci palibuddhaṃ hotīti vuḍḍhatarabhikkhūissariyayakkhasīhavāḷamigakaṇhasappādīsu yena kenaci senāsanaṃ palibuddhaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:166_2: kenaci palibuddho hotīti ajjeva āgantvā paṭijaggissāmīti evaṃ sāpekkho nadīpāraṃ vā gāmantaraṃ vā gantvā yatthassa gamanacittaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:166_4: nadīpūrarājacorādīsu vā kenaci palibuddho hoti upadduto,
atk-vin02a1:169_2: palibundhentīti paṭhamataraṃ gantvā pattacīvaraṃ atiharitvā rumbhitvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-vin02a1:169_3: Therā bhikkhū vuṭṭhāpentīti “amhākaṃ āvuso pāpuṇātī”ti vassaggena gahetvā vuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-vin02a1:169_4: Anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappentīti “tumhākaṃ bhante mañcaṭṭhānaṃyeva pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin02a1:169_6: Amhākaṃ dāni idaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti anupavisitvā mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā nisīdantipi nipajjantipi sajjhāyampi karonti.
atk-vin02a1:170_5: saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ vā gaṇavācakaācariyassa vā bahūpakārataṃ
atk-vin02a1:170_6: guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhento dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sammannitvā deti,
atk-vin02a1:170_9: Kāmañcettha gilānassāpi saṅghoyeva anucchavikaṃ senāsanaṃ deti,
atk-vin02a1:170_10: gilāno pana “apaloketvā saṅghena adinnasenāsanopi na pīḷetabbo anukampitabbo”ti dassetuṃ visuṃ vutto.
atk-vin02a1:171_1: Upacāreti ettha mañcapīṭhānaṃ tāva mahallake vihāre samantā diyaḍḍho hattho upacāro,
atk-vin02a1:171_2: khuddake yato pahoti tato diyaḍḍho hattho,
atk-vin02a1:171_3: pāde dhovitvā pavisantassa passāvatthāya nikkhamantassa ca yāva dvāre nikkhittapādadhovanapāsāṇato passāvaṭṭhānato ca mañcapīṭhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:171_5: Tasmiṃ mañcassa vā pīṭhassa vā upacāre ṭhitassa vā bhikkhuno pavisantassa vā nikkhamantassa vā upacāre
atk-vin02a1:171_6: yo anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappetukāmo seyyaṃ santharati vā santharāpeti vā,
atk-vin02a1:172_0: Abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vāti ettha abhinisīdanamattena abhinipajjanamatteneva vā pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:172_3: Uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nisīdato vā nipajjato vā payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:173_1: Upacāraṃ ṭhapetvā seyyaṃ santharati vā santharāpeti vāti imasmiṃ ito pare ca “vihārassa upacāre”tiādike
atk-vin02a1:173_2: dukkaṭavārepi yathā idha abhinisīdanamatte abhinipajjanamatte ubhayakaraṇe payogabhede ca pācittiyappabhedo vutto,
atk-vin02a1:173_4: Evarūpena hi visabhāgapuggalena ekavihāre vā ekapariveṇe vā vasantena attho natthi,
atk-vin02a1:173_6: Aññassa puggaliketi idhāpi vissāsikassa puggalikaṃ attano puggalikasadisameva,
atk-vin02a1:174_1: Āpadāsūti sace bahi vasantassa jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:177_2: ekena payogena bahukepi dvāre atikkāmetīti ye catubhūmakapañcabhūmakā pāsādā chasattakoṭṭhakāni vā catussālāni,
atk-vin02a1:177_3: tādisesu senāsanesu hatthesu vā gīvāya vā gahetvā antarā aṭṭhapento ekena payogena atikkāmeti,
atk-vin02a1:177_5: Ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā nānāpayogehi atikkāmentassa dvāragaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
atk-vin02a1:177_6: Hatthena anāmasitvā “nikkhamā”ti vatvā vācāya nikkaḍḍhantassāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:178_0: Aññaṃ āṇāpetīti ettha “imaṃ nikkaḍḍhā”ti āṇattimatte dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:178_1: Sace so sakiṃ āṇatto bahukepi dvāre atikkāmeti,
atk-vin02a1:178_3: Sace pana “ettakāni dvārāni nikkaḍḍhāhī”ti vā “yāva mahādvāraṃ tāva nikkaḍḍhāhī”ti vā evaṃ niyāmetvā āṇatto hoti,
atk-vin02a1:179_4: Gāḷhaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitesu pana ekāva āpattīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:180_1: Aññassa puggaliketi idhāpi vissāsikapuggalikaṃ attano puggalikasadisameva.
atk-vin02a1:181_1: Alajjiṃ nikkaḍḍhati vātiādīsu bhaṇḍanakārakakalahakārakameva sakalasaṅghārāmato nikkaḍḍhituṃ labhati,
atk-vin02a1:181_2: so hi pakkhaṃ labhitvā saṅghampi bhindeyya.
atk-vin02a1:182_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:185_2: uparivehāsakuṭiyāti upari acchannatalāya dvibhūmikakuṭiyā vā tibhūmikādikuṭiyā vā.
atk-vin02a1:185_3: Mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdīti mañcaṃ sahasā abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā nisīdi.
atk-vin02a1:185_8: Tassa hi upari āṇīpi na dinnā,
atk-vin02a1:186_1: Vehāsakuṭi nāma majjhimassa purisassa asīsaghaṭṭāti yā pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa sabbaheṭṭhimāhi tulāhi sīsaṃ na ghaṭṭeti,
atk-vin02a1:186_2: etena idha adhippetā vehāsakuṭi dassitā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:186_4: Yā hi kāci upari acchinnatalā dvibhūmikā kuṭi tibhūmikādikuṭi vā “vehāsakuṭī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:186_6: Abhinisīdanādīsu pubbe vuttanayeneva payogavasena āpattibhedo veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:187_2: Na hi sakkā tattha parassa pīḷā kātuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:187_5: Na hi sakkā tattha heṭṭhāpāsāde anoṇatena vicarituṃ,
atk-vin02a1:187_7: Heṭṭhā aparibhogaṃ hotīti yassā heṭṭhā dabbasambhārādīnaṃ nikkhittattā aparibhogaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:187_9: Padarasañcitaṃ hotīti yassā uparimatalaṃ dāruphalakehi vā ghanasanthataṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:187_11: Paṭāṇi dinnā hotīti mañcapīṭhānaṃ pādasikhāsu āṇī dinnā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:187_14: Tasmiṃ ṭhitoti āhaccapādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā ṭhito upari nāgadantakādīsu laggitakaṃ cīvaraṃ vā kiñci vā gaṇhāti vā,
atk-vin02a1:187_19: kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:190_2: yāva dvārakosāti ettha dvārakoso nāma piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa samantā kavāṭavitthārappamāṇo okāso.
atk-vin02a1:190_3: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “dvārabāhato paṭṭhāya diyaḍḍho hattho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:190_5: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kavāṭaṃ nāma diyaḍḍhahatthampi hoti dvihatthampi aḍḍhateyyahatthampī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:190_7: Tadeva hi sandhāya bhagavatāpi “piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa samantā hatthapāsā”ti ayaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddeso kato.
atk-vin02a1:190_10: Dvāraṭṭhapanāyāti idampi hi padabhājanaṃ imamevatthaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:190_16: calitvā sithilā vā hoti patati vā.
atk-vin02a1:190_18: Tattha kiñcāpi “idaṃ nāma kattabba”nti neva mātikāyaṃ na padabhājane vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:190_19: aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ pana “punappunaṃ chādāpesi punappunaṃ lepāpesī”ti adhikārato yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya
atk-vin02a1:190_20: punappunaṃ limpitabbo vā lepāpetabbo vāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:191_0: Yaṃ pana padabhājane “piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa samantā hatthapāsā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:191_3: tassa tīsu disāsu samantā hatthapāsā upacāro hoti,
atk-vin02a1:191_4: khuddakassa vihārassa dvīsu disāsu upacāro hoti.
atk-vin02a1:191_5: Tatrāpi yaṃ bhittiṃ vivariyamānaṃ kavāṭaṃ āhanati,
atk-vin02a1:191_7: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena pana tīsu disāsu samantā hatthapāsā dvārassa niccalabhāvatthāya lepo anuññāto.
atk-vin02a1:191_8: Sace panassa dvārassa adhobhāgepi lepokāso atthi,
atk-vin02a1:191_11: tepi vivaraṇakāle vidatthimattampi atirekampi bhittippadesaṃ paharanti.
atk-vin02a1:191_13: tasmā sabbadisāsu kavāṭavitthārappamāṇo okāso ālokasandhiparikammatthāya limpitabbo vā lepāpetabbo vāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:192_1: Iminā hi vihārassa bhārikattaṃ nāma natthīti padabhājaneyeva anuññātaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:193_1: taṃ dassetvā puna chadane kattabbaṃ dassetuṃ “dvatticchadanassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:193_4: parikkhepadvayaṃ vā parikkhepattayaṃ vā adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a1:193_6: Haritanti cettha sattadhaññabhedaṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ muggamāsatilakulatthaalābukumbhaṇḍādibhedañca aparaṇṇaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:194_1: āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha pana yasmimpi khette vuttaṃ bījaṃ na tāva sampajjati,
atk-vin02a1:194_4: Tasmā evarūpe khettepi ṭhitena na adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:194_7: piṭṭhivaṃsassa vā kūṭāgārakaṇṇikāya vā upari thupikāya vā passe nisinno chadanamukhavaṭṭiantena olokento yasmiṃ bhūmibhāge ṭhitaṃ passati,
atk-vin02a1:194_11: Tassa anto aharitepi ṭhatvā adhiṭṭhātuṃ na labbhati. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:195_1: Maggena chādentassāti ettha maggena chādanaṃ nāma aparikkhipitvā ujukameva chādanaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:195_3: Dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvāti dve maggā sace ducchannā honti,
atk-vin02a1:195_6: tathā dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṃmaggaṃ “idāni evaṃ chādehī”ti āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:195_9: Tasmā idhāpi yathā icchati tathā dve pariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṃ pariyāyaṃ “idāni evaṃ chādehī”ti āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:195_13: Uparūparicchanno hi vihāro ciraṃ anovassako hotīti maññamānā evaṃ chādenti.
atk-vin02a1:195_14: Tato ce uttarinti tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vā pariyāyānaṃ vā upari catutthe magge vā pariyāye vā.
atk-vin02a1:199_2: jānaṃ sappāṇakanti sappāṇakaṃ etanti yathā tathā vā jānanto.
atk-vin02a1:199_3: Siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vāti tena udakena sayaṃ vā siñceyya,
atk-vin02a1:199_5: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “siñceyyāti sayaṃ siñcatī”ti īdisānaṃ vacanānaṃ attho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:200_0: Tattha dhāraṃ avicchinditvā siñcantassa ekasmiṃ udakaghaṭe ekāva āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:200_2: Dhāraṃ vicchindantassa pana payoge payoge āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:200_6: Sace tattha tattha bandhitvā aññato aññato neti,
atk-vin02a1:200_10: Ekekaṃ tiṇaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā pakkhipantassa payoge payoge āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:200_12: Idaṃ pana mahāudakaṃ sandhāya na vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:200_13: yaṃ tiṇe vā mattikāya vā pakkhittāya pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:201_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:206_2: lābhino hontīti ettha na tesaṃ bhikkhuniyo denti,
atk-vin02a1:206_4: mahākulehi pabbajitā pana kuladhītaro attano santikaṃ āgatānaṃ ñātimanussānaṃ “kuto ayye ovādaṃ uddesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:206_5: paripucchaṃ labhathā”ti pucchantānaṃ “asuko ca asuko ca thero ovadatī”ti asītimahāsāvake uddisitvā kathānusārena
atk-vin02a1:206_8: Tato pasannacittā manussā therānaṃ cīvarādibhedaṃ mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ abhihariṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:207_0: Bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvāti tesaṃ kira santike tāsu ekā bhikkhunīpi na āgacchati,
atk-vin02a1:207_1: lābhataṇhāya pana ākaḍḍhiyamānahadayā tāsaṃ upassayaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:207_4: Tāpi bhikkhuniyo calacittatāya tesaṃ vacanaṃ akaṃsuyeva.
atk-vin02a1:208_1: Anujānāmi bhikkhaveti ettha yasmā te bhikkhū “mā tumhe bhikkhave bhikkhuniyo ovaditthā”ti vuccamānā adiṭṭhasaccattā
atk-vin02a1:208_3: tasmā nesaṃ taṃ apāyupagataṃ pariharanto bhagavā aññeneva upāyena te bhikkhunovādato paribāhire kattukāmo
atk-vin02a1:208_5: Evaṃ idha paribāhire kattukāmatāya anujānitvā parato karontova “anujānāmi bhikkhave aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgata”ntiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:208_6: Imāni hi aṭṭhaṅgāni chabbaggiyānaṃ supinantenapi na bhūtapubbānīti.
atk-vin02a1:209_2: yathā ca taṃ tassa atthi nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:211_0: “Pātimokkhanti sīlaṃ patiṭṭhā ādi caraṇaṃ saṃyamo saṃvaro mokkhaṃ pamokkhaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā;
atk-vin02a1:211_1: saṃvaroti kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo.
atk-vin02a1:211_2: Saṃvutoti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno sampanno samannāgato,
atk-vin02a1:211_4: Viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati,
atk-vin02a1:212_1: vesiyādiagocaraṃ pahāya saddhāsampannakulādinā ca gocarena sampanno.
atk-vin02a1:212_2: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti appamattakesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
atk-vin02a1:212_3: tāni vajjāni bhayato dassanasīloti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:212_4: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti adhisīlasikkhādibhāvena tidhā ṭhitesu sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin02a1:212_5: samādāya sammā ādāya sādhukaṃ gahetvā avijahanto sikkhatīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:213_5: Mañjūsāyaṃ viya ratanaṃ sutaṃ sannicitamasminti sutasannicayo.
atk-vin02a1:213_7: tassa mañjūsāya gopetvā sannicitaratanasseva cirakālenāpi avināsanaṃ dasseti.
atk-vin02a1:213_8: Idāni taṃ sutaṃ sarūpato dassento “ye te dhammā”tiādimāha,
atk-vin02a1:213_17: Tattha vacasā paricitāti vācāya paguṇā katā.
atk-vin02a1:213_20: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suṭṭhu paṭividdhā supaccakkhakatā honti.
atk-vin02a1:214_0: Ayaṃ pana bahussuto nāma tividho hoti –
atk-vin02a1:214_4: Tattha nissayamuccanakena upasampadāya pañcavassena sabbantimena paricchedena dve mātikā paguṇā vācuggatā
atk-vin02a1:214_5: kātabbā pakkhadivasesu dhammasāvanatthāya suttantato cattāro bhāṇavārā,
atk-vin02a1:214_9: samaṇadhammakaraṇatthaṃ samādhivasena vā vipassanāvasena vā arahattapariyosānamekaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:214_11: Ettāvatā hi ayaṃ bahussuto hoti cātuddiso,
atk-vin02a1:214_12: yattha katthaci attano issariyena vasituṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a1:215_0: Parisupaṭṭhāpakena upasampadāya dasavassena sabbantimena paricchedena parisaṃ abhivinaye vinetuṃ dve vibhaṅgā paguṇā vācuggatā kātabbā,
atk-vin02a1:215_1: asakkontena tīhi janehi saddhiṃ parivattanakkhamā kātabbā,
atk-vin02a1:215_3: Parisāya pana abhidhamme vinayanatthaṃ sace majjhimabhāṇako hoti mūlapaṇṇāsako uggahetabbo,
atk-vin02a1:215_5: saṃyuttabhāṇakena heṭṭhimā vā tayo vaggā mahāvaggo vā,
atk-vin02a1:215_6: aṅguttarabhāṇakena heṭṭhā vā upari vā upaḍḍhanikāyo uggahetabbo,
atk-vin02a1:215_7: asakkontena tikanipātato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā uggahetumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:215_8: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “ekaṃ uggaṇhantena catukkanipātaṃ vā pañcakanipātaṃ vā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:215_11: Dhammapadampi saha vatthunā uggahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:215_12: Tato tato samuccayaṃ katvā mūlapaṇṇāsakamattaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:215_17: Yassa pana sāṭṭhakathampi vinayapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakañca paguṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:215_20: Yena pana suttantato vinayato ca vuttappamāṇo gantho uggahito,
atk-vin02a1:215_21: ayaṃ parisupaṭṭhāpako bahussuto hoti disāpāmokkho yenakāmaṅgamo,
atk-vin02a1:216_0: Bhikkhunovādakena pana sāṭṭhakathāni tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetabbāni,
atk-vin02a1:216_1: asakkontena catūsu nikāyesu ekassa aṭṭhakathā paguṇā kātabbā,
atk-vin02a1:216_2: ekanikāyena hi sesanikāyesupi pañhaṃ kathetuṃ sakkhissati.
atk-vin02a1:216_3: Sattasu pakaraṇesu catuppakaraṇassa aṭṭhakathā paguṇā kātabbā,
atk-vin02a1:216_4: tattha laddhanayena hi sesapakaraṇesu pañhaṃ kathetuṃ sakkhissati.
atk-vin02a1:216_6: tasmā taṃ saddhiṃ aṭṭhakathāya paguṇaṃ kātabbameva.
atk-vin02a1:216_7: Ettāvatā hi bhikkhunovādako bahussuto nāma hotīti.
atk-vin02a1:217_0: Ubhayāni kho panassātiādi pana yasmā aññasmiṃ sakale navaṅgepi bāhussacce sati sāṭṭhakathaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ vinā na vaṭṭatiyeva,
atk-vin02a1:217_8: Suvinicchitāni suttasoti khandhakaparivārato āharitabbasuttavasena suṭṭhu vinicchitāni.
atk-vin02a1:217_9: Anubyañjanasoti akkharapadapāripūriyā ca suvinicchitāni akhaṇḍāni aviparītakkharāni.
atk-vin02a1:218_0: Kalyāṇavācoti sithiladhanitādīnaṃ yathāvidhānavacanena parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāya poriyā vācāya samannāgato
atk-vin02a1:218_5: Yebhuyyena bhikkhunīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpoti sabbāsaṃ piyo nāma dullabho,
atk-vin02a1:218_6: bahutarānaṃ pana paṇḍitānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ sīlācārasampattiyā piyo hoti manavaḍḍhanako.
atk-vin02a1:218_7: Paṭibalo hoti bhikkhuniyo ovaditunti suttañca kāraṇañca dassento vaṭṭabhayena tajjetvā bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ tādisaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ samattho hoti.
atk-vin02a1:218_9: Garudhammanti gihikāle bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ vā sikkhamānāsāmaṇerīsu methunadhammaṃ vā anajjhāpannapubbo hoti.
atk-vin02a1:218_10: Mātugāmo hi pubbe katamanussaranto saṃvare ṭhitassāpi dhammadesanāya gāravaṃ na karoti.
atk-vin02a1:218_11: Atha vā tasmiyeva asaddhamme cittaṃ uppādeti.
atk-vin02a1:218_12: Vīsativasso vāti upasampadāya vīsativasso tato atirekavasso vā.
atk-vin02a1:218_13: Evarūpo hi visabhāgehi vatthūhi punappunaṃ samāgacchantopi daharo viya sahasā sīlavināsaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-vin02a1:218_14: attano vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā ayuttaṭṭhāne chandarāgaṃ vinetuṃ paṭibalo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:220_3: te hi gāravaṃ katvā bhikkhunīhi sampaṭicchitabbattā garudhammāti vuccanti.
atk-vin02a1:221_1: Pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvāti sace pāto asammaṭṭhaṃ sammaṭṭhampi vā puna tiṇapaṇṇādīhi uklāpaṃ pādappahārehi ca vikiṇṇavālikaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:221_3: Asammaṭṭhañhi taṃ disvā “ayyo attano nissitake daharabhikkhūpi vattapaṭipattiyaṃ na yojeti,
atk-vin02a1:221_4: dhammaṃyeva kathetī”ti tā bhikkhuniyo asotukāmā viya bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:221_7: Antogāmato pana bhikkhuniyo āgacchantiyo pipāsitā ca kilantā ca honti,
atk-vin02a1:221_9: tasmiñca asati purimanayeneva agāravaṃ janetvā asotukāmāpi honti.
atk-vin02a1:222_0: Āsananti nīcapīṭhakaphalakataṭṭikakaṭasārakādibhedaṃ antamaso sākhābhaṅgampi “idaṃ tāsaṃ āsanaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā.
atk-vin02a1:222_5: atha kho vihāramajjhe uposathāgārassa vā bhojanasālāya vā dvāre sabbesaṃ osaraṇaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:223_1: Ettha ca bhikkhuniyā bhikkhussa abhivādanaṃ nāma antogāme vā bahigāme vā antovihāre vā bahivihāre vā
atk-vin02a1:223_2: antaraghare vā rathikāya vā antamaso rājussāraṇāyapi vattamānāya deve vassamāne sakaddamāya bhūmiyā chattapattahatthāyapi
atk-vin02a1:223_4: Ekābaddhāya pāḷiyā bhikkhācāraṃ pavisante disvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne “vandāmi ayyā”ti vandituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:223_7: Mahāsannipāte nisinne ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne vandituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:223_9: Yattha katthaci nisinnāya pana paccuṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:223_10: tassa tassa sāmīcikammassa anurūpe padese ca kāle ca taṃ taṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:224_4: Pūjetvāti imesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ kiccānaṃ karaṇena pūjetvā.
atk-vin02a1:225_0: Abhikkhuke āvāseti ettha sace bhikkhunupassayato aḍḍhayojanabbhantare ovādadāyakā bhikkhū na vasanti,
atk-vin02a1:225_4: “abhikkhuko nāma āvāso na sakkā hoti ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā gantu”nti.
atk-vin02a1:225_5: Na ca sakkā tato paraṃ pacchābhattaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā āgantuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:225_6: Sace tattha vassaṃ vasituṃ anicchamānā bhikkhuniyo ñātakā vā upaṭṭhākā vā evaṃvadanti – “vasatha, ayye,
atk-vin02a1:225_8: Sace pana vuttappamāṇe padese vassaṃ upagantukāmā bhikkhū āgantvā sākhāmaṇḍapepi ekarattaṃ vutthā honti;
atk-vin02a1:225_12: Upagacchantīhi ca pakkhassa terasiyaṃyeva bhikkhū yācitabbā –
atk-vin02a1:225_14: Yato pana ujunā maggena aḍḍhayojane bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:225_15: tena pana maggena gacchantīnaṃ jīvitantarāyo vā brahmacariyantarāyo vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:225_18: Sace pana tato gāvutamatte añño bhikkhunupassayo khemaṭṭhāne hoti,
atk-vin02a1:225_19: tāhi bhikkhunīhi tā bhikkhuniyo yācitvā puna gantvā bhikkhū yācitabbā “ayyā amhākaṃ ujumagge antarāyo atthi,
atk-vin02a1:225_21: Antarāmagge pana amhākaṃ upassayato gāvutamatte añño bhikkhunupassayo atthi,
atk-vin02a1:225_24: Tato tāhi bhikkhunīhi taṃ bhikkhunupassayaṃ āgantvā uposatho kātabbo,
atk-vin02a1:225_25: tā vā bhikkhuniyo disvā attano upassayameva gantvā kātumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:226_0: Sace pana vassaṃ upagantukāmā bhikkhū cātuddase vihāraṃ āgacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:226_1: bhikkhunīhi ca “idha ayyā vassaṃ vasissathā”ti pucchitā “āmā”ti vatvā puna tāhi “tenahi ayyā mayampi
atk-vin02a1:226_2: tumhākaṃ ovādaṃ anujīvantiyo vasissāmā”ti vuttā dutiyadivase gāme bhikkhācārasampadaṃ apassantā “na sakkā
atk-vin02a1:226_4: Atha tā bhikkhuniyo uposathadivase vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhū na passanti,
atk-vin02a1:226_8: “Pacchimikāya vassaṃ upagantuṃ āgamissantī”ti vā ābhogaṃ katvā āgatānaṃ santike ovādena vasitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:226_9: Sace pana pacchimikāyapi na keci āgacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:226_10: antarāmagge ca rājabhayaṃ vā corabhayaṃ vā dubbhikkhaṃ vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:226_14: Āpadāsu hi abhikkhuke āvāse vasantiyā anāpatti vuttā.
atk-vin02a1:226_15: Sace āgantvā vassaṃ upagatā bhikkhū puna kenaci kāraṇena pakkamanti,
atk-vin02a1:226_18: “anāpatti vassūpagatā bhikkhū pakkantā vā honti vibbhantā vā kālaṅkatā vā pakkhasaṅkantā vā āpadāsu ummattikāya ādikammikāyā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:227_1: Dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbāti dve dhammā icchitabbā.
atk-vin02a1:227_3: tattha pannarasike uposathe pakkhassa cātuddasiyaṃ cātuddasike terasiyaṃ gantvā uposatho pucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:227_4: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “pakkhassa terasiyaṃyeva gantvā ‘ayaṃ uposatho cātuddasiko pannarasiko’ti pucchitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:227_7: Iti bhagavā aññassa kammassa okāsaṃ adatvā nirantaraṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike gamanameva paññapesi. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:227_12: tameva ayyā jānantī”ti mānaṃ akatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ payirūpāsamānā sātthikaṃ pabbajjaṃ karissanti,
atk-vin02a1:227_14: Bhikkhuniyopi “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjissāmā”ti sabbāyeva nirantaraṃ vihāraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:228_0: “Tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:228_1: Manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti ‘jāyāyo imā imesaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:228_9: Anujānāmi bhikkhave catūhi pañcahi bhikkhunīhi ovādaṃ gantu’nti.
atk-vin02a1:228_13: dve tisso bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ gantu”’nti āha.
atk-vin02a1:229_0: Tasmā bhikkhunisaṅghena dve tisso bhikkhuniyo yācitvā pesetabbā – “ethayye,
atk-vin02a1:229_5: Tato ovādapaṭiggāhakaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā so bhikkhu ekāya bhikkhuniyā evamassa vacanīyo “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya,
atk-vin02a1:229_9: Tena bhikkhunā pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo “bhikkhunisaṅgho bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandati,
atk-vin02a1:229_12: Pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbo “atthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato”ti.
atk-vin02a1:229_13: Sace hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato,
atk-vin02a1:230_0: Sace na hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato,
atk-vin02a1:230_3: Sace koci bhikkhu ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ,
atk-vin02a1:231_0: Sace pana koci na ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ,
atk-vin02a1:231_4: Ettāvatā hi sakalaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanamārocitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:231_5: Tena bhikkhunā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pāṭipade bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:231_8: Tāhi “sādhu ayye”ti sampaṭicchitvā ārāmaṃ gantvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vattabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:231_15: tāsu pana ekāya bhikkhuniyā vattabbañca sampaṭicchitabbañca,
atk-vin02a1:232_0: Sace pana bhikkhunisaṅgho vā bhikkhusaṅgho vā na pūrati,
atk-vin02a1:232_1: ubhayatopi vā gaṇamattameva puggalamattaṃ vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:232_2: ekā bhikkhunī vā bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi ovādatthāya pesitā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:235_0: “Bhikkhunisaṅgho ca ayya bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ayyānaṃ ayyassa pāde vandati vandanti vandati,
atk-vin02a1:235_2: labhatu kira labhantu kira labhatu kira ayya bhikkhunisaṅgho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī ca ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:238_1: bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī ca bhikkhusaṅghassa āyasmantānaṃ pāde vandati vandanti vandati,
atk-vin02a1:238_3: labhatu kira labhantu kira labhatu kira bhante bhikkhunisaṅgho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī ca ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:239_3: taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī ca upasaṅkamantu upasaṅkamatu upasaṅkamatūti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:239_5: pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṅgho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī ca sampādetu sampādentu sampādetūti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:240_1: Ovādaṃ pana bālagilānagamike ṭhapetvā añño sacepi āraññako hoti,
atk-vin02a1:241_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā bālaṃ ṭhapetvā gilānaṃ ṭhapetvā gamikaṃ avasesehi ovādaṃ gahetu”nti.
atk-vin02a1:242_0: Tattha yo cātuddasikapannarasikesu vā uposathesu pāṭipade vā gantukāmo,
atk-vin02a1:242_1: so gamiko dutiyapakkhadivase gacchantopi aggahetuṃ na labhati, “na,
atk-vin02a1:242_6: Ovādaṃ gahetvā ca uposathagge anārocetuṃ vā pāṭipade bhikkhunīnaṃ apaccāharituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:243_0: “Na, bhikkhave, ovādo na ārocetabbo. Yo na āroceyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:245_0: “Na, bhikkhave, ovādo na paccāharitabbo. Yo na paccāhareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:246_7: Tasmā āraññako bhikkhu sace bhikkhunīnaṃ vasanagāme bhikkhaṃ labhati,
atk-vin02a1:246_8: tattheva caritvā bhikkhuniyo disvā ārocetvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:246_9: No cassa tattha bhikkhā sulabhā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:246_10: sāmantagāme caritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ gāmaṃ āgamma tatheva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:246_13: “ahaṃ amukaṃ nāma tumhākaṃ gāmadvāre sabhaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā upasaṅkamissāmi,
atk-vin02a1:247_0: Ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbanti ettha bhikkhunīhi cātuddase attanā pavāretvā uposathe bhikkhusaṅghe pavāretabbaṃ.
