atk-vin02a1:248_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ajjatanāya pavāretvā aparajju bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretu”nti.
atk-vin02a1:249_0: Bhikkhunikhandhake vuttanayeneva cettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:250_0: “Tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisaṅgho pavārento kolāhalamakāsi.
atk-vin02a1:250_4: ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ byattaṃ paṭibalaṃ sammannituṃ bhikkhunisaṅghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:250_9: yācitvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
atk-vin02a1:251_3: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammanneyya bhikkhunisaṅghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:252_2: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammanneyya bhikkhunisaṅghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:252_3: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā sammuti bhikkhunisaṅghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:253_0: “Sammatā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī bhikkhunisaṅghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:254_0: Tāya sammatāya bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo –
atk-vin02a1:254_3: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā.
atk-vin02a1:255_2: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
atk-vin02a1:255_6: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
atk-vin02a1:255_7: vadatu maṃ ayya bhikkhusaṅgho anukampaṃ upādāya,
atk-vin02a1:255_8: passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:256_2: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
atk-vin02a1:256_6: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
atk-vin02a1:256_8: passanto paṭikarissatī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:257_1: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
atk-vin02a1:257_5: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
atk-vin02a1:257_9: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
atk-vin02a1:257_13: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
atk-vin02a1:257_15: passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:258_0: Mānattacaraṇañca upasampadāpariyesanā ca yathāṭhāneyeva āvi bhavissati.
atk-vin02a1:259_0: Na bhikkhuniyā kenaci pariyāyenāti dasahi vā akkosavatthūhi aññena vā kenaci pariyāyena bhikkhu neva akkositabbo,
atk-vin02a1:259_6: Tasmā bhikkhuniyā ādhipaccaṭṭhāne jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “evaṃ abhikkama,
atk-vin02a1:259_9: evaṃ pārupāhī”ti kenaci pariyāyena neva bhikkhu ovaditabbo,
atk-vin02a1:259_11: Dosaṃ pana disvā “pubbe mahātherā na evaṃ abhikkamanti,
atk-vin02a1:259_16: na evaṃ akkhīni añjentī”tiādinā nayena vijjamānadosaṃ dassetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:259_21: mā tilakammapaṇṇakammādīni karohī”ti yathāsukhaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ovadituṃ anusāsituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:260_0: Samaggamhayyāti bhaṇantanti “samaggā amha ayya” iti bhaṇantaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:260_1: Aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇatīti aññaṃ suttantaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā.
atk-vin02a1:260_3: tasmā ṭhapetvā ovādaṃ aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:260_4: Ovādaṃ aniyyādetvāti eso bhaginiyo ovādoti avatvā.
atk-vin02a1:261_2: Tattha adhammakamme dvinnaṃ navakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa pācittiyāni.
atk-vin02a1:262_1: Uddesaṃ dentoti aṭṭhannaṃ garudhammānaṃ pāḷiṃ uddisanto.
atk-vin02a1:262_2: Paripucchaṃ dentoti tassāyeva paguṇāya garudhammapāḷiyā aṭṭhakathaṃ kathentoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:262_3: Osārehi ayyāti vuccamāno osāretīti evaṃ vuccamāno aṭṭhagarudhammapāḷiṃ osāretīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:262_6: yo ca osārehīti vuccamāno aṭṭha garudhamme bhaṇati,
atk-vin02a1:262_10: pañhaṃ puṭṭho kathetīti bhikkhunī garudhammanissitaṃ vā khandhādinissitaṃ vā pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-vin02a1:262_13: Aññassatthāya bhaṇantanti catuparisatiṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo suṇanti,
atk-vin02a1:263_1: vācato ca vācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:266_7: appamādena kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sātaccakiriyāya samannāgatassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:266_9: muni tena pavuccatī”ti evaṃ ubhayalokamunanena vā,
atk-vin02a1:266_11: tena ñāṇena samannāgatattā vā khīṇāsavo muni nāma vuccati,
atk-vin02a1:266_13: Monapathesu sikkhatoti arahattañāṇasaṅkhātassa monassa pathesu sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammesu tīsu vā sikkhāsu sikkhato.
atk-vin02a1:266_15: tasmā evaṃ pubbabhāge sikkhato imāya sikkhāya munibhāvaṃ pattassa muninoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:266_16: Sokā na bhavanti tādinoti tādisassa khīṇāsavamunino abbhantare iṭṭhaviyogādivatthukā sokā na santi.
atk-vin02a1:266_17: Atha vā tādinoti tādilakkhaṇasamannāgatassa evarūpassa munino sokā na bhavantīti ayamettha attho.
atk-vin02a1:266_19: Sadā satīmatoti sativepullappattattā niccakālaṃ satiyā avirahitassa.
atk-vin02a1:266_23: Caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipīti tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “imā bhikkhuniyo maṃ ‘ettakameva ayaṃ jānātī’ti avamaññanti,
atk-vin02a1:266_24: handa dāni etāsaṃ attano ānubhāvaṃ dassemī”ti dhammabahumānaṃ uppādetvā abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:266_28: Tattha antaradhāyatipīti antaradhāyatipi adassanampi gacchatīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:266_29: Tañceva udānaṃ bhaṇati aññañca bahuṃ buddhavacananti thero kira attano bhātutherassa santike –
atk-vin02a1:271_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ uddisāpetvā cattāro māse sajjhāyi.
atk-vin02a1:271_2: Tato naṃ thero “abhabbo tvaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane”ti vihārā nikkaḍḍhāpesi,
atk-vin02a1:271_4: Atha bhagavā buddhacakkhunā veneyyasatte olokento taṃ disvā vihāracārikaṃ caramāno viya tassa santikaṃ gantvā “cūḷapanthaka,
atk-vin02a1:271_7: Athassa bhagavā suddhaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ datvā “idaṃ ‘rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa’nti parimajjāhī”ti āha.
atk-vin02a1:271_8: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā attano nivāsaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tassa ekamantaṃ parimajji,
atk-vin02a1:271_10: So “evaṃ parisuddhampi nāma vatthaṃ imaṃ attabhāvaṃ nissāya kāḷakaṃ jāta”nti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-vin02a1:271_11: Athassa bhagavā āraddhavīriyabhāvaṃ ñatvā “adhicetaso”ti imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-vin02a1:271_13: Tasmā thero pakatiyāva imaṃ gāthaṃ mamāyati,
atk-vin02a1:271_14: so taṃ imissā gāthāya mamāyanabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ taṃyeva bhaṇati.
atk-vin02a1:275_2: aññatra samayā ovadati āpatti pācittiyassātiādīsu aṭṭhahi garudhammehi ovadantasseva pācittiyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:278_1: asammato ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhahi garudhammehi ovadati,
atk-vin02a1:278_6: upassayaṃ gantvā aññena dhammena ovadanamūlakaṃ dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:278_8: Sammatassa atthaṅgate sūriye tattha gantvā aṭṭhahi garudhammehi ovadantassa ekā anāpatti,
atk-vin02a1:278_12: gantvā garudhammehi ovadanamūlakaṃ ekanti dve pācittiyāni.
atk-vin02a1:278_13: Tasseva aññena dhammena ovadato ekā anāpatti,
atk-vin02a1:278_19: Divā pana gantvā ovadato sammatassa ca asammatassa ca rattiṃ ovadanamūlakaṃ ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ apanetvā avasesā āpattānāpattiyo veditabbāti.
atk-vin02a1:281_3: na dhamme bahumānaṃ katvā ovadantīti adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:282_0: Upasampannaṃ saṅghena asammatanti ettha asammato nāma sammatena vā saṅghena vā bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:282_1: Anupasampannaṃ sammataṃ vā asammataṃ vāti ettha pana bhikkhukāle sammutiṃ labhitvā sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhito sammato,
atk-vin02a1:282_2: sammatena vā saṅghena vā ṭhapito bahussuto sāmaṇero asammatoti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:283_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:286_6: vinicchayato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhi.
atk-vin02a1:289_4: nipuṇo ceva samattho cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:289_7: so kira cīvaraṃ rajitvā tassa majjhe nānāvaṇṇehi vippakatamethunaṃ itthipurisarūpamakāsi.
atk-vin02a1:290_1: Cīvaranti yaṃ nivāsituṃ vā pārupituṃ vā sakkā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:290_3: Sayaṃ sibbatīti ettha sibbissāmīti vicārentassāpi chindantassāpi dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:290_5: Ārāpathe ārāpatheti sūciṃ pavesetvā pavesetvā nīharaṇe.
atk-vin02a1:290_6: Sace pana sakalasūciṃ anīharanto dīghasuttappavesanatthaṃ satakkhattumpi vijjhitvā nīharati,
atk-vin02a1:290_9: Bahukampi sibbatīti sacepi sabbaṃ sūcikammaṃ pariyosāpetvā cīvaraṃ niṭṭhāpeti,
atk-vin02a1:290_11: Atha pana “imasmiṃ cīvare kattabbakammaṃ tava bhāro”ti vutto karoti,
atk-vin02a1:291_0: Yepi sace ācariyupajjhāyesu attano ñātikānaṃ cīvaraṃ sibbantesu tesaṃ nissitakā “ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ vā kathinavattaṃ vā karomā”ti sibbanti,
atk-vin02a1:291_2: Ācariyupajjhāyā attano ñātikānaṃ cīvaraṃ antevāsikehi sibbāpenti,
atk-vin02a1:295_2: pacchā gacchantīnaṃ corā acchindiṃsūti pacchā gacchantīnaṃ pattacīvaraṃ corā hariṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:296_3: Kukkuṭasampādeti ettha yasmā gāmā nikkhamitvā kukkuṭo padasāva aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:296_12: tattha yassa gāmassa gehacchadanapiṭṭhito kukkuṭo uppatitvā aññassa gehacchadanapiṭṭhiyaṃ patati,
atk-vin02a1:296_15: Dvidhā vuttappakāropi cesa gāmo accāsanno hoti,
atk-vin02a1:296_17: Yasmiṃ pana gāme paccūse vassantassa kukkuṭassa saddo anantare gāme suyyati,
atk-vin02a1:296_18: tādisehi gāmehi sampuṇṇaraṭṭhe gāmantare gāmantare pācittiyanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:296_20: “gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vacanato pana sacepi ratanamattantaro gāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:297_1: saṃvidhānakāle hi sace ubhopi bhikkhunupassaye vā antarārāme vā āsanasālāya vā titthiyaseyyāya vā ṭhatvā saṃvidahanti,
atk-vin02a1:297_3: Tasmā ettha saṃvidahanapaccayā dukkaṭāpattiṃ na vadanti,
atk-vin02a1:297_5: Sace pana antogāme bhikkhunupassayadvāre rathikāya aññesu vā catukkasiṅghāṭakahatthisālādīsu saṃvidahanti,
atk-vin02a1:297_12: Gāmato nikkhamitvā pana yāva anantaragāmassa upacāraṃ na okkamanti,
atk-vin02a1:297_17: tassa tassa pana gāmassa atikkamane anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:297_18: Sace pana bhikkhunī “asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti upassayato nikkhamati,
atk-vin02a1:297_19: bhikkhupi tameva gāmaṃ sandhāya “asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti vihārato nikkhamati.
atk-vin02a1:297_20: Atha dvepi gāmadvāre samāgantvā “tumhe kuhiṃ gacchatha,
atk-vin02a1:297_25: Taṃ neva pāḷiyā na sesaaṭṭhakathāya sameti.
atk-vin02a1:298_0: Addhayojane addhayojaneti ekamekaṃ addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassa idāni atikkamissatīti paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:299_1: Bhikkhu saṃvidahatīti nagaradvāre vā rathikāya vā bhikkhuniṃ disvā “asukaṃ gāmaṃ nāma gatapubbatthā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:299_2: “nāmhi ayya gatapubbā”ti “ehi gacchāmā”ti vā “sve ahaṃ gamissāmi,
atk-vin02a1:299_4: Bhikkhunī saṃvidahatīti gāmantare cetiyavandanatthaṃ gāmato nikkhamantaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “ayya kuhiṃ gacchathā”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a1:300_1: Visaṅketenāti ettha “purebhattaṃ gacchissāmā”ti vatvā pacchābhattaṃ gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:300_4: dvāravisaṅkete pana maggavisaṅkete vā satipi āpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:300_5: Āpadāsūti raṭṭhabhede cakkasamāruḷhā janapadā pariyāyanti evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:301_1: kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:304_4: Yasmā pana yo uddhaṃ javanato ujjavanikāya nāvāya kīḷati,
atk-vin02a1:304_8: Yasmā pana yo adho javanato ojavanikāya nāvāya kīḷati,
atk-vin02a1:304_11: Tattha yaṃ titthasampaṭipādanatthaṃ uddhaṃ vā adho vā haranti,
atk-vin02a1:305_1: Gāmantare gāmantareti ettha yassā nadiyā ekaṃ tīraṃ kukkuṭasampādagāmehi nirantaraṃ,
atk-vin02a1:305_6: tassā majjhena gamanepi addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyāni veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a1:305_7: Anāpatti tiriyaṃ taraṇāyāti ettha na kevalaṃ nadiyā,
atk-vin02a1:305_8: yopi mahātitthapaṭṭanato tāmalittiṃ vā suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ vā gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:306_2: titthavisaṅketena pana nāvāvisaṅketena vā gacchantassa āpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:309_4: Atha vā mahānāge tiṭṭhamāne “adisvā”ti ayamettha pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:309_6: Antarākathāti avasānaṃ appatvā ārambhassa ca avasānassa ca vemajjhaṭṭhānaṃ pattakathā.
atk-vin02a1:309_8: Saccaṃ mahānāgā kho tayā gahapatīti addhacchikena olokayamānā there pavisante disvā tehi sutabhāvaṃ ñatvā evamāha.
atk-vin02a1:310_4: Padabhājane panassa bhikkhuniñca tassā paripācanākārañca dassetuṃ “bhikkhunī nāma ubhatosaṅghe upasampannā,
atk-vin02a1:310_10: Bhikkhuniyā paripācanato paṭhamameva yaṃ gihīnaṃ paṭiyāditaṃ bhattaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:310_11: tato aññatra taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhuñjantassa āpatti,
atk-vin02a1:310_12: taṃ pana bhuñjantassa anāpattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:310_13: Padabhājane pana yasmā ñātakapavāritehi bhikkhussatthāya asamāraddhopi piṇḍapāto atthato samāraddhova hoti,
atk-vin02a1:310_15: tasmā byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā atthameva dassetuṃ “gihisamārambho nāma ñātakā vā honti pavāritā vā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:311_1: Pakatipaṭiyattanti pakatiyā tasseva bhikkhuno atthāya paṭiyāditaṃ hoti “therassa dassāmā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:311_2: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “tassa aññassā”ti avatvā “bhikkhūnaṃ dassāmāti paṭiyattaṃ hotī”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:312_1: Pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattīti yāgukhajjakaphalāphale sabbattha bhikkhuniparipācitepi anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:315_2: sabbo pāḷiattho ca vinicchayo ca dutiyaaniyate vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:315_3: Idañhi sikkhāpadaṃ dutiyāniyatena ca upari upanandhassa catutthasikkhāpadena ca saddhiṃ ekaparicchedaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:320_3: Samantā parikkhittaṃ addhikagilānagabbhinipabbajitānaṃ yathānurūpaṃ paññattamañcapīṭhaṃ anekagabbhapamukhaparicchedaṃ
atk-vin02a1:320_4: āvasathaṃ katvā tattha puññakāmatāya piṇḍo paññatto hoti,
atk-vin02a1:320_5: yāgubhattabhesajjādi sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dānatthāya ṭhapitaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:320_8: Manussā ujjhāyantīti titthiye apassantā “titthiyā kuhiṃ gatā”“ime passitvā pakkantā”ti sutvā ujjhāyanti.
atk-vin02a1:321_1: Sakkoti tamhā āvasathā pakkamitunti addhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā gantuṃ sakkoti.
atk-vin02a1:321_3: Anodissāti imesaṃyeva vā ettakānaṃyeva vāti ekaṃ pāsaṇḍaṃ anuddisitvā sabbesaṃ paññatto hoti.
atk-vin02a1:321_4: Yāvadatthoti bhojanampi ettakanti aparicchinditvā yāvadattho paññatto hoti.
atk-vin02a1:322_1: ekakulena vā nānākulehi vā ekato hutvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vā nānāṭhānesu vā “ajja ekasmiṃ;
atk-vin02a1:322_2: sve ekasmi”nti evaṃ aniyamitaṭṭhāne vā paññattaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitvā dutiyadivase tasmiṃ ṭhāne aññasmiṃ vā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:322_3: Nānākulehi pana nānāṭhānesu paññattaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitvā dutiyadivase aññattha bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:322_4: Paṭipāṭiṃ pana khepetvā puna ādito paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:322_6: Yopi ekakulassa vā nānākulānaṃ vā ekato paññatto taṇḍulādīnaṃ abhāvena antarantarā chijjati,
atk-vin02a1:322_8: Sace pana “na sakkoma dātu”nti upacchinditvā puna kalyāṇacitte uppanne dātuṃ ārabhanti,
atk-vin02a1:322_9: etaṃ puna ekadivasaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:323_1: Anāpatti gilānassāti gilānassa anuvasitvā bhuñjantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:323_2: Gacchanto vāti yo gacchanto antarāmagge ekadivasaṃ gataṭṭhāne ca ekadivasaṃ bhuñjati,
atk-vin02a1:323_5: Gantvā paccāgacchantopi antarāmagge ekadivasaṃ āgataṭṭhāne ca ekadivasaṃ bhuñjituṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a1:323_6: Gacchissāmīti bhuñjitvā nikkhantassa nadī vā pūrati corādibhayaṃ vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:323_7: so nivattitvā khemabhāvaṃ ñatvā gacchanto puna ekadivasaṃ bhuñjituṃ labhatīti sabbamidaṃ mahāpaccariyādīsu vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:323_8: Odissa paññatto hotīti bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāya uddisitvā paññatto hoti.
atk-vin02a1:323_9: Na yāvadatthoti yāvadatthaṃ paññatto na hoti,
atk-vin02a1:323_12: Pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbatthāti yāgukhajjakaphalāphalādibhede sabbattha anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:323_16: kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:326_2: parihīnalābhasakkāroti so kira ajātasattunā rājānaṃ mārāpetvāpi abhimāre yojetvāpi ruhiruppādaṃ katvāpi guḷhapaṭicchanno ahosi.
atk-vin02a1:326_5: “Kathaṃ devadatto hatthiṃ payojesī”ti parikathāya uppannāya “na kevalaṃ hatthiṃ payojesi,
atk-vin02a1:326_10: “Kena saddhiṃ idaṃ kammamakāsī”ti ca vutte “raññā ajātasattunā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:326_11: Tato nāgarā “kathañhi nāma rājā evarūpaṃ coraṃ sāsanakaṇṭakaṃ gahetvā vicarissatī”ti uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:326_15: aññepissa manussā na kiñci dātabbaṃ vā kātabbaṃ vā maññiṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:326_18: Kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjatīti “mā me gaṇo bhijjī”ti parisaṃ posento “tvaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno bhattaṃ dehi,
atk-vin02a1:326_19: tvaṃ dvinna”nti evaṃ viññāpetvā sapariso kulesu bhuñjati.
atk-vin02a1:327_0: 211. Cīvaraṃ parittaṃ uppajjatīti bhattaṃ agaṇhantānaṃ cīvaraṃ na denti, tasmā parittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-vin02a1:328_1: Cīvarakārake bhikkhū bhattena nimantentīti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā cirena cīvaraṃ niṭṭhāpente disvā “evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:328_2: lahuṃ niṭṭhāpetvā cīvaraṃ paribhuñjissantī”ti puññakāmatāya nimantenti.
atk-vin02a1:329_0: 215. Nānāverajjaketi nānāvidhehi aññarajjehi āgate. “Nānāvirajjake”tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho.
atk-vin02a1:330_2: Idha ca gaṇo nāma cattāro bhikkhū ādiṃ katvā tatuttariṃ bhikkhū adhippetā,
atk-vin02a1:330_3: teneva sabbantimaṃ paricchedaṃ dassento āha “yattha cattāro bhikkhū…pe…
atk-vin02a1:330_5: Taṃ panetaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhākārehi pasavati nimantanato vā viññattito vā.
atk-vin02a1:330_9: odanaṃ me gaṇhatha ākaṅkhatha oloketha adhivāsetha paṭimānethā”ti evaṃ yena kenaci vevacanena vā bhāsantarena
atk-vin02a1:330_10: vā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā nimanteti.
atk-vin02a1:330_11: Evaṃ ekato nimantitā paricchinnakālavasena ajjatanāya vā svātanāya vā ekato gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:330_16: Ekato nimantitā ekato vā nānato vā gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:330_21: Ekato nimantitā ekato vā nānato vā gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:330_23: ekato vā nānato vā bhuñjanti, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:330_24: Cattāri pariveṇāni vā vihāre vā gantvā nānato nimantitā ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitesuyeva vā eko puttena eko pitarāti
atk-vin02a1:330_25: evampi nānato nimantitā ekato vā nānato vā gacchantu,
atk-vin02a1:331_1: Cattāro bhikkhū ekato ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā upāsakaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehī”ti vā viññāpeyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:331_3: mayhaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ ekato vā nānato vā viññāpetvā ekato vā gacchantu nānato vā,
atk-vin02a1:331_4: bhattaṃ gahetvāpi ekato vā bhuñjantu nānato vā,
atk-vin02a1:332_0: Pādāpi phalitāti yathā mahācammassa parato maṃsaṃ dissati;
atk-vin02a1:332_2: vālikāya vā sakkharāya vā pahaṭamatte dukkhaṃ uppādenti,
atk-vin02a1:332_3: na sakkā hoti antogāme piṇḍāya carituṃ.
atk-vin02a1:333_0: Cīvare kayiramāneti yadā sāṭakañca suttañca labhitvā cīvaraṃ karonti tadā;
atk-vin02a1:333_2: Tasmā yo tattha cīvare kattabbaṃ yaṃkiñci kammaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a1:333_17: Yo pana samīpe nisinno jātakaṃ vā dhammapadaṃ vā katheti,
atk-vin02a1:334_8: abhiruḷhena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvāpi yāva na orohati tāva bhuñjitabbanti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:334_12: Yattha pana sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā sannipatanti,
atk-vin02a1:334_15: Yo koci paribbājakasamāpannoti sahadhammikesu vā titthiyesu vā aññataro,
atk-vin02a1:334_16: etesañhi yena kenaci kate bhatte “samaṇabhattasamayo”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:335_1: Anāpatti samayeti sattasu samayesu aññatarasmiṃ anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:335_2: Dve tayo ekatoti yepi akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā dve vā tayo vā ekato gahetvā bhuñjanti,
atk-vin02a1:336_4: gilānacatutthanti pañcannaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena vinicchayo veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin02a1:336_10: So aññaṃ taṅkhaṇappattaṃ kañci “ehi bhante”ti pavesetvā catunnampi bhattaṃ deti,
atk-vin02a1:336_13: Tayo eva hi tattha nimantitā gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-vin02a1:337_3: Gamanavelāya pana “ehi bhante”ti vutte anadhivāsitattā anāgacchantampi “etha bhikkhaṃ lacchathā”ti gahetvā gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:338_0: Anupasampannacatutthe – sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ nimantitā honti, sopi gaṇaṃ bhindati.
atk-vin02a1:339_0: Pattacatutthe – eko sayaṃ agantvā pattaṃ peseti; evampi gaṇo bhijjati. Tasmā sabbesaṃ anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:341_3: Sace pana adhivāsetvā gatesupi catūsu janesu eko paṇḍito bhikkhu “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ gaṇaṃ bhindissāmi,
atk-vin02a1:341_4: nimantanaṃ sādiyathā”ti vatvā yāgukhajjakāvasāne bhattatthāya pattaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ adatvā “ime tāva bhikkhū bhojetvā vissajjetha,
atk-vin02a1:341_5: ahaṃ pacchā anumodanaṃ katvā gamissāmī”ti nisinno.
atk-vin02a1:341_6: Tesu bhutvā gatesu “detha bhante patta”nti upāsakena pattaṃ gahetvā bhatte dinne bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:341_8: Pañcannañhi bhojanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇabhojane visaṅketaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a1:341_9: Odanena nimantitā kummāsaṃ gaṇhantāpi āpattiṃ āpajjanti.
atk-vin02a1:341_10: Tāni ca tehi ekato na gahitāni.
atk-vin02a1:341_13: Evaṃ eko paṇḍito aññesampi anāpattiṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a1:342_0: Tasmā sace koci saṅghabhattaṃ kattukāmena nimantanatthāya pesito vihāraṃ āgamma “bhante,
atk-vin02a1:342_1: sve amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti avatvā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā “saṅghabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā “saṅgho bhattaṃ gaṇhātū”ti vā vadati,
atk-vin02a1:342_3: nemantanikā gaṇabhojanato piṇḍapātikā ca dhutaṅgabhedato mocetabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin02a1:342_9: Evaṃ yāva addhamāsampi haritvā puna vattabbo –
atk-vin02a1:342_12: tato “imaṃ tāva upāsaka pupphaṃ kappiyaṃ karohi,
atk-vin02a1:342_13: imaṃ tiṇa”nti evaṃ vikkhepaṃ katvā puna “kiṃ kathayitthā”ti pucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:342_15: tvaṃ piṇḍapātike vā mahāthere vā na lacchasi,
atk-vin02a1:342_17: bhante asukasmiñca asukasmiñca gāme bhadante bhojesuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:342_18: ahaṃ kasmā na labhāmī”ti ca vutte “te nimantetuṃ jānanti,
atk-vin02a1:342_28: asukasmiñca asukasmiñca gāme sakalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhojesuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:342_46: Dutiyadivase cetiyavattaṃ katvā ṭhitā bhikkhū saṅghattherena vattabbā – “āvuso,
atk-vin02a1:342_52: Tesu pattāni gahetvā nisīdāpetvā bhojentesu bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:342_53: Sace āsanasālāya bhattaṃ ṭhapetvā rathikāsu āhiṇḍantā ārocenti –
atk-vin02a1:343_0: Atha pana bhattaṃ ādāya tattha tattha gantvā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti,
atk-vin02a1:343_1: paṭikacceva vā vihāraṃ abhiharitvā patirūpe ṭhāne ṭhapetvā āgatāgatānaṃ denti,
atk-vin02a1:343_3: Sace pana bhattasālāya dānaṃ sajjetvā taṃ taṃ pariveṇaṃ pahiṇanti “bhattasālāya bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti,
atk-vin02a1:343_5: Ye pana manussā piṇḍacārike bhikkhū disvā āsanasālaṃ sammajjitvā tattha nisīdāpetvā bhojenti,
atk-vin02a1:343_7: Ye pana gāme bhikkhaṃ alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamante bhikkhū disvā “bhante bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti,
atk-vin02a1:343_16: gehe ca gāme ca bhattaṃ nāma yassa kassaci hotīti nivattituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:343_20: Āsanasālato piṇḍāya carituṃ nikkhamante disvā “nisīdatha bhante bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:347_4: yena niyāmena ime manussā sakkaccaṃ bhattaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a1:347_6: “idaṃ sāsanaṃ idaṃ vā buddhappamukhe saṅghe dānaṃ na kho orakaṃ bhavissati,
atk-vin02a1:347_10: So kira issaro adhipati māsautusaṃvaccharaniyāmena vetanaṃ datvā kammakārake kammaṃ kāreti.
atk-vin02a1:349_1: Mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ itthannāmassa dammīti ayaṃ bhattavikappanā nāma sammukhāpi parammukhāpi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:349_3: adisvā pañcasu sahadhammikesu “itthannāmassa vikappemī”ti vatvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:349_7: Bhagavati hi gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnepi saṅghamajjhe nisinnepi saṅghena gaṇappahonake bhikkhū gahetvā taṃ taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sukatameva hoti,
atk-vin02a1:350_1: Dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjatīti dve tīṇi nimantanāni ekapatte pakkhipitvā missetvā ekaṃ katvā bhuñjatīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:350_2: Dve tīṇi kulāni nimantetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīdāpetvā ito cito ca āharitvā bhattaṃ ākiranti,
atk-vin02a1:350_9: Hatthaṃ pana anto pavesetvā paṭhamanimantanato ekampi kabaḷaṃ uddharitvā bhuttakālato paṭṭhāya yathā tathā vā bhuñjantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:350_10: Sacepi tattha khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā ākiranti,
atk-vin02a1:350_12: koṭito paṭṭhāya bhuñjantassa anāpattīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:350_14: “khīrabhattaṃ vā rasabhattaṃ vā labhitvā nisinnassa tattheva aññepi khīrabhattaṃ vā rasabhattaṃ vā ākiranti,
atk-vin02a1:350_15: khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā pivato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:350_16: Bhuñjantena pana paṭhamaṃ laddhamaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ vā bhattapiṇḍaṃ vā mukhe pakkhipitvā koṭito paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:351_1: tassa kulaṃ upagatassa upāsakopi tassa puttadārabhātikabhaginiādayopi attano attano koṭṭhāsaṃ āharitvā patte pakkhipanti,
atk-vin02a1:351_2: upāsakena paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ abhuñjitvā pacchā laddhaṃ bhuñjantassa “anāpattī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:351_6: tattha pacchā āhaṭaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:351_7: Yadi pana sabbesaṃ ekova pāko hoti,
atk-vin02a1:351_13: Nanu upāsaka tayā nimantitamhāti! Hotu bhante,
atk-vin02a1:351_16: Aññena āharitvā bhatte dinne āpucchitvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:352_0: Anumodanaṃ katvā gacchantaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmā “svepi bhante āgaccheyyāthā”ti sabbe nimantenti,
atk-vin02a1:352_1: punadivase āgantvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:352_3: Eko bhikkhu piṇḍāya caranto bhattaṃ labhati,
atk-vin02a1:352_6: Sace so bhikkhu piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:352_7: Abhutvā nisinne “kiṃ bhante na bhuñjasī”ti vutte “tayā nimantitattā”ti vatvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjatha bhante”ti vutto bhuñjati, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:353_0: Sakalena gāmenāti sakalena gāmena ekato hutvā nimantitasseva yattha katthaci bhuñjato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:353_2: Nimantiyamāno bhikkhaṃ gahessāmīti bhaṇatīti “bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti nimantiyamāno “na mayhaṃ tava bhattenattho,
atk-vin02a1:353_5: “evaṃ vadanto imasmiṃ sikkhāpade animantanaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-vin02a1:353_6: bhuñjanatthāya pana okāso kato hotīti neva gaṇabhojanato na cārittato muccatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:353_9: tadaggena neva gaṇabhojanaṃ na cārittaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:357_12: Rittahatthaṃ gantunti rittā hatthā asmiṃ gamane tadidaṃ rittahatthaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:357_13: taṃ rittahatthaṃ gamanaṃ gantuṃ lajjanakaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:357_14: Parikkhayaṃ agamāsīti upāsikā ariyasāvikā bhikkhū disvā santaṃ adātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-vin02a1:357_17: Dhammiyā kathāyāti ettha kāṇāpi mātu atthāya desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantī desanāpariyosāne sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-vin02a1:357_19: Sopi puriso “satthā kira kāṇamātāya nivesanaṃ agamāsī”ti sutvā kāṇaṃ ānetvā pakatiṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapesi.
atk-vin02a1:358_1: Imasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ uppannamatte appaññatteyeva sikkhāpade pātheyyavatthu udapādi,
atk-vin02a1:358_2: tasmā anantarameva cetaṃ dassetuṃ “tena kho pana samayenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:358_3: Sopi ca upāsako ariyasāvakattā sabbameva dāpesi.
atk-vin02a1:359_1: Yaṃkiñci paheṇakatthāyāti paṇṇākāratthāya paṭiyattaṃ yaṃkiñci atirasakamodakasakkhalikādi sabbaṃ idha pūvotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:359_2: Yaṃkiñci pātheyyatthāyāti maggaṃ gacchantānaṃ antarāmaggatthāya paṭiyattaṃ yaṃkiñci baddhasattuabaddhasattutilataṇḍulādi
atk-vin02a1:359_4: Tato ce uttarinti sacepi tatiyaṃ pattaṃ thūpīkataṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:360_0: Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvāti mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhāya samapūre patte gahetvā.
atk-vin02a1:360_1: Amutra mayā dvattipattapūrāti ettha sace dve gahitā,
atk-vin02a1:360_4: Tenāpi aññaṃ passitvā “paṭhamaṃ āgatena dve pattapūrā gahitā, mayā eko,
atk-vin02a1:360_9: tena aññaṃ disvā “mā kho ettha paṭiggaṇhi” cceva vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:360_11: āsanasālaṃ gacchantena ca chaḍḍitasālā na gantabbā.
atk-vin02a1:360_14: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “yā laddhaṭṭhānato āsannā āsanasālā,
atk-vin02a1:360_16: Attano ‘sandiṭṭhānaṃ vā sambhattānaṃ vā ekanikāyikānaṃ vā dassāmī’ti aññattha gantuṃ na labbhati.
atk-vin02a1:361_1: ekaṃ attano ṭhapetvā dve bhikkhusaṅghassa dātabbā.
atk-vin02a1:361_3: ekaṃ attano ṭhapetvā eko saṅghassa dātabbo,
atk-vin02a1:362_1: Gamane paṭippassaddheti antarāmagge upaddavaṃ vā disvā anatthikatāya vā “mayaṃ idāni na pesissāma,
atk-vin02a1:362_2: na gamissāmā”ti evaṃ gamane paṭippassaddhe upacchinne.
atk-vin02a1:362_3: Ñātakānaṃ pavāritānanti etesaṃ bahumpi dentānaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:362_4: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana “tesampi pātheyyapaheṇakatthāya paṭiyattato pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:366_5: thokaṃ thokaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ paṭikkhepapavāraṇāya pavāritā.
atk-vin02a1:367_3: Alametaṃ sabbanti ettha tikāraṃ avatvāva “alametaṃ sabbaṃ” ettakaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:368_2: Tattha ca yasmā yena ekampi sitthaṃ saṅkhāditvā vā asaṅkhāditvā vā ajjhoharitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:368_4: tenassa padabhājane “bhuttāvī nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:368_9: tenassa padabhājane “pavārito nāma asanaṃ paññāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:368_17: tasmā bhuttāvīvacanena visuṃ kañci atthasiddhiṃ na passāma.
atk-vin02a1:368_19: chappañcavācāhī”tiādīsu pana dirattādivacanaṃ viya pavāritapadassa parivārakabhāvena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:369_3: Odanādīnaṃ ce aññataraṃ paṭikkhipitabbaṃ bhojanaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:369_4: Hatthapāse ṭhitoti pavāraṇappahonakaṃ bhojanaṃ gaṇhitvā dāyako aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇe okāse hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:369_5: Abhiharatīti so ce dāyako tassa taṃ bhattaṃ kāyena abhiharatīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:369_7: tañce abhihaṭaṃ so bhikkhu kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipatīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:369_8: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena pavārito nāma hotīti.
atk-vin02a1:371_1: “asana”ntiādīsu tāva yañca asnāti yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:371_4: Tattha odano nāma – sāli, vīhi, yavo, godhumo, kaṅgu, varako,
atk-vin02a1:371_6: Tattha “sālī”ti antamaso nīvāraṃ upādāya sabbāpi sālijāti.
atk-vin02a1:371_10: “Varako”ti antamaso varakacorakaṃ upādāya sabbā setavaṇṇā varakajāti.
atk-vin02a1:371_11: “Kudrūsako”ti kāḷako dravo ceva sāmākādibhedā ca sabbāpi tiṇadhaññajāti.
atk-vin02a1:372_2: etesaṃ vuttappabhedānaṃ sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ taṇḍule gahetvā “bhattaṃ pacissāmā”ti vā “yāguṃ pacissāmā”ti
atk-vin02a1:372_3: vā “ambilapāyāsādīsu aññataraṃ pacissāmā”ti vā yaṃkiñci sandhāya pacantu,
atk-vin02a1:372_4: sace uṇhaṃ sītalaṃ vā bhuñjantānaṃ bhojanakāle gahitagahitaṭṭhāne odhi paññāyati,
atk-vin02a1:373_0: Yopi pāyāso vā paṇṇaphalakaḷīramissakā ambilayāgu vā uddhanato otāritamattā abbhuṇhā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:373_4: Sace pana usumāya vigatāya sītalībhūtā ghanabhāvaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:373_8: Sacepi dadhitakkādīni āropetvā bahupaṇṇaphalakaḷīre pakkhipitvā muṭṭhimattāpi taṇḍulā pakkhittā honti,
atk-vin02a1:373_11: Ayāguke nimantane “yāguṃ dassāmā”ti bhatte udakakañjikakhīrādīni ākiritvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti denti.
atk-vin02a1:373_14: Sace pana pakkuthitesu udakādīsu pakkhipitvā pacitvā denti,
atk-vin02a1:373_16: Yāgusaṅgahaṃ gatepi tasmiṃ vā aññasmiṃ vā yattha macchamaṃsaṃ pakkhipanti,
atk-vin02a1:373_17: sace sāsapamattampi macchamaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ vā nhāru vā paññāyati,
atk-vin02a1:374_0: Suddharasako pana rasakayāgu vā na janeti.
atk-vin02a1:374_1: Ṭhapetvā vuttadhaññānaṃ taṇḍule aññehi veṇutaṇḍulādīhi vā kandamūlaphalehi vā yehi kehici kataṃ bhattampi pavāraṇaṃ na janeti,
atk-vin02a1:374_5: Pupphiatthāya bhattaṃ nāma pupphikhajjakatthāya kuthitatūdake pakkhipitvā seditataṇḍulā vuccanti.
atk-vin02a1:374_6: Sace pana te taṇḍule sukkhāpetvā khādanti, vaṭṭati;
atk-vin02a1:374_12: Puthukā vā tāhi katasattubhattādīni vā na pavārenti.
atk-vin02a1:375_1: Aññehi pana muggādīhi katakummāso pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
atk-vin02a1:375_3: Kaṅguvarakakudrūsakasīsānipi bhajjitvā īsakaṃ koṭṭetvā thuse palāpetvā puna daḷhaṃ koṭṭetvā cuṇṇaṃ karonti.
atk-vin02a1:375_8: Samapākabhajjitānaṃ pana vīhīnaṃ vā vīhipalāpānaṃ vā taṇḍulā bhajjitataṇḍulā eva vā na pavārenti.
atk-vin02a1:375_11: Samapākabhajjitānaṃ pana ātapasukkhānaṃ vā kuṇḍakaṃ na pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:375_12: Lājā vā tehi katabhattasattuādīni vā na pavārenti.
atk-vin02a1:375_13: Bhajjitapiṭṭhaṃ vā yaṃkiñci suddhakhajjakaṃ vā na pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:375_17: sacepi yāguṃ pivantassa yāgusitthamattāneva dve macchakhaṇḍāni vā maṃsakhaṇḍāni vā ekabhājane vā nānābhājane vā denti,
atk-vin02a1:375_18: tāni ce akhādanto aññaṃ yaṃkiñci pavāraṇappahonakaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:375_21: ekaṃ hatthe vā patte vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:376_9: Sace pana akappiyamaṃsaṃ khādanto kappiyamaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:376_19: Kappiyamaṃsaṃ vā akappiyamaṃsaṃ vā khādanto pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ yaṃkiñci kappiyabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:376_20: Kuladūsakavejjakammauttarimanussadhammārocanasāditarūpiyādīhi nibbattaṃ buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṃ anesanāya uppannaṃ akappiyabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:376_22: Kappiyabhojanaṃ vā akappiyabhojanaṃ vā bhuñjantopi kappiyabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:376_24: na pavāretīti sabbattha vuttanayeneva kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:377_1: yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipanto pavāraṇaṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin02a1:377_4: “‘asanaṃ bhojana’nti ettha tāva yena ekasitthampi ajjhohaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:377_5: so sace pattamukhahatthānaṃ yattha katthaci pañcasu bhojanesu ekasmimpi sati aññaṃ pañcasu bhojanesu ekampi paṭikkhipati, pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:377_9: Mukhe ca hatthe ca bhojanaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a1:377_17: Yopi aññatra gantvā bhuñjitukāmo mukhe bhattaṃ gilitvā sesaṃ ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge aññaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:377_18: tassāpi pavāraṇā na hotī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:377_21: Mukhepi vā vijjamānabhojanaṃ sace anajjhoharitukāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:377_24: Ekasmiñhi pade vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sabbattha veditabbaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:377_31: Hatthapāse ṭhitoti ettha pana sace bhikkhu nisinno hoti,
atk-vin02a1:377_38: dāyakassa nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa vā nipannassa vā ṭhapetvā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:377_40: Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipantasseva pavāraṇā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:378_1: Sace pana anantaranisinnopi bhikkhu hatthe vā ūrūsu vā ādhārake vā ṭhitapattaṃ anabhiharitvāva “bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:378_3: Bhattapacchiṃ ānetvā purato bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā “gaṇhāhī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:378_4: Īsakaṃ pana uddharitvā vā apanāmetvā vā “gaṇhathā”ti vutte paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti.
atk-vin02a1:378_5: Therāsane nisinno thero dūre nisinnassa daharabhikkhussa pattaṃ pesetvā “ito odanaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:378_10: Sace pana gahetvā āgato bhikkhu “idaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:379_0: Parivesanāya eko ekena hatthena odanapacchiṃ ekena kaṭacchuṃ gahetvā bhikkhū parivisati,
atk-vin02a1:379_1: tatra ce añño āgantvā “ahaṃ pacchiṃ dhāressāmi,
atk-vin02a1:379_2: tvaṃ odanaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gahitamattakameva karoti,
atk-vin02a1:379_5: Tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hoti.
atk-vin02a1:379_8: tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:379_11: Dvinnaṃ samabhārepi paṭikkhipanto pavāretiyevāti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:379_12: Anantarassa bhikkhuno bhatte diyyamāne itaro pattaṃ hatthehi pidahati,
atk-vin02a1:380_0: Paṭikkhepo paññāyatīti ettha vācāya abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā natthi.
atk-vin02a1:380_1: Kāyena abhihaṭaṃ pana kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hotīti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:381_0: Tattha kāyena paṭikkhepo nāma aṅguliṃ vā hatthaṃ vā macchikabījaniṃ vā cīvarakaṇṇaṃ vā cāleti,
atk-vin02a1:381_7: evaṃ yena kenaci ākārena kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhitte pavāraṇā hoti.
atk-vin02a1:382_0: Eko abhihaṭe bhatte pavāraṇāya bhīto hattha apanetvā punappunaṃ patte odanaṃ ākirantaṃ “ākira ākira koṭṭetvā pūrehī”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:382_2: Mahāsumatthero tāva “anākiraṇatthāya vuttattā pavāraṇā hotī”ti āha.
atk-vin02a1:382_3: Mahāpadumatthero pana “‘ākira pūrehī’ti vadantassa nāma ‘kassaci pavāraṇā atthī’ti vatvā ‘na pavāretī”’ti āha.
atk-vin02a1:382_4: Aparo bhattaṃ abhiharantaṃ bhikkhuṃ sallakkhetvā “kiṃ āvuso itopi kiñci gaṇhissasi,
atk-vin02a1:382_6: Tatrāpi “‘evaṃ nāgamissatī’ti vuttattā ‘pavāraṇā hotī”’ti mahāsumatthero āha.
atk-vin02a1:382_7: Mahāpadumatthero pana “‘gaṇhissasī’ti vadantassa nāma ‘kassaci pavāraṇā atthī’ti vatvā ‘na pavāretī”’ti āha.
atk-vin02a1:383_0: Eko samaṃsakaṃ rasaṃ abhiharitvā “rasaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:384_0: Maṃsarasena āpucchantaṃ mahāthero “muhuttaṃ āgamehī”ti vatvā “thālakaṃ āvuso āharā”ti āha.
atk-vin02a1:384_6: gaṇhantassāpi nāma pavāraṇā atthī”ti vatvā “na pavāretī”ti āha.
atk-vin02a1:384_12: Sace pana “macchasūpaṃ maṃsasūpa”nti vā “imaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā vadanti, pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:385_0: Yo pana nimantane bhuñjamāno maṃsaṃ abhihaṭaṃ “uddissa kata”nti maññamāno paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:385_4: piṇḍapātacāriko bhikkhu bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:385_11: tatra ce yāgu bahutarā vā hoti samasamā vā,
atk-vin02a1:385_15: Idañca sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttattā na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ,
atk-vin02a1:385_18: bhattaṃ bahukaṃ vā samaṃ vā appataraṃ vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:385_20: Bhattaṃ vā yāguṃ vā anāmasitvā “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:385_21: tatra ce bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ vā samakaṃ vā hoti, pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:385_29: bahukhīre khīraṃ bahusappimhi ca pāyāse sappiṃ gaṇhathāti visuṃ katvā deti,
atk-vin02a1:386_2: Kaddamaṃ vā udakaṃ vā patvā ṭhitena atirittaṃ kāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:386_5: Atha nāvā vā setu vā atthi,
atk-vin02a1:386_8: Yāne vā hatthiassapiṭṭhe vā candamaṇḍale vā sūriyamaṇḍale vā nisīditvā pavāritena yāva majjhanhikaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:386_14: Taṃ taṃ iriyāpathaṃ kopentena atirittaṃ kāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:386_17: Tassa pana heṭṭhā palālapīṭhaṃ vā kiñci vā nisīdanakaṃ dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:386_18: Pīṭhake nisīditvā pavāritena āsanaṃ acāletvāva catasso disā parivattantena bhuñjituṃ labbhati.
atk-vin02a1:386_19: Mañce nisīditvā pavāritena ito vā etto vā saṃsarituṃ na labbhati.
atk-vin02a1:386_20: Sace pana naṃ saha mañcena ukkhipitvā aññatra nenti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:387_2: Taṃ pana yasmā kappiyakatādīhi sattahi vinayakammākārehi akataṃ vā gilānassa anadhikaṃ vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:387_4: Tattha akappiyakatanti yaṃ tattha phalaṃ vā kandamūlādi vā pañcahi samaṇakappehi kappiyaṃ akataṃ;
atk-vin02a1:387_7: Taṃ akappiyaṃ “alametaṃ sabba”nti evaṃ atirittaṃ katampi akappiyakatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:387_8: Appaṭiggahitakatanti bhikkhunā appaṭiggahitaṃyeva purimanayeneva atirittaṃ kataṃ.
atk-vin02a1:387_9: Anuccāritakatanti kappiyaṃ kārāpetuṃ āgatena bhikkhunā īsakampi anukkhittaṃ vā anapanāmitaṃ vā kataṃ.
atk-vin02a1:387_10: Ahatthapāse katanti kappiyaṃ kārāpetuṃ āgatassa hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitena kataṃ.
atk-vin02a1:387_11: Abhuttāvinā katanti yo “alametaṃ sabba”nti atirittaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a1:387_13: Bhuttāvinā pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena katanti idaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:387_14: Alametaṃ sabbanti avuttanti vacībhedaṃ katvā evaṃ avuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:387_15: Iti imehi sattahi vinayakammākārehi yaṃ atirittaṃ kappiyaṃ akataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:388_1: Apicettha bhuttāvinā kataṃ hotīti anantare nisinnassa sabhāgassa bhikkhuno pattato ekampi sitthaṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:388_2: maṃsahīraṃ vā khāditvā katampi bhuttāvināva kataṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:388_3: Āsanā avuṭṭhitenāti ettha pana asammohatthaṃ ayaṃ vinicchayo –
atk-vin02a1:388_4: dve bhikkhū pātova bhuñjamānā pavāritā honti –
atk-vin02a1:388_6: itarena niccabhattaṃ vā salākabhattaṃ vā ānetvā upaḍḍhaṃ tassa bhikkhuno patte ākiritvā hatthaṃ dhovitvā
atk-vin02a1:388_7: sesaṃ tena bhikkhunā kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:388_10: Sace pana paṭhamaṃ nisinno bhikkhu sayameva tassa pattato hatthena gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:388_12: Sace pana evaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjantassa puna kiñci byañjanaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā patte ākiranti,
atk-vin02a1:388_19: “Yena akata”nti aññena bhikkhunā yena paṭhamaṃ na kataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:388_24: Tattha hi kariyamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ katena saddhiṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:388_25: tasmā aññasmiṃ bhājane kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:388_26: Evaṃ kataṃ pana tena bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ katena saddhiṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:389_0: Kappiyaṃ karontena ca na kevalaṃ patteyeva,
atk-vin02a1:389_1: kuṇḍepi pacchiyampi yattha katthaci purato ṭhapetvā onāmitabhājane kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:389_7: Sacepi pavāretvā piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ pattaṃ gahetvā avassaṃ bhuñjanake maṅgalanimantane nisīdāpenti,
atk-vin02a1:389_10: āsanasālaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā pattaṃ pesetvā kāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:389_11: Kappiyaṃ karontena pana anupasampannassa hatthe ṭhitaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:389_13: sayaṃ gantvā kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā ānetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:390_0: Gilānātirittanti ettha na kevalaṃ yaṃ gilānassa bhuttāvasesaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:390_2: atha kho yaṃkiñci gilānaṃ uddissa ajja vā sve vā yadā vā icchati,
atk-vin02a1:391_1: Sati paccayeti yāmakālikaṃ pipāsāya sati pipāsacchedanatthaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:391_2: sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca tena tena upasametabbake ābādhe sati tassa upasamanatthaṃ paribhuñjato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:395_3: Upanandhīti upanāhaṃ janento tasmiṃ puggale attano kodhaṃ bandhi;
atk-vin02a1:396_1: Abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyāti abhiharitvā “handa bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti evaṃ pavāreyya.
atk-vin02a1:396_2: Padabhājane pana “handa bhikkhū”tiādiṃ anuddharitvā sādhāraṇameva abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāraṇāya atthaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:396_5: Taṃ panassa jānanaṃ yasmā tīhākārehi hoti,
atk-vin02a1:396_6: tasmā “jānāti nāma sāmaṃ vā jānātī”tiādinā nayena padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:397_0: Paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassāti yassa abhihaṭaṃ tasmiṃ paṭiggaṇhante abhihārakassa bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:397_1: Itarassa pana sabbo āpattibhedo paṭhamasikkhāpade vutto,
atk-vin02a1:397_2: imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpade sabbā āpattiyo abhihārakasseva veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:398_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:401_4: So kira sattame divase bhavissatīti nagare ghosanā kariyati,
atk-vin02a1:401_5: nagarassa bahiddhā same bhūmibhāge pabbatacchāyāya mahājanakāyo sannipatati,
atk-vin02a1:401_10: Atha nesaṃ ñātakā “amhākaṃ ayyā āgatā”ti tuṭṭhacittā nhāpetvā vilimpetvā bhojetvā aññampi pūvakhādanīyādiṃ hatthe adaṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:402_5: Tenevassa padabhājane “vikālo nāma majjhanhike vītivatte yāva aruṇuggamanā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:402_7: Tato paṭṭhāya pana khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā na sakkā,
atk-vin02a1:403_0: Avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāmāti ettha yaṃ tāva sakkhalimodakādipubbaṇṇāparaṇṇamayaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:403_4: mūlakhādanīyaṃ kandakhādanīyaṃ mūḷālakhādanīyaṃ matthakakhādanīyaṃ khandhakhādanīyaṃ tacakhādanīyaṃ pattakhādanīyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:404_1: mūlakhādanīye tāva mūlakamūlaṃ khārakamūlaṃ caccumūlaṃ tambakamūlaṃ taṇḍuleyyakamūlaṃ vatthuleyyakamūlaṃ
atk-vin02a1:404_3: Ettha ca vajakalimūle jaraṭṭhaṃ chinditvā chaḍḍenti,
atk-vin02a1:405_2: mūlāni bhesajjāni haliddiṃ siṅgiveraṃ vacaṃ vacattaṃ ativisaṃ kaṭukarohiṇiṃ usīraṃ bhaddamuttakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:405_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
atk-vin02a1:406_2: Tesaṃ cūḷapañcamūlaṃ mahāpañcamūlantiādinā nayena gaṇiyamānānaṃ gaṇanāya anto natthi.
atk-vin02a1:406_3: Khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇābhāvoyeva pana tesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:406_4: Tasmā yaṃkiñci mūlaṃ tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharati,
atk-vin02a1:406_7: Tesu bahuṃ vatvāpi hi imasmiṃyeva lakkhaṇe ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:406_8: Nāmasaññāsu pana vuccamānāsu taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva hoti,
atk-vin02a1:406_9: tasmā nāmasaññāya ādaraṃ akatvā lakkhaṇameva dassitaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:407_3: Yañca taṃ pāḷiyaṃ haliddādi aṭṭhavidhaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:408_1: dīgho ca rasso ca bhisakiṃsukakandādi vaṭṭo uppalakaserukakandādi,
atk-vin02a1:408_3: Tattha sabbesaṃ kandānaṃ jiṇṇajaraṭṭhānañca challi ca sukhumamūlāni ca yāvajīvikāni.
atk-vin02a1:408_5: sālakalyāṇīpotakakando kiṃsukapotakakando ambāṭakakando ketakakando māluvakando bhisasaṅkhāto padumapuṇḍarīkakando
atk-vin02a1:408_6: piṇḍālumasāluādayo ca khīravallikando āluvakando siggukando tālakando nīluppalarattuppalakumudasogandhikānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:408_7: kandā kadalikando veḷukando kaserukakandoti evamādayo tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:409_4: “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ mūlabhesajjasaṅgaheneva saṅgahitā.
atk-vin02a1:410_1: Erakamūlaṃ kandulamūlanti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañca bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakamuḷālaṃ yāvakālikaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:410_4: “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ mūlabhesajjasaṅgaheneva saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:411_1: matthakā veṇukaḷīro naḷakaḷīro ucchukaḷīro mūlakakaḷīro sāsapakaḷīro satāvarikaḷīro sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:411_2: kaḷīrāti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇako
atk-vin02a1:411_4: Haliddisiṅgiveravacamakacilasuṇānaṃkaḷīrā tālahintālakuntālanāḷikerakaḷīrānañca chinditvā pātito jaraṭṭhabundo yāvajīviko.
atk-vin02a1:412_1: khandhakāti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca
atk-vin02a1:412_3: Uppalajātīnaṃ paṇṇadaṇḍako padumajātīnaṃ sabbopi daṇḍako kāravindakadaṇḍādayo ca avasesasabbakhandhā yāvajīvikā.
atk-vin02a1:413_3: Tesaṃ pana matthakakhandhatacānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ kasāvabhesajjena saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:414_6: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi kasāvāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
atk-vin02a1:415_0: Ettha hi etesampi saṅgaho sijjhati. Vuttakasāvāni ca sabbāni kappiyānīti veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a1:416_0: Pattakhādanīye mūlakaṃ khārako caccu tambako taṇḍuleyyako papunnāgo vatthuleyyako vajakali jajjharī sellu
atk-vin02a1:416_1: siggu kāsamaddako ummā cīnamuggo māso rājamāso ṭhapetvā mahānipphāvaṃ avasesanipphāvo aggimantho sunisannako
atk-vin02a1:416_2: setavaraṇo nāḷikā bhūmiyaṃ jātaloṇīti etesaṃ pattāni aññāni ca evarūpāni tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
atk-vin02a1:416_3: manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakāni pattāni ekaṃsena yāvakālikāni.
atk-vin02a1:416_4: Yā panaññā mahānakhapiṭṭhimattā paṇṇaloṇi rukkhe ca gacche ca ārohati,
atk-vin02a1:418_2: paṇṇāni bhesajjāni nimbapaṇṇaṃ kuṭajapaṇṇaṃ paṭolapaṇṇaṃ sulasipaṇṇaṃ kappāsakapaṇṇaṃ yāni vā panaññānipi
atk-vin02a1:418_3: atthi paṇṇāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti –
atk-vin02a1:419_2: Na kevalañca paṇṇāniyeva tesaṃ pupphaphalādīnipi yāvajīvikāni.
atk-vin02a1:419_3: Paṇṇānaṃ phaggavapaṇṇaṃ ajjukapaṇṇaṃ phaṇijjakapaṇṇaṃ paṭolapaṇṇaṃ tambūlapaṇṇaṃ paduminipaṇṇanti evaṃ gaṇanavasena anto natthi.
atk-vin02a1:420_0: Pupphakhādanīye mūlakapupphaṃ khārakapupphaṃ caccupupphaṃ tambakapupphaṃ vajakalipupphaṃ jajjharīpupphaṃ
atk-vin02a1:420_1: cūḷanipphāvapupphaṃ mahānipphāvapupphaṃ kaserukapupphaṃ nāḷikeratālaketakānaṃ taruṇapupphāni setavaraṇapupphaṃ
atk-vin02a1:420_2: siggupupphaṃ uppalapadumajātikānaṃ pupphāni kaṇṇikamattaṃ agandhikapupphaṃ kaḷīrapupphaṃ jīvantīpupphanti
atk-vin02a1:420_3: evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakapupphaṃ
atk-vin02a1:420_5: Asokabakulakuyyakapunnāgacampakajātikaṇavīrakaṇikārakundanavamālikamallikādīnaṃ pana pupphaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ tassa gaṇanāya anto natthi.
atk-vin02a1:421_1: phalāni yāni loke tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharanti,
atk-vin02a1:421_3: Nāmagaṇanavasena nesaṃ na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:422_7: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi phalāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti –
atk-vin02a1:423_2: Tesampi aparipakkāni acchiva bimbavaraṇaketakakāsmarīādīnaṃ phalāni jātiphalaṃ kaṭukaphalaṃ eḷā takkolanti
atk-vin02a1:423_3: evaṃ nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:424_0: Aṭṭhikhādanīye labujaṭṭhi panasaṭṭhi ambāṭakaṭṭhi sālaṭṭhi khajjūrīketakatimbarūsakānaṃ taruṇaphalaṭṭhi
atk-vin02a1:424_1: tintiṇikaṭṭhi bimbaphalaṭṭhi uppala padumajātīnaṃ pokkharaṭṭhīti evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu manussānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:424_2: pakatiāhāravasena khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakāni aṭṭhīni yāvakālikāni.
atk-vin02a1:424_3: Madhukaṭṭhi punnāgaṭṭhi harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīni siddhatthakaṭṭhi rājikaṭṭhīti evamādīni aṭṭhīni yāvajīvikāni.
atk-vin02a1:425_0: Piṭṭhakhādanīye sattannaṃ tāva dhaññānaṃ dhaññānulomānaṃ aparaṇṇānañca piṭṭhaṃ panasapiṭṭhaṃ labujapiṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:425_1: ambāṭakapiṭṭhaṃ sālapiṭṭhaṃ dhotakatālapiṭṭhañca khīravallipiṭṭhañcāti evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu
atk-vin02a1:425_2: pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakāni piṭṭhāni yāvakālikāni.
atk-vin02a1:425_3: Adhotakaṃ tālapiṭṭhaṃ khīravallipiṭṭhaṃ assagandhādipiṭṭhāni ca yāvajīvikāni.
atk-vin02a1:425_4: Tesaṃ pāḷiyaṃ kasāvehi ca mūlaphalehi ca saṅghaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:426_4: hiṅguṃ hiṅgujatuṃ hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ takaṃ takapattiṃ takapaṇṇiṃ sajjulasaṃ yāni vā panaññānipi atthi jatūni
atk-vin02a1:426_6: Tattha yevāpanakavasena saṅgahitānaṃ ambaniyyāso kaṇikāraniyyāsoti evaṃ nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:426_8: sabbampi imasmiṃ atthe “avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāmā”ti saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:427_0: Bhojanīyaṃ nāma pañca bhojanānītiādimhi yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ vuttameva.
atk-vin02a1:427_2: paṭiggaṇhātīti yo bhikkhu vikāle etaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyañca paṭiggaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:428_1: kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:431_3: Araññe viharatīti jetavanassa avidūre padhānaghare ekasmiṃ āvāse vasati.
atk-vin02a1:431_5: So kira antogāme bhuñjitvā pacchā piṇḍāya caritvā tādisaṃ odanaṃ āharati,
atk-vin02a1:431_8: Thero kira sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā vītināmetvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ udakena temetvā bhuñjati,
atk-vin02a1:431_10: Evaṃ dvepi tīṇipi cattāripi sattāhāni vītināmetvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-vin02a1:433_0: Paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ sannidhikataṃ yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ajjhoharitukāmatāya
atk-vin02a1:433_5: gaṇṭhikapattassa vā gaṇṭhikantare sneho paviṭṭho hoti,
atk-vin02a1:433_9: Tasmā pattaṃ dhovitvā puna tattha acchodakaṃ vā āsiñcitvā aṅguliyā vā ghaṃsitvā nisnehabhāvo jānitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:433_10: Sace hi udake vā snehabhāvo patte vā aṅgulilekhā paññāyati,
atk-vin02a1:433_17: Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:434_8: yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dve,
atk-vin02a1:434_12: pakatibhojane sannidhipaccayā ca vikālabhojanapaccayā ca dve pācittiyāni,
atk-vin02a1:435_1: Sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāyāti āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhato paṭiggahaṇapaccayā tāva dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:436_1: Anāpatti yāvakālikantiādimhi vikālabhojanasikkhāpade niddiṭṭhaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāva majjhantikasaṅkhāto kālo,
atk-vin02a1:436_3: Saddhiṃ anulomapānehi aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānaṃ yāva rattiyā pacchimayāmasaṅkhāto yāmo,
atk-vin02a1:436_4: tāva paribhuñjitabbato yāmo kālo assāti yāmakālikaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:436_5: Sappiādi pañcavidhaṃ bhesajjaṃ sattāhaṃ nidhetabbato sattāho kālo assāti sattāhakālikaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:436_6: Ṭhapetvā udakaṃ avasesaṃ sabbampi yāvajīvaṃ pariharitvā sati paccaye paribhuñjitabbato yāvajīvakanti vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:437_0: Tattha aruṇodayeva paṭiggahitaṃ yāvakālikaṃ satakkhattumpi nidahitvā yāvakālo nātikkamati tāva,
atk-vin02a1:437_6: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne pānakathā kappiyānulomakathā “kappati nu kho yāvakālikena yāmakālika”ntiādikathā ca kappiyabhūmikathā ca vitthāritā,
atk-vin02a1:438_1: kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:441_3: Kassa sampannaṃ na manāpanti sampattiyuttaṃ kassa na piyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:442_1: Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyyāti ettha suddhāni
atk-vin02a1:442_4: odanasaṃsaṭṭhāni pana viññāpetvā bhuñjanto pācittiyaṃ āpajjatīti veditabbo,
atk-vin02a1:442_8: “paṇītabhojanānī”ti vutte pana paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhāni sattadhaññanibbattāni bhojanāni paṇītabhojanānīti ayamattho paññāyati.
atk-vin02a1:443_0: Idāni viññāpeti payoge dukkaṭantiādīsu ayaṃ vinicchayo –
atk-vin02a1:443_5: sappiñca bhattañca dehī”ti viññāpentassa viññattiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:443_8: “Sappibhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte pana yasmā sālibhattaṃ viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthi;
atk-vin02a1:444_0: Sace pana “sappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte bhattaṃ datvā “sappiṃ katvā bhuñjā”ti navanītaṃ vā khīraṃ vā dadhiṃ vā deti,
atk-vin02a1:444_3: “Gosappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte pana gosappinā vā detu,
atk-vin02a1:444_5: purimanayeneva gonavanītādīni vā gāviṃyeva vā detu “ito sappinā bhuñjā”ti yathāvatthukameva.
atk-vin02a1:444_6: Sace pana gosappinā yācito ajiyā sappiādīhi deti,
atk-vin02a1:444_8: Evañhi sati aññaṃ yācitena aññaṃ dinnaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:444_10: Esa nayo ajiyā sappinā dehīti ādīsupi.
atk-vin02a1:445_4: Akappiyasappimhi asati purimanayeneva akappiyanavanītādīni deti “sappiṃ katvā bhuñjā”ti akappiyasappināva dinnaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:445_11: tasmiṃ vā tassa mūle vā laddhe,
atk-vin02a1:446_0: Sace pana aññaṃ pāḷiyā āgataṃ vā anāgataṃ vā denti,
atk-vin02a1:446_2: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanavanītādīni ṭhapetvā aññehi navanītādīhi viññāpentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:446_3: Yathā ca “sappibhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte sālibhattassa viya sappibhattassa abhāvā sūpodanaviññattidukkaṭameva hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:446_5: Paṭipāṭiyā ekamekaṃ vitthāretvā vuccamānepi hi ayamevattho vattabbo siyā,
atk-vin02a1:447_0: Sace pana sabbehipi sappiādīhi ekaṭṭhāne vā nānāṭṭhāne vā viññāpetvā paṭiladdhaṃ ekabhājane ākiritvā
atk-vin02a1:447_1: ekarasaṃ katvā tato kusaggenāpi jivhagge binduṃ ṭhapetvā ajjhoharati,
atk-vin02a1:452_1: Agilāno gilānasaññīti ettha sace gilānasaññīpi hutvā bhesajjatthāya pañca bhesajjāni viññāpeti,
atk-vin02a1:452_3: Nava paṇītabhojanāni viññāpento pana iminā sikkhāpadena kāretabbo.
atk-vin02a1:453_0: Catusamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a1:454_0: Kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇativajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:457_2: catūsu paccayesu antamaso dantakaṭṭhampi sabbaṃ paṃsukūlameva assāti sabbapaṃsukūliko.
atk-vin02a1:457_3: So kira susāne chaḍḍitabhājanameva pattaṃ katvā tattha chaḍḍitacoḷakeheva cīvaraṃ katvā tattha chaḍḍitamañcapīṭhakāniyeva gahetvā paribhuñjati.
atk-vin02a1:457_4: Ayyavosāṭitakānīti ettha ayyā vuccanti kālaṅkatā pitipitāmahā.
atk-vin02a1:457_5: Vosāṭitakāni vuccanti tesaṃ atthāya susānādīsu chaḍḍitakāni khādanīyabhojanīyāni;
atk-vin02a1:457_6: manussā kira kālaṅkate ñātake uddissa yaṃ tesaṃ sajīvakāle piyaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:457_7: taṃ etesu susānādīsu piṇḍaṃ piṇḍaṃ katvā “ñātakā no paribhuñjantūti ṭhapenti.
atk-vin02a1:457_11: “susānepi rukkhamūlepi ummārepi ayyavosāṭitakāni sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:457_14: thūlo ca ghanasarīro cāyaṃ bhikkhūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:457_15: Manussamaṃsaṃ maññe khādatīti manussamaṃsaṃ khādatīti naṃ sallakkhema;
atk-vin02a1:457_16: manussamaṃsaṃ khādantā hi īdisā bhavantīti ayaṃ tesaṃ adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:458_1: Udakadantapone kukkuccāyantīti ettha te bhikkhū “adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyyā”ti padassa sammā atthaṃ asallakkhetvā kukkuccāyisuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:458_2: bhagavā pana yathāuppannassa vatthussa vasena pitā viya dārake te bhikkhū saññāpento anupaññattiṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-vin02a1:459_1: Adinnanti kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā gaṇhantassa kāyakāyapaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ aññataravasena na dinnaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:459_2: Etadeva hi sandhāya padabhājane “adinnaṃ nāma appaṭiggahitakaṃ vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:459_3: Dutiyapārājike pana “adinnaṃ nāma parapariggahitakaṃ vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:459_4: Dinnanti idaṃ pana tasseva adinnassa paṭipakkhavasena lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:459_5: Niddese cassa “kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā dente”ti evaṃ aññasmiṃ dadamāne “hatthapāse
atk-vin02a1:459_6: ṭhito kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhātīti taṃ evaṃ diyyamānaṃ antamaso rathareṇumpi sace pubbe
atk-vin02a1:459_7: vuttalakkhaṇe hatthapāse ṭhito kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:459_8: etaṃ evaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ dinnaṃ nāma vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:460_0: Tattha kāyenāti hatthādīsu yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena;
atk-vin02a1:460_1: antamaso pādaṅguliyāpi diyyamānaṃ kāyena dinnaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:460_3: Yena kenaci hi sarīrāvayavena gahitaṃ kāyena gahitameva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:460_4: Sacepi natthukaraṇiyā diyyamānaṃ nāsāpuṭena akallako vā mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti.
atk-vin02a1:460_5: Ābhogamattameva hi ettha pamāṇanti ayaṃ nayo mahāpaccariyaṃ vutto.
atk-vin02a1:460_6: Kāyapaṭibaddhenāti kaṭacchuādīsu yena kenaci upakaraṇena dinnaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:460_8: Yena kenaci sarīrapaṭibaddhena pattathālakādinā gahitaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena gahitameva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:460_9: Nissaggiyenāti kāyato ca kāyapaṭibaddhato ca mocetvā hatthapāse ṭhitassa kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā
atk-vin02a1:460_10: pātiyamānampi nissaggiyena payogena dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:461_5: devo vā manusso vā tiracchānagato vā kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā deti,
atk-vin02a1:461_6: taṃ ce bhikkhu kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti.
atk-vin02a1:462_0: Tattha ṭhitanisinnanipannānaṃ pavāraṇasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva hatthapāso veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:462_1: Sace pana dāyakapaṭiggāhakesu eko ākāse hoti,
atk-vin02a1:462_3: bhūmaṭṭhassa ca sīsena ākāsaṭṭhassa ca ṭhapetvā dātuṃ vā gahetuṃ vā pasāritahatthaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:462_11: Evarūpe hatthapāse ṭhatvā sacepi pakkhī mukhatuṇḍakena vā hatthī vā soṇḍāya gahetvā pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā deti,
atk-vin02a1:462_13: Sace pana addhaṭṭhamaratanassāpi hatthino khandhe nisinno,
atk-vin02a1:463_0: Eko bahūni bhattabyañjanabhājanāni sīse katvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ āgantvā ṭhitakova gaṇhathāti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:463_4: bhikkhunā hatthaṃ pasāretvā heṭṭhimabhājanaṃ ekadesenāpi sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:463_6: tato paṭṭhāya oropetvā vā ugghāṭetvā vā yaṃ icchati,
atk-vin02a1:463_9: kājena bhattaṃ harantopi sace kājaṃ onāmetvā deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:463_17: Sace pana kasaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā hatthena ussiñcitvā ussiñcitvā deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:464_0: Bahū pattā mañce vā pīṭhe vā kaṭasārake vā doṇiyaṃ vā phalake vā ṭhapitā honti,
atk-vin02a1:464_2: tattha ṭhatvā paṭiggahaṇasaññāya mañcādīni aṅguliyāpi phusitvā ṭhitena vā nisinnena vā nipannena vā yaṃ tesu pattesu diyyati,
atk-vin02a1:464_6: Sace pana mañcādīni hatthena gahetvā mañce nisīdati,
atk-vin02a1:465_0: Pathaviyaṃ pana sacepi kucchiyā kucchiṃ āhacca ṭhitā honti,
atk-vin02a1:465_1: yaṃ yaṃ aṅguliyā vā sūciyā vā phusitvā nisinno hoti,
atk-vin02a1:465_3: “Yattha katthaci mahākaṭasārahatthattharaṇādīsu ṭhapitapatte paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:465_5: Hatthapāse pana sati yattha katthaci vaṭṭati aññatra tatthajātakā.
atk-vin02a1:466_0: Tatthajātake pana paduminipaṇṇe vā kiṃsukapaṇṇādimhi vā na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:466_3: evaṃ khāṇuke bandhitvā ṭhapitamañcādimhi asaṃhārime phalake vā pāsāṇe vā na ruhatiyeva,
atk-vin02a1:466_5: Bhūmiyaṃ atthatesu sukhumesu tintiṇikādipaṇṇesupi paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhati,
atk-vin02a1:466_8: Sace hatthapāsaṃ atikkamma ṭhito dīghadaṇḍakena uḷuṅkena deti,
atk-vin02a1:466_10: Vacanaṃ asutvā vā anādiyitvā vā patte ākiratiyeva,
atk-vin02a1:466_12: Dūre ṭhatvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ khipantepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:467_0: Sace pattatthavikato nīhariyamāne patte rajanacuṇṇāni honti,
atk-vin02a1:467_2: asati rajanacuṇṇaṃ pucchitvā paṭiggahetvā vā piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:467_6: Taṃ pana puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:467_7: Sace pana “paṭiggahetvā dethā”ti vutte vacanaṃ asutvā vā anādiyitvā vā bhikkhaṃ dentiyeva,
atk-vin02a1:468_0: Sace mahāvāto tato tato rajaṃ pāteti,
atk-vin02a1:468_2: “anupasampannassa dassāmī”ti suddhacittena ābhogaṃ katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:468_3: Evaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā vihāraṃ vā āsanasālaṃ vā gantvā taṃ anupasampannassa datvā puna tena dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsena vā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:469_0: Sace bhikkhācāre sarajaṃ pattaṃ bhikkhussa deti,
atk-vin02a1:469_9: yattha anupasampanno atthi tattha netvā paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:469_14: Yāguṃ vā sūpaṃ vā purato ṭhapetvā ālulentānaṃ bhājanato phusitāni uggantvā patte patanti,
atk-vin02a1:470_0: Uḷuṅkena āharitvā dentānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ uḷuṅkato thevā patte patanti, supatitā,
atk-vin02a1:470_2: Sacepi carukena bhatte ākiriyamāne carukato masi vā chārikā vā patati,
atk-vin02a1:470_4: Anantarassa bhikkhuno diyyamānaṃ pattato uppatitvā itarassa patte patati,
atk-vin02a1:471_0: Sace jajjharisākhādiṃ phāletvā ekassa bhikkhuno dentānaṃ sākhato phusitāni aññassa patte patanti,
atk-vin02a1:471_3: tassa patte patitesu dātukāmatāya abhihaṭattā doso natthi.
atk-vin02a1:472_0: Āsanasālāya pattaṃ gahetvā nisinno bhikkhu niddaṃ okkanto hoti,
atk-vin02a1:472_3: Sace pana ābhogaṃ katvā nisinno hoti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:472_4: Sacepi so hatthena ādhārakaṃ muñcitvā pādena pelletvā niddāyati,
atk-vin02a1:472_6: Pādena ādhārakaṃ akkamitvā paṭiggaṇhantassa pana jāgarantassapi anādarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:472_8: Keci evaṃ ādhārakena paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhapaṭibaddhena paṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:473_3: taṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ pariccattaṃ taṃ,
atk-vin02a1:474_2: yaṃ diyyamānaṃ dāyakassa hatthato parigaḷitvā suddhāya vā bhūmiyā paduminipaṇṇavatthakaṭasārakādīsu vā patati,
atk-vin02a1:474_5: taṃ rajaṃ puñchitvā vā dhovitvā vā paṭiggahetvā vā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:474_6: Sace pana pavaṭṭantaṃ aññassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:474_8: Sace taṃ bhikkhuṃ vadati “tvaṃyeva khādā”ti tassāpi khādituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:474_10: Anāṇattenāpi “itarassa dassāmī”ti gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:474_11: Kasmā panetaṃ itarassa bhikkhuno gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti?
atk-vin02a1:474_13: Bhagavatā hi “sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjitu”nti vadantena yasseva taṃ diyyamānaṃ patati,
atk-vin02a1:474_14: tassa appaṭiggahitakampi taṃ gahetvā paribhogo anuññāto.
atk-vin02a1:474_15: “Pariccattaṃ taṃ bhikkhave dāyakehī”ti vacanena panettha parasantakābhāvo dīpito.
atk-vin02a1:474_16: Tasmā aññassa sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:474_17: tassa pana āṇattiyā vaṭṭatīti ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:475_1: tasmā yathāṭhitaṃyeva anāmasitvā kenaci pidahitvā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivasepi paribhuñcituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:475_4: Taṃdivasaṃyeva hi tassa sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhogo anuññāto,
atk-vin02a1:475_5: na tato paranti ayampi kirettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:476_5: Yampi satthakena ucchuādīsu phālitesu malaṃ paññāyati,
atk-vin02a1:476_7: Satthakaṃ dhovitvā phālitesu malaṃ na paññāyati,
atk-vin02a1:476_13: Mūlabhesajjādīni pisantānaṃ vā koṭṭentānaṃ vā nisadanisadapotakaudukkhalamusalādīni khiyyanti,
atk-vin02a1:476_14: pariharaṇakavāsiṃ tāpetvā bhesajjatthāya takke vā khīre vā pakkhipanti,
atk-vin02a1:477_0: Deve vassante piṇḍāya carantassa sarīrato vā cīvarato vā kiliṭṭhaudakaṃ patte patati,
atk-vin02a1:477_3: Sace pana sattāhaṃ vassante deve suddhaṃ udakaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:477_5: Sāmaṇerassa odanaṃ dentena tassa pattagataṃ acchupanteneva dātabbo.
atk-vin02a1:477_7: Appaṭiggahite odanaṃ chupitvā puna attano patte odanaṃ gaṇhantassa uggahitako hoti.
atk-vin02a1:478_0: Sace pana dātukāmo hutvā “āhara sāmaṇera pattaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:478_3: puna tavevetaṃ mayā pariccatta”nti ca vuttepi “na mayhaṃ etenattho”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a1:479_0: Sace pana ādhārake ṭhitaṃ nirapekkho “gaṇhā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:479_2: Sāpekkho ādhārake pattaṃ ṭhapetvā “etto pūvaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā gaṇhā”ti sāmaṇeraṃ vadati,
atk-vin02a1:479_3: sāmaṇero hatthaṃ dhovitvā sacepi satakkhattuṃ gahetvā attano pattagataṃ aphusantova attano patte pakkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:479_5: Yadi pana attano pattagataṃ phusitvā tato gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:479_8: Keci pana “sacepi gayhamānaṃ chijjitvā tattha patati,
atk-vin02a1:479_12: imassa guḷapiṇḍassa ettakaṃ padesaṃ gaṇhā”ti evaṃ paricchinditvā vutte veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:479_16: Hatthagataṃ pana yāva sāmaṇero vā “ala”nti na oramati,
atk-vin02a1:480_0: Sace attano vā bhikkhūnaṃ vā yāgupacanakabhājane kesañci atthāya odanaṃ pakkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:480_2: bhājanassa upari hatthaṃ karohī”ti vatvā tassa hatthe pakkhipitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:480_3: tassa hatthato bhājane patitañhi dutiyadivase bhājanassa akappiyabhāvaṃ na karoti,
atk-vin02a1:480_10: sāmaṇero kuṭassa gīvaṃ pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā āvajjeti,
atk-vin02a1:480_12: Atha vā bhikkhu bhūmiyaṃ hatthaṃ ṭhapeti,
atk-vin02a1:481_0: Sace paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ dve tayo sāmaṇerā denti,
atk-vin02a1:481_1: ekena vā balavatā ukkhittaṃ dve tayo bhikkhū gaṇhanti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:481_2: Mañcassa vā pīṭhassa vā pāde telaghaṭaṃ vā phāṇitaghaṭaṃ vā navanītaghaṭaṃ vā laggenti,
atk-vin02a1:482_0: Nāgadantake vā aṅkusake vā dve telaghaṭā laggitā honti,
atk-vin02a1:482_4: uparimaṃ gahetvā itaraṃ gaṇhato uparimo uggahitako hoti.
atk-vin02a1:482_8: Paṭiggahitakaṃ gaṇhissāmīti appaṭiggahitakaṃ gahetvā ñatvā puna ṭhapeti,
atk-vin02a1:482_13: Sace pana pubbe vivaritvā ṭhapitaṃ na pidahitabbaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:483_1: anokāsattā uddhaṃ vā adho vā haritvā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:484_0: Tālaṃ vā nāḷikeraṃ vā āruḷho yottena phalapiṇḍiṃ otāretvā upari ṭhitova gaṇhathāti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:484_2: Sace añño bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito yottapāsake gahetvā ukkhipitvā deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:485_0: Antovatiyaṃ ṭhatvā vatiṃ chinditvā ucchuṃ vā timbarūsakaṃ vā denti,
atk-vin02a1:485_3: Paharitvā niggate aṭṭhakathāsu doso na dassito.
atk-vin02a1:485_8: Vatiṃ vā pākāraṃ vā laṅghāpetvā denti,
atk-vin02a1:485_10: antopākāre ca bahipākāre ca ṭhitassa hatthapāso pahoti,
atk-vin02a1:485_11: hatthasatampi uddhaṃ gantvā sampattaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:486_1: so phalāphalaṃ disvā gahetvā khandhe nisinnova deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:486_2: Aparo bhikkhuṃ vahanto khandhe nisinnassa bhikkhuno deti,
atk-vin02a1:487_0: Bhikkhu phaliniṃ sākhaṃ chāyatthāya gahetvā gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:487_1: phalāni khādituṃ citte uppanne paṭiggahāpetvā khādituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:488_0: Bhikkhu paṭiggahaṇārahaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ manussānaṃ yāne ṭhapetvā maggaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:488_4: Nāvāya ṭhapetvā nāvaṃ arittena vā pājeti,
atk-vin02a1:488_7: Cāṭiyaṃ kuṇḍake vā ṭhapetvāpi taṃ anupasampannena gāhāpetvā anupasampannaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā tarituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:488_8: Tasmimpi asati anupasampannaṃ gāhāpetvā taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā tarituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:489_1: Sāmaṇerā bhikkhūnaṃ taṇḍule gahetvā attano taṇḍule gahetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-vin02a1:489_3: Sāmaṇerā attanā gahitataṇḍulesu khīṇesu itarehi taṇḍulehi yāguṃ pacitvā sabbesaṃ pattāni paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā yāguṃ ākiranti.
atk-vin02a1:489_4: Paṇḍito sāmaṇero attano pattaṃ gahetvā therassa deti,
atk-vin02a1:489_5: therassa pattaṃ anutherassāti evaṃ sabbāni parivatteti,
atk-vin02a1:489_6: sabbehi sāmaṇerassa santakaṃ bhuttaṃ hoti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:490_1: attano patte yāguṃ sayameva pātuṃ ārabhati,
atk-vin02a1:490_2: “āvuso tuyhaṃ yāguṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ therehi paṭipāṭiyā yācitvāpi pivituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:490_4: neva uggahitapaccayā na sannidhipaccayā vajjaṃ phusanti.
atk-vin02a1:490_5: Ettha pana mātāpitūnaṃ telādīni chāyādīnaṃ atthāya sākhādīni ca harantānaṃ imesañca viseso na dissati.
atk-vin02a1:491_0: Sāmaṇero bhattaṃ pacitukāmo taṇḍule dhovitvā niccāletuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-vin02a1:491_1: Bhikkhunā taṇḍule ca bhājanañca paṭiggahetvā taṇḍule dhovitvā niccāletvā bhājanaṃ uddhanaṃ āropetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:491_6: Rajassa vā chārikāya vā apatanatthāya vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:492_3: Bhikkhunā sataṇḍulodakabhājanaṃ paṭiggahetvā uddhanaṃ āropetvā aggiṃ jāletvā gacchāhīti vattabbo.
atk-vin02a1:492_4: Tato paraṃ purimanayeneva sabbaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:493_0: Bhikkhu yāguatthāya suddhaṃ bhājanaṃ āropetvā udakaṃ tāpeti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:493_2: tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā aggi na kātabbo.
atk-vin02a1:494_6: Sace pana dabbiṃ vā uḷuṅkaṃ vā gahetvā anukkhipanto āluḷeti,
atk-vin02a1:495_0: Bhikkhunā piṇḍāya caritvā ādhārake patto ṭhapito hoti,
atk-vin02a1:495_1: tatra ce añño lolabhikkhu kīḷanto pattaṃ āmasati,
atk-vin02a1:495_3: tasseva tato laddhaṃ bhattaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:495_6: Tatthajātakaphalāni sākhāya vā valliyā vā gahetvā cāleti,
atk-vin02a1:495_7: tasseva tato laddhaṃ phalaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:495_9: Phalarukkhaṃ pana apassayituṃ vā tattha kaṇḍake vā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:496_0: Araññe patitaṃ pana ambaphalādiṃ disvā sāmaṇerassa dassāmīti āharitvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:496_1: Sīhavighāsādiṃ disvāpi sāmaṇerassa dassāmīti paṭiggahetvā vā appaṭiggahetvā vā āharitvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:496_4: neva āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇapaccayā na uggahitakapaccayā vajjaṃ phusati.
atk-vin02a1:497_0: Mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya telādīni gahetvā gacchato antarāmagge byādhi uppajjati,
atk-vin02a1:497_6: te tatoyeva yāguādīni sampādetvā tassa denti,
atk-vin02a1:497_7: vaṭṭati sannidhipaccayā vā uggahitakapaccayā vā doso natthi.
atk-vin02a1:498_4: Dīghasaṇḍāsena thālakaṃ gahetvā telaṃ pacantassa chārikā patati,
atk-vin02a1:498_6: Sace aṅgārāpi dārūni vā paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitāni,
atk-vin02a1:500_0: Bhikkhu guḷaṃ bhājento paṭiggahetvā koṭṭhāse karoti,
atk-vin02a1:500_1: bhikkhūpi sāmaṇerāpi āgantvā ekagahaṇeneva ekamekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-vin02a1:500_3: Sace lolasāmaṇero gaṇhitvā gaṇhitvā puna ṭhapeti,
atk-vin02a1:501_1: mukhañca kaṇṭho ca manosilāya litto viya hoti,
atk-vin02a1:502_0: Pattaṃ vā rajanaṃ vā pacantassa kaṇṇanāsamukhacchiddehi dhūmo pavisati,
atk-vin02a1:502_1: byādhipaccayā pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā upasiṅghati,
atk-vin02a1:502_5: Mukhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ pana ajjhoharato vikāle āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:503_0: Upakaṭṭhe kāle nirudakaṭṭhāne bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā kakkhāretvā dve tayo kheḷapiṇḍe pātetvā udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:503_3: Loṇe asati samuddodakena loṇakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:504_1: Sace pana mukhe ca hatthe ca laggati,
atk-vin02a1:504_6: Sace sanditvā kandarādīni pavisitvā nadiṃ pūreti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:505_0: Pānīyaghaṭe sareṇukāni vā savaṇṭakhīrāni vā pupphāni pakkhittāni honti,
atk-vin02a1:505_6: Bhikkhunā ṭhapitapupphavāsitakapānīyato sāmaṇero pānīyaṃ gahetvā pītāvasesaṃ tattheva ākirati,
atk-vin02a1:505_8: Padumasarādīsu udakaṃ santharitvā ṭhitaṃ pupphareṇuṃ ghaṭena vikkhambhetvā udakaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:505_9: Kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:506_5: Assu kheḷo siṅghāṇikā muttaṃ karīsaṃ semhaṃ dantamalaṃ akkhigūthako kaṇṇagūthako sarīre uṭṭhitaloṇanti idaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:506_6: Yaṃ panettha ṭhānato cavitvā patte vā hatthe vā patati,
atk-vin02a1:506_9: Uṇhaṃpāyāsaṃ bhuñjantassa sedo aṅgulianusārena ekābaddhova hutvā pāyāse santiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:506_10: piṇḍāya vā carantassa hatthato pattassa mukhavaṭṭiṃto vā pattatalaṃ orohati,
atk-vin02a1:506_12: Jhāmamahābhūtesu idaṃ nāma na vaṭṭatīti natthi,
atk-vin02a1:506_14: Sujjhāpitaṃ manussaṭṭhimpi cuṇṇaṃ katvā lehe upanetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:507_0: Cattāri mahāvikaṭāni asati kappiyakārake sāmampi gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:507_1: Ettha ca dubbacopi asamatthopi kappiyakārako asantapakkheyeva tiṭṭhati.
atk-vin02a1:507_2: Chārikāya asati sukkhadāruṃ jhāpetvā chārikā gahetabbā.
atk-vin02a1:507_3: Sukkhadārumhi asati alladāruṃ rukkhato chinditvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:507_4: Idaṃ pana catubbidhampi mahāvikaṭaṃ kālodissaṃ nāma sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:508_1: kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:513_4: Deti āpatti pācittiyassāti samatittikaṃ yāgupattaṃ ekapayogena deti,
atk-vin02a1:513_9: Titthiye atitthiyasaññīti mātā vā pitā vā titthiyesu pabbajati,
atk-vin02a1:514_1: Upanikkhipitvā detīti tathārūpe bhājane ṭhapetvā taṃ bhājanaṃ tesaṃ santike bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā deti,
atk-vin02a1:514_2: tesaṃ vā bhājanaṃ nikkhipāpetvā tattha deti,
atk-vin02a1:514_3: pattaṃ ādhārake vā bhūmiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvāpi “ito gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:514_4: Sace titthiyo vadati “mayhaṃ nāma idaṃ santakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:514_6: Tassa santakattā sahatthā dānaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:519_2: Dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijahantassāti ettha yadi ṭhito vā nisinno vā uyyojeti;
atk-vin02a1:519_6: Tasmiṃ pana vijahantepi atthato itarena vijahitameva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:519_9: Tattha sace upacārabbhantare eko pādo hoti, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:519_16: Na añño koci paccayo hotīti ṭhapetvā vuttappakāramanācāraṃ aññaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:520_4: kodhavasena ṭhānanisajjādīsu dosaṃ dassetvā “passatha bho imassa ṭhānaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:520_5: nisajjaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ khāṇuko viya tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:520_7: makkaṭo viya ito cito ca viloketī”ti evaṃ amanāpavacanaṃ vadati “appeva nāma imināpi ubbāḷho pakkameyyā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:521_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:524_3: Yato ayyassa bhikkhā dinnāti yasmā bhikkhā dinnā,
atk-vin02a1:524_4: yaṃ āgatena laddhabbaṃ taṃ vo laddhaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:525_4: Rāgapariyuṭṭhitassa hi purisassa itthī bhogo itthiyā ca puriso.
atk-vin02a1:525_8: Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvāti tassa sayanighare gabbhassa yo piṭṭhasaṅghāṭo,
atk-vin02a1:525_13: Tasmā yathā vā tathā vā katassa khuddakassa sayanigharassa majjhātikkame āpatti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:531_2: dethāvuso bhattanti ettha taṃ kira bhattaṃ abhihaṭaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin02a1:531_4: Anabhihaṭe pana evaṃ vattuṃ na labbhati,
atk-vin02a1:532_1: Tena hi bhikkhave paṭiggahetvā nikkhipathāti idaṃ pana bhagavā kulassa saddhānurakkhaṇatthāya āha.
atk-vin02a1:532_5: gharaṃyeva naṃ gahetvā agamaṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:533_1: Santaṃ bhikkhunti ettha kittāvatā santo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:533_3: Antovihāre yattha ṭhitassa kulāni payirupāsanacittaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:533_4: tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ passe vā abhimukhe vā passati,
atk-vin02a1:533_7: Ito cito ca pariyesitvā ārocanakiccaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a1:533_10: Apica antoupacārasīmāya bhikkhuṃ disvā āpucchissāmīti gantvā tattha yaṃ passati,
atk-vin02a1:533_13: asantaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā paviṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:534_3: Bhattiyagharanti nimantitagharaṃ vā salākabhattādidāyakānaṃ vā gharaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:538_2: mahānāmo nāma bhagavato cūḷapituputto māsamattena mahallakataro dvīsu phalesu patiṭṭhito ariyasāvako.
atk-vin02a1:538_3: Bhesajjaṃ ussannaṃ hotīti vajato āharitvā ṭhapitasappi bahu hoti.
atk-vin02a1:539_1: Sāditabbāti tasmiṃ samaye rogo natthīti na paṭikkhipitabbā;
atk-vin02a1:539_3: Ettakehi bhesajjehi pavāremīti nāmavasena sappitelādīsu dvīhi tīhi vā parimāṇavasena patthena nāḷiyā
atk-vin02a1:539_4: āḷhakenāti vā.Aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ viññāpetīti sappinā pavārito telaṃ viññāpeti,
atk-vin02a1:539_6: Na bhesajjena karaṇīyenāti missakabhattenapi ce yāpetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-vin02a1:540_1: Pavāritānanti ye attano puggalikāya pavāraṇāya pavāritā;
atk-vin02a1:544_2: parasenaṃ abhimukho gamissāmīti nagarato niggatoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:545_1: Dvādasapuriso hatthīti cattāro ārohakā ekekapādarakkhakā dve dveti evaṃ dvādasapuriso hoti.
atk-vin02a1:545_2: Tipuriso assoti eko ārohako dve pādarakkhakāti evaṃ tipuriso hoti.
atk-vin02a1:545_3: Catupuriso rathoti eko sārathi eko yodho dve āṇirakkhakāti evaṃ catupuriso hoti.
atk-vin02a1:545_4: Cattāro purisā sarahatthāti āvudhahatthā cattāro purisāti ayaṃ pacchimakoṭiyā caturaṅgasamannāgatā senā nāma.
atk-vin02a1:545_5: Īdisaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gacchato pade pade dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:545_6: Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvāti kenaci antaritā vā ninnaṃ oruḷhā vā na dissati;
atk-vin02a1:545_7: idha ṭhatvā na sakkā daṭṭhunti aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā passato payoge payoge pācittiyanti attho.
atk-vin02a1:546_3: Anuyyuttā nāma rājā uyyānaṃ vā nadiṃ vā gacchati;
atk-vin02a1:547_1: Āpadāsūti jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyesu sati ettha gato muñcissāmīti gacchato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:550_1: atthaṅgate sūriye senāya vasatīti tiṭṭhatu vā nisīdatu vā sayatu vā sacepi ākāse iddhiyā kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappeti,
atk-vin02a1:550_3: Senā vā paṭisenāya ruddhā hotīti yathā sañcāro chijjati;
atk-vin02a1:550_5: Palibuddhoti verikena vā issarena vā ruddho.
atk-vin02a1:553_7: Tayo hatthī pacchimaṃ hatthānīkanti yo pubbe vutto dvādasapuriso hatthīti tena hatthinā tayo hatthī.
atk-vin02a1:553_9: Sesaṃ uyyuttasenāsikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:558_3: so bhaddikāya vatiyā samannāgatattā etaṃ nāma labhi.
atk-vin02a1:558_5: Tejasā tejanti attano tejasā ānubhāvena nāgassa tejaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:558_8: Ananucchaviyaṃ bhikkhave sāgatassāti pañcābhiññassa sato majjapānaṃ nāma na anucchaviyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:559_2: Phalāsavo nāma muddikaphalādīni madditvā tesaṃ rasena kato.
atk-vin02a1:559_7: nāḷikerādīnampi rasena katā surātveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:559_8: tassāyeva kiṇṇapakkhittāya maṇḍe gahite merayotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti vadanti.
atk-vin02a1:559_9: Antamaso kusaggenapi pivatīti etaṃ suraṃ vā merayaṃ vā bījato paṭṭhāya kusaggena pivatopi pācittiyanti attho.
atk-vin02a1:559_10: Ekena pana payogena bahumpi pivantassa ekā āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:560_1: Amajjañca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasanti loṇasovīrakaṃ vā suttaṃ vā hoti.
atk-vin02a1:560_2: Sūpasampāketi vāsagāhāpanatthaṃ īsakaṃ majjaṃ pakkhipitvā sūpaṃ pacanti,
atk-vin02a1:560_5: Telaṃ pana vātabhesajjatthaṃ majjena saddhiṃ pacanti,
atk-vin02a1:560_10: Amajjaṃ ariṭṭhanti yo ariṭṭho majjaṃ na hoti,
atk-vin02a1:563_4: Anupasampannaṃ kāyena kāyanti ettha bhikkhunīpi anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitā,
atk-vin02a1:567_0: 335. Tatiye – appakataññunoti yaṃ bhagavatā pakataṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ na jānantīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:568_4: Nimujjati vātiādīsu nimujjanatthāya orohantassa padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:568_6: Nimujjitvā antoudakeyeva gacchantassa hatthavārapadavāresu sabbattha pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:568_12: Tīrato vā rukkhato vā udake patati,
atk-vin02a1:568_14: Nāvāya kīḷatīti phiyārittādīhi nāvaṃ pājento vā tīre ussārento vā nāvāya kīḷati, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:569_1: Keci hatthena udake khittāya kathalāya patanuppatanavāresu dukkaṭaṃ vadanti,
atk-vin02a1:569_4: apica uparigopphake vuttāni ummujjanādīni ṭhapetvā aññena yena kenaci ākārena udakaṃ otaritvā vā anotaritvā
atk-vin02a1:569_5: vā yattha katthaci ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ antamaso binduṃ gahetvā khipanakīḷāyapi kīḷantassa dukkaṭameva,
atk-vin02a1:573_2: kathāyaṃ nasseyyāti kathaṃ ayaṃ dhammo tanti paveṇī nasseyya.
atk-vin02a1:573_3: Taṃ vā na sikkhitukāmoti yena paññattena vuccati,
atk-vin02a1:573_5: Apaññattenāti sutte vā abhidhamme vā āgatena.
atk-vin02a1:574_1: Evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggahoti ettha gārayho ācariyuggaho na gahetabbo;
atk-vin02a1:574_5: Mahāpaccariyaṃ “suttaṃ suttānulomañca uggahitakānaṃyeva ācariyānaṃ uggaho pamāṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:575_1: kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:581_4: Taṃ pana migānaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:583_1: Sayaṃ samādahatīti ettha jotiṃ samādahitukāmatāya araṇisaṇṭhapanato paṭṭhāya yāva jālā na uṭṭhahati,
atk-vin02a1:583_3: Paṭilātaṃ ukkhipatīti dayhamānaṃ alātaṃ patitaṃ ukkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:584_1: Tathārūpapaccayāti ṭhapetvā padīpādīni aññenapi tathārūpena paccayena samādahantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:587_1: cuṇṇena vā mattikāya vāti ettha cuṇṇamattikānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:588_1: Pāraṃ gacchanto nhāyatīti ettha sukkhāya nadiyā vālikaṃ ukkiritvā kataāvāṭakesupi nhāyituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:588_2: Āpadāsūti bhamarādīhi anubaddhassa udake nimujjituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-vin02a1:591_1: navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhenāti ettha alabhīti labho;
atk-vin02a1:591_8: Padabhājane pana byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā yaṃ laddhaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ “cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:591_9: Cīvaranti ettha yaṃ nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā sakkā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:591_13: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “ayomalaṃ lohamalaṃ etaṃ kaṃsanīlaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:591_15: Dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ ādātabbanti etaṃ kappabinduṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:591_17: Tañca pana kappaṃ ādiyantena cīvaraṃ rajitvā catūsu vā koṇesu tīsu vā dvīsu vā ekasmiṃ vā koṇe morassa
atk-vin02a1:591_19: Mahāpaccariyaṃ “patte vā gaṇṭhiyaṃ vā na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:591_22: tasmā ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vaṭṭabinduṃ aññena kenacipi vikārena kappo na kātabbo.
atk-vin02a1:592_1: Aggaḷetiādīsu etāni aggaḷādīni kappakatacīvare pacchā āropetvā kappakaraṇakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a1:595_1: tassa vā adinnanti cīvarasāmikassa “paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti evaṃ vatvā adinnaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:595_2: Tassa vā avissasantoti yena vinayakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:595_4: Tena pana dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsena vā paribhuñjantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:598_4: Dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvāti “samaṇena nāma anihitaparikkhārena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti evaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā dassāmīti nikkhipato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:604_2: na hettha kiñci viyojite sīsālaṅkāre sīsaṃ viya jīvitā voropite pāṇepi jīvitaṃ nāma visuṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:604_4: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ padabhājane “jīvitindriyaṃ upacchindatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:604_6: Taṃ khuddakampi mahantampi mārentassa āpattinānākaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a1:604_8: Pāṇe pāṇasaññīti antamaso mañcapīṭhaṃ sodhento maṅgulabījakepi pāṇasaññī nikkāruṇikatāya taṃ bhindanto apaneti,
atk-vin02a1:604_10: Tasmā evarūpesu ṭhānesu kāruññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā appamattena vattaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:604_11: Sesaṃ manussaviggahe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:607_3: tādisañhi jānaṃ paribhuñjato payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:607_4: Pattapūrampi avicchinditvā ekapayogena pivato ekā āpatti.
