atk-vin02a1:607_5: Tādisena udakena sāmisaṃ pattaṃ āviñchitvā dhovatopi tādise udake uṇhayāgupattaṃ nibbāpayatopi taṃ udakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:607_6: hatthena vā uḷuṅkena vā gahetvā nhāyatopi payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:607_7: Udakasoṇḍiṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā pavisitvā bahinikkhamanatthāya vīciṃ uṭṭhāpayatopi.
atk-vin02a1:607_8: Soṇḍiṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā sodhentehi tato gahitaudakaṃ udakeyeva āsiñcitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:607_9: Samīpamhi udake asati kappiyaudakassa aṭṭha vā dasa vā ghaṭe udakasaṇṭhānakappadese āsiñcitvā tattha āsiñcitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:607_11: Kappiyaudakena pana pāsāṇaṃ nibbāpetvā āsiñcituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:608_0: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:609_2: Ettha ca paṭaṅgapāṇakānaṃ patanaṃ ñatvāpi suddhacittatāya dīpajālane viya sappāṇakabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi udakasaññāya
atk-vin02a1:612_2: ukkoṭentīti tassa tassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā “akataṃ kamma”ntiādīni vadantā uccālenti;
atk-vin02a1:613_1: Yathādhammanti yo yassa adhikaraṇassa vūpasamanāya dhammo vutto,
atk-vin02a1:614_1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññīti yena kammena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamitaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:614_3: tasmiṃ dhammakamme ayampi dhammakammasaññī hutvā yadi ukkoṭeti,
atk-vin02a1:614_7: vitthāro pana “imesaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ kati ukkoṭanā”tiādinā nayena parivāre vutto.
atk-vin02a1:614_8: Aṭṭhakathāsu taṃ sabbaṃ āharitvā tassevattho vaṇṇito.
atk-vin02a1:614_10: Idha āharitvā vaṇṇiyamāne hi suṭṭhutaraṃ sammoho bhaveyyāti na vaṇṇayimha.
atk-vin02a1:617_2: duṭṭhullā nāma āpattīti ettha cattāri pārājikāni atthuddhāravasena dassitāni,
atk-vin02a1:617_9: Sace pana evaṃ dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā paṭicchādanatthameva aññassa āroceti,
atk-vin02a1:617_10: sopi aññassāti etenupāyena samaṇasatampi samaṇasahassampi āpattiṃ āpajjatiyeva tāva,
atk-vin02a1:617_19: Āpattiṃ āpanno pana ekassa bhikkhuno āroceti,
atk-vin02a1:617_23: evaṃ tatiyena puggalena dutiyassa ārocite koṭi chinnā hotī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:618_2: Anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṃ vā aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāranti ettha anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhi ca kāyasaṃsaggo cāti ayaṃ duṭṭhullaajjhācāro nāma.
atk-vin02a1:621_2: aṅguliyo dukkhā bhavissantīti akkharāni likhantassa aṅguliyo dukkhā bhavissantīti cintesuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:621_3: Urassa dukkhoti gaṇanaṃ sikkhantena bahuṃ cintetabbaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:621_5: Akkhīni dukkhā bhavissantīti rūpasuttaṃ sikkhantena kahāpaṇā parivattetvā parivattetvā passitabbā honti,
atk-vin02a1:622_4: gabbhavīsopi hi paripuṇṇavīsativassotveva saṅkhye gacchati. Yathāha –
atk-vin02a1:623_0: “Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo gabbhavīso upasampanno hoti.
atk-vin02a1:623_8: Yaṃ bhikkhave mātukucchimhi paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:623_9: paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ tadupādāya sāvassa jāti.
atk-vin02a1:624_0: Tattha yo dvādasamāse mātukucchismiṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya jāto,
atk-vin02a1:624_1: so tato paṭṭhāya yāva ekūnavīsatime vasse mahāpavāraṇā,
atk-vin02a1:625_0: Porāṇakattherā pana ekūnavīsativassaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma pāṭipadadivase upasampādenti,
atk-vin02a1:625_3: Iti vīsatiyā vassesu cattāro māsā parihāyanti.
atk-vin02a1:625_4: Rājāno tatiye tatiye vasse vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhanti.
atk-vin02a1:625_5: Iti aṭṭhārasasu vassesu cha māsā vaḍḍhanti,
atk-vin02a1:625_6: tato uposathavasena parihīne cattāro māse apanetvā dve māsā avasesā honti,
atk-vin02a1:625_7: te dve māse gahetvā vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni hontīti nikkaṅkhā hutvā nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma pāṭipade upasampādenti.
atk-vin02a1:625_8: Ettha pana yo pavāretvā vīsativasso bhavissati,
atk-vin02a1:626_1: Anāpatti ūnavīsativassaṃ paripuṇṇavīsativassasaññīti ettha kiñcāpi upasampādentassa anāpatti,
atk-vin02a1:626_3: Sace pana so dasavassaccayena aññaṃ upasampādeti,
atk-vin02a1:627_0: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:632_1: Rājānaṃ vā theyyaṃ gacchantīti rājānaṃ vā thenetvā vañcetvā rañño santakaṃ kiñci gahetvā idāni na tassa dassāmāti gacchanti.
atk-vin02a1:633_1: Visaṅketenāti kālavisaṅketena divasavisaṅketena ca gacchato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:636_1: padhūpento nisīdīti pajjhāyanto attānaṃyeva paribhāsanto nisīdi.
atk-vin02a1:636_2: Nāyyo so bhikkhu maṃ nippātesīti ayyo ayaṃ bhikkhu maṃ na nikkhāmesi;
atk-vin02a1:636_4: Sesamettha bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhānasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:640_9: te pana yāva ariye na khamāpenti tāvadeva,
atk-vin02a1:640_13: na vuṭṭhāti vā na deseti vā tāvadeva,
atk-vin02a1:641_0: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu bahussuto dhammakathiko sesantarāyike jānāti,
atk-vin02a1:641_1: vinaye pana akovidattā paṇṇattivītikkamantarāyike na jānāti,
atk-vin02a1:641_3: “ime āgārikā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi honti,
atk-vin02a1:641_11: Evaṃ rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvā sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thūlavākehi
atk-vin02a1:641_12: saddhiṃ atisukhumasuttaṃ ghaṭento viya sāsapena saddhiṃ sineruṃ upasaṃharanto viya pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ
atk-vin02a1:641_13: uppādetvā “kiṃ bhagavatā mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya mahatā ussāhena paṭhamapārājikaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:641_14: natthi ettha doso”ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanto bhabbapuggalānaṃ āsaṃ chindanto jinassa āṇācakke pahāramadāsi. Tenāha –
atk-vin02a1:646_1: akaṭānudhammenāti anudhammo vuccati āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge
atk-vin02a1:646_2: vā dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena ukkhittakassa anulomavattaṃ disvā katā osāraṇā;
atk-vin02a1:646_3: so osāraṇasaṅkhāto anudhammo yassa na kato,
atk-vin02a1:646_6: Tenevassa padabhājane “akaṭānudhammo nāma ukkhitto anosārito”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:647_0: Deti vā paṭiggaṇhāti vāti ekapayogena bahumpi dadato vā gaṇhato vā ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:647_1: Vicchinditvā vicchinditvā dentassa ca gaṇhantassa ca payogagaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
atk-vin02a1:650_1: diṭṭhigataṃ uppannanti ariṭṭhassa viya etassāpi ayoniso ummujjantassa uppannaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:650_6: Tattha āpattiyā adassanādīsu ukkhepanā saṃvāsanāsanā nāma.
atk-vin02a1:650_7: “Dūsako nāsetabbo mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti ayaṃ liṅganāsanā nāma.
atk-vin02a1:650_8: “Ajjatagge te āvuso samaṇuddesa na ceva so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo”ti ayaṃ daṇḍakammanāsanā nāma.
atk-vin02a1:651_3: Sesaṃ ariṭṭhasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:656_2: etasmiṃ sikkhāpadeti etasmiṃ sikkhāpade yaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:656_4: Āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha pana vācāya vācāya āpatti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:656_5: Sikkhamānena bhikkhave bhikkhunāti ovādaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā sikkhitukāmeneva hutvā ājānitabbañceva pucchitabbañca upaparikkhitabbañca.
atk-vin02a1:660_3: Vinayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti vinayassa vaṇṇo nāma pañcannampi sattannampi āpattikkhandhānaṃ vasena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā padabhājanena vaṇṇanā,
atk-vin02a1:660_5: Vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇantānaṃ vinayapariyattimūlakaṃ vaṇṇaṃ guṇaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ bhāsati.
atk-vin02a1:660_6: Vinayadharo hi vinayapariyattimūlake pañcānisaṃse chānisaṃse sattānisaṃse aṭṭhānisaṃse navānisaṃse dasānisaṃse
atk-vin02a1:660_7: ekādasānisaṃse ca labhati te sabbe bhāsatīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:662_0: Kathamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito?
atk-vin02a1:662_1: Idhekacco bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjanto chahākārehi āpajjati – alajjitā, aññāṇatā,
atk-vin02a1:666_1: Aññāṇapuggalo hi mando momūho kattabbākattabbaṃ ajānanto akattabbaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a1:667_1: Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vinayadharaṃ pucchitvā kappiyañce kattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-vin02a1:670_2: evamidhekacco bhikkhu imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:671_0: Vinayadharo pana imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ nāpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:671_3: ayaṃ kappiyākappiyaṃ jānantoyeva paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karotī”ti imaṃ parūpavādaṃ rakkhantopi nāpajjati;
atk-vin02a1:671_5: Sahasā āpannampi desanāgāminiṃ desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhahitvā suddhante patiṭṭhāti. Tato –
atk-vin02a1:672_0: “Sañcicca āpattiṃ na āpajjati, āpattiṃ na parigūhati;
atk-vin02a1:673_0: Agatigamanañca na gacchati, ediso vuccati lajjipuggalo”ti.
atk-vin02a1:676_1: So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vatthuṃ oloketvā mātikaṃ padabhājanaṃ antarāpattiṃ āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a1:677_9: evamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito.
atk-vin02a1:678_1: Tiroraṭṭhesu tirojanapadesu ca uppannakukkuccā bhikkhū “asukasmiṃ kira vihāre vinayadharo vasatī”ti dūratopi
atk-vin02a1:678_3: so tehi katassa kammassa vatthuṃ oloketvā āpattānāpattigarukalahukādibhedaṃ sallakkhetvā desanāgāminiṃ
atk-vin02a1:679_0: Visārado saṅghamajjhe voharatīti avinayadharassa hi saṅghamajjhe kathentassa bhayaṃ sārajjaṃ okkamati,
atk-vin02a1:680_0: Paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhātīti ettha dvidhā paccatthikā nāma –
atk-vin02a1:680_2: Tattha mettiyabhummajakā ca bhikkhū vaḍḍho ca licchavī amūlakena antimavatthunā codesuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:680_7: mahāsaṅghikādayo ca abuddhasāsanaṃ “buddhasāsana”nti vatvā katapaggahā sāsanapaccatthikā nāma.
atk-vin02a1:680_8: Te sabbepi sahadhammena sakāraṇena vacanena yathā taṃ asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-vin02a1:681_0: Saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti ettha pana tividho saddhammo pariyattipaṭipattiadhigamavasena.
atk-vin02a1:681_2: Terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dveasīti mahāvattānīti ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma.
atk-vin02a1:681_3: Cattāro maggā ca phalāni cāti ayaṃ adhigamasaddhammo nāma.
atk-vin02a1:682_1: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
atk-vin02a1:682_2: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti iminā suttena “sāsanassa pariyatti mūla”nti vadanti.
atk-vin02a1:682_3: Keci therā “ime ca subhadda bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:682_4: asuñño loko arahantehi assā”ti iminā suttena “sāsanassa paṭipattimūla”nti vatvā “yāva pañca bhikkhū sammā paṭipannā saṃvijjanti,
atk-vin02a1:682_6: Itare pana therā pariyattiyā antarahitāya suppaṭipannassapi dhammābhisamayo natthī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:682_7: Sace pañca bhikkhū cattāri pārājikāni rakkhaṇakā honti,
atk-vin02a1:682_8: te saddhe kulaputte pabbājetvā paccantime janapade upasampādetvā dasavaggaṃ gaṇaṃ pūretvā majjhime janapadepi upasampadaṃ karissanti,
atk-vin02a1:682_9: etenupāyena vīsativaggagaṇaṃ saṅghaṃ pūretvā attanopi abbhānakammaṃ katvā sāsanaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gamayissanti.
atk-vin02a1:682_10: Evamayaṃ vinayadharo tividhassāpi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti evamayaṃ vinayadharo ime tāva pañcānisaṃse paṭilabhatīti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:685_2: saṅghe pavāraṇā gaṇe puggale pavāraṇā, tevācikā,
atk-vin02a1:686_0: Yānipi imāni apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakammanti cattāri saṅghakammāni,
atk-vin02a1:687_0: Yāpi cāyaṃ upajjhāyena hutvā kulaputtānaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca kātabbā,
atk-vin02a1:687_2: Na hi añño dvipiṭakadharopi etaṃ kātuṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a1:687_7: Sāmaṇerūpaṭṭhānaṃ paccāsīsanto pana vinayadharassa santike upajjhaṃ gāhāpetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ sādituṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a1:688_0: Iti imesu chasu ānisaṃsesu ekena saddhiṃ purimā pañca cha honti,
atk-vin02a1:688_5: sabbehi petehi saddhiṃ ekādasāti evaṃ vinayadharo puggalo pañca cha satta aṭṭha nava dasa ekādasa ca ānisaṃse labhatīti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:688_6: Evaṃ bhagavā ime ānisaṃse dassento vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:689_0: Ādissa ādissāti punappunaṃ vavatthapetvā visuṃ visuṃ katvā.
atk-vin02a1:689_1: Āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya upālittherassa guṇaṃ bhāsati thometi pasaṃsati. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:689_2: Appeva nāma mama vaṇṇanaṃ sutvāpi bhikkhū upālissa santike vinayaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:690_0: Tedha bahū bhikkhūti te imaṃ bhagavato vaṇṇanaṃ sutvā “ime kirānisaṃse neva suttantikā na ābhidhammikā
atk-vin02a1:690_1: labhantī”ti yathāparikittitānisaṃsādhigame ussāhajātā bahū bhikkhū therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca āyasmato
atk-vin02a1:690_2: upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti ayamettha attho.
atk-vin02a1:691_2: so pana yasmā ācariye attano ruciyā uddisante vā ācariyaṃ yācitvā antevāsikena uddisāpente vā yo naṃ dhāreti,
atk-vin02a1:691_3: tasmiṃ sajjhāyaṃ karonte vā uddissamāno nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:691_4: tasmā “uddisante vā uddisāpente vā sajjhāyaṃ vā karonte”ti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:691_10: tesaṃ tāva saṃvattanti yāva “kappati nu kho,
atk-vin02a1:691_11: na kappati nu kho”ti kukkuccasaṅkhāto vippaṭisāro vihesā vicikicchāsaṅkhāto manovilekho ca uppajjatiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:691_14: kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya ativiya saṃvattantiyevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:691_15: Upasampannassa vinayaṃ vivaṇṇetīti upasampannassa santike tassa tasmiṃ vimatiṃ uppādetukāmo vinayaṃ vivaṇṇeti nindati garahati.
atk-vin02a1:695_5: Yasmā pana so pātimokkhuddesake uddisante uddisiyamāno nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:695_7: Yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpannoti tasmiṃ anācāre ciṇṇe yaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno.
atk-vin02a1:695_8: Yathādhammo kāretabboti aññāṇena āpannattā tassā āpattiyā mokkho natthi,
atk-vin02a1:695_9: yathā pana dhammo ca vinayo ca ṭhito,
atk-vin02a1:699_3: pādadhovanaṃ āharathā”tiādīni vatvā tathā akarontānaṃ pahāraṃ denti.
atk-vin02a1:700_1: Pahāraṃ deti āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha paharitukāmatāya pahāre dinne sacepi marati pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a1:700_2: Pahārena hattho vā pādo vā bhijjati,
atk-vin02a1:700_6: tathā naṃ karomī”ti evaṃ virūpakaraṇādhippāyena kaṇṇaṃ vā nāsaṃ vā chindati, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:701_1: Anupasampannassāti gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā itthiyā vā purisassa vā antamaso tiracchānagatassāpi pahāraṃ deti, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:702_1: Kenaci viheṭhiyamānoti manussena vā tiracchānagatena vā viheṭhiyamāno.
atk-vin02a1:702_3: Pahāraṃ detīti kāyakāyapaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ aññatarena pahāraṃ deti, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:702_4: Sacepi antarāmagge coraṃ vā paccatthikaṃ vā viheṭhetukāmaṃ disvā “upāsaka,
atk-vin02a1:702_6: mā āgamī”ti vatvā vacanaṃ anādiyitvā āgacchantaṃ “gaccha re”ti muggarena vā satthakena vā paharitvā yāti,
atk-vin02a1:705_1: talasattikaṃ uggirantīti pahāradānākāraṃ dassetvā kāyampi kāyapaṭibaddhampi uccārenti.
atk-vin02a1:705_2: Te pahārasamuccitā rodantīti te pahāraparicitā pubbepi laddhapahārattā idāni ca pahāraṃ dassantīti maññamānā rodantīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:706_1: Uggirati āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha sace uggiritvā viraddho pahāraṃ deti,
atk-vin02a1:706_2: avassaṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontassa pahāro sahasā patati,
atk-vin02a1:707_1: Mokkhādhippāyo talasattikaṃ uggiratīti ettha pubbe vuttesu vatthūsu purimanayeneva talasattikaṃ uggirantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:710_1: anuddhaṃsentīti te kira sayaṃ ākiṇṇadosattā “evaṃ bhikkhū amhe neva codessanti,
atk-vin02a1:710_2: na sāressantī”ti attaparittāṇaṃ karontā paṭikacceva bhikkhū amūlakena saṅghādisesena codenti.
atk-vin02a1:714_2: Kukkuccaṃ upadahati āpatti pācittiyassāti vācāya vācāya āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:714_4: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho maññe tayā nisinnaṃ nipannaṃ bhuttaṃ pītaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:714_5: saṅghamajjhe idañcidañca katantiādinā nayena kukkuccaṃ upadahati,
atk-vin02a1:717_3: yattha ṭhatvā sakkā hoti tesaṃ vacanaṃ sotuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:717_5: Gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:718_3: Attānaṃ parimocessāmīti mama akārakabhāvaṃ kathetvā attānaṃ mocessāmi.
atk-vin02a1:719_3: siyā akiriyaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā mantayamānānaṃ ajānāpanavasena,
atk-vin02a1:719_4: rūpiyaṃ aññavādakaṃ upassutīti imāni hi tīṇi sikkhāpadāni ekaparicchedāni,
atk-vin02a1:722_1: sace ca mayaṃ jāneyyāmāti sace mayaṃ jāneyyāma;
atk-vin02a1:722_3: Dhammikānanti dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena katattā dhammā etesu atthīti dhammikāni;
atk-vin02a1:722_5: Khiyyati āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:725_1: vatthu vā ārocitanti codakena ca cuditakena ca attano kathā kathitā,
atk-vin02a1:740_1: Pitaraṃ patthetīti antaraṃ passitvā ghātetuṃ icchati.
atk-vin02a1:740_2: Rājantepuraṃ hatthisammaddantiādīsu hatthīhi sammaddo etthāti hatthisammaddaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:740_9: rañño antepure hatthisammaddo atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:745_4: Ābharaṇaṃ omuñcitvāti mahālataṃ nāma navakoṭiagghanakaṃ alaṅkāraṃ apanetvā.
atk-vin02a1:747_1: Aparikkhittassa upacāroti ettha upacāro nāma ārāmassa dve leḍḍupātā –
atk-vin02a1:747_2: “āvasathassa pana suppapāto vā musalapāto vā”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:747_3: Uggaṇhāti āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha jātarūparajataṃ attano atthāya uggaṇhantassa vā uggaṇhāpentassa vā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:747_5: avasesaṃ muttādiratanaṃ attano vā saṅghādīnaṃ vā atthāya uggaṇhantassa vā uggaṇhāpentassa vā dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:747_7: antamaso mātu kaṇṇapiḷandhanatāḷapaṇṇampi gihisantakaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikasīsena paṭisāmentassa pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a1:748_0: Sace pana mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ avassaṃ paṭisāmetabbaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:748_2: “Idaṃ paṭisāmetvā dehī”ti vutte pana “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:748_6: Vihāre kammaṃ karontā vaḍḍhakīādayo vā rājavallabhā vā attano upakaraṇabhaṇḍaṃ vā sayanabhaṇḍaṃ vā “paṭisāmetvā dethā”ti vadanti,
atk-vin02a1:748_9: Balakkārena pātetvā gatesu ca paṭisāmetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:749_0: Ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vāti ettha sace mahāvihārasadiso mahārāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:749_1: tattha pākāraparikkhitte pariveṇe yattha bhikkhūhi vā sāmaṇerehi vā gahitaṃ bhavissatīti saṅkā uppajjati,
atk-vin02a1:749_2: tādise eva ṭhāne uggaṇhitvā vā uggaṇhāpetvā vā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:749_5: Kurundiyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “eko maggaṃ gacchanto nimanussaṭṭhāne kiñci bhaṇḍaṃ passati,
atk-vin02a1:749_6: ākiṇṇamanussepi jāte manussā tameva bhikkhuṃ āsaṅkanti,
atk-vin02a1:749_9: Sace sāmike na passati patirūpaṃ karissatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:750_0: Rūpena vā nimittena vā saññāṇaṃ katvāti ettha rūpaṃ nāma antobhaṇḍikāya bhaṇḍaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:750_1: tasmā bhaṇḍikaṃ muñcitvā gaṇetvā ettakā kahāpaṇā vā jātarūparajataṃ vāti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:750_3: tasmā lañchitāya bhaṇḍikāya mattikālañchananti vā lākhālañchananti vā nīlapilotikāya bhaṇḍikā katāti
atk-vin02a1:750_4: vā setapilotikāya katāti vā evamādi sabbaṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:751_2: Yo pana neva tamhā āvāsā pakkamati,
atk-vin02a1:751_5: thāvaraṃ pana senāsanaṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā pokkharaṇī vā kāretabbā.
atk-vin02a1:751_6: Sace dīghassa addhuno accayena sāmiko āgacchati,
atk-vin02a1:752_1: Ratanasammataṃ vissāsaṃ gaṇhātītiādīsu āmāsameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:756_3: Sace sambahulā kenaci kammena gāmaṃ pavisanti,
atk-vin02a1:756_5: Tasmiṃ gāme taṃ kammaṃ na sampajjatīti aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:756_8: Sace pana ussāhaṃ paṭippassambhetvā vihāraṃ gacchantā antarā aññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitukāmā honti,
atk-vin02a1:757_0: Kulaghare vā āsanasālāya vā bhattakiccaṃ katvā telabhikkhāya vā sappibhikkhāya vā caritukāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:757_8: tena gacchantassa telādibhikkhāya carissāmīti citte uppanne sace passe bhikkhu atthi,
atk-vin02a1:757_10: Maggā anokkamma bhikkhāya carantassa pana āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a1:757_11: aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:758_1: Antarārāmantiādīsu na kevalaṃ anāpucchā kāyabandhanaṃ abandhitvā saṅghāṭiṃ apārupitvā gacchantassapi anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:758_2: Āpadāsūti sīho vā byaggho vā āgacchati,
atk-vin02a1:758_4: añño vā koci upaddavo uppajjati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:758_5: Evarūpāsu āpadāsu bahigāmato antogāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:766_1: Chinditvā paribhuñjatīti ettha sace na chinditukāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:766_4: ukkhipitvā vā tulāsaṅghāṭe ṭhapetvā aṭṭaṃ katvā paribhuñjati,
atk-vin02a1:769_2: tūlaṃ pakkhipitvā upari cimilikāya onaddhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:772_7: Seyyathāpi purāṇāsikoṭṭhoti yathā nāma purāṇacammakāroti attho.
atk-vin02a1:772_8: Yathā hi cammakāro cammaṃ vitthataṃ karissāmīti ito cito ca samañchati, kaḍḍhati;
atk-vin02a1:772_11: “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthiyā vidatthimatte
atk-vin02a1:772_12: padese dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā tisso dasā kariyanti,
atk-vin02a1:775_6: yassa kaṇḍu vā piḷakā vā assāvo vā thullakacchu vā ābādho tassa kaṇḍupaṭicchādi”nti.
atk-vin02a1:776_1: Yassa adhonābhi ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalanti yassa bhikkhuno nābhiyā heṭṭhā jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ upari.
atk-vin02a1:782_0: 547. Dasame – caturaṅgulomakoti catūhi aṅgulehi ūnakappamāṇo. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:792_0: Ṭhapitā ye ayaṃ dāni, tesaṃ bhavati vaṇṇanā.
atk-vin02a1:793_1: Paṭhamapāṭidesanīye tāva paṭikkamanakāleti piṇḍāya caritvā paṭiāgamanakāle.
atk-vin02a1:794_4: Siṅghāṭakanti catukkoṇaṃ vā tikoṇaṃ vā maggasamodhānaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:794_6: Etesu yattha katthaci ṭhatvā gaṇhantassa gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:794_12: “Antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāyā”ti hi vacanato bhikkhuniyā antaraghare ṭhatvā dadamānāya vasenettha āpatti veditabbā,
atk-vin02a1:794_14: Tasmā sacepi vīthiādīsu ṭhito bhikkhu antarārāmādīsu ṭhatvā dadamānāya bhikkhuniyā gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:795_2: Ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassāti idaṃ āmisena asambhinnaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:796_1: Dāpeti na detīti aññātikā aññena kenaci dāpeti taṃ gaṇhantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:796_2: Upanikkhipitvā detīti bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā “idaṃ ayya tumhākaṃ dammī”ti deti,
atk-vin02a1:796_3: evaṃ dinnaṃ “sādhu bhaginī”ti sampaṭicchitvā tāya eva vā bhikkhuniyā aññena vā kenaci paṭiggahāpetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:796_4: Sikkhamānāya sāmaṇeriyāti etāsaṃ dadamānānaṃ gaṇhantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:801_1: Attano bhattaṃ dāpeti na detīti ettha sacepi attano bhattaṃ deti,
atk-vin02a1:801_4: Aññesaṃ bhattaṃ deti na dāpetīti ettha sacepi dāpeyya,
atk-vin02a1:801_6: Dentiyā pana neva iminā na purimena āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:804_2: Tasmiṃ kira kule ubhopi te sotāpannāyeva.
atk-vin02a1:804_3: Bhogena hāyatīti edisañhi kulaṃ sacepi asītikoṭidhanaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:804_5: Yasmā tattha neva upāsikā na upāsako bhoge rakkhati.
atk-vin02a1:805_1: Gharato nīharitvā dentīti āsanasālaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā ānetvā denti.
atk-vin02a1:805_2: Sacepi anāgate bhikkhumhi paṭhamaṃyeva nīharitvā dvāre ṭhapetvā pacchā sampattassa denti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:805_3: Bhikkhuṃ pana disvā antogehato nīharitvā diyyamānaṃ na vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:809_1: Pañcannaṃ paṭisaṃviditanti pañcasu sahadhammikesu yaṃkiñci pesetvā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ āharissāmāti
atk-vin02a1:809_3: Ārāmaṃ ārāmūpacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti āraññakasenāsanārāmañca tassa upacārañca ṭhapetvā;
atk-vin02a1:809_4: upacārato nikkhantaṃ antarāmagge bhikkhuṃ disvā vā gāmaṃ āgatassa vā paṭisaṃviditaṃ katampi appaṭisaṃviditameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:809_5: Sace sāsaṅkaṃ hoti sāsaṅkanti ācikkhitabbanti kasmā ācikkhitabbaṃ?
atk-vin02a1:809_6: Ārāme core vasante amhākaṃ nārocentīti vacanapaṭimocanatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:809_7: Corā vattabbā manussā idhūpacarantīti kasmā vattabbaṃ?
atk-vin02a1:810_0: Yāguyā paṭisaṃvidite tassā parivāro āhariyyatīti yāguyā paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā “kiṃ suddhayāguyā dinnāya
atk-vin02a1:810_1: pūvabhattādīnipi etissā yāguyā parivāraṃ katvā dassāmā”ti evaṃ yaṃ kiñci āharanti,
atk-vin02a1:810_4: Asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā khādanīyādīni gahetvā gacchatīti sutvā aññānipi tena saddhiṃ attano deyyadhammaṃ āharanti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:810_5: Yāguyā paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā pūvaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā āharanti,
atk-vin02a1:811_2: Paṭisaṃvidite vā gilānassa vā sesakanti ekassatthāya paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā āhaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:811_4: Catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā bahuṃ āhaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:811_12: taṃ bahiārāmaṃ pesetvā paṭisaṃviditaṃ kāretvā āharāpetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:811_14: Yampi vihāramajjhena gacchantā vā vanacarakādayo vā vanato āharitvā denti,
atk-vin02a1:811_17: mūlakhādanīyādiṃ aññena kappiyaṃ katvā dinnaṃ paribhuñjato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:811_18: Sace pana taṃ gāmaṃ haritvā pacitvā āharanti,
atk-vin02a1:821_2: Nābhimaṇḍalaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalanti uddhaṃ nābhimaṇḍalaṃ adho jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena jāṇumaṇḍalassa heṭṭhā
atk-vin02a1:821_3: jaṅghaṭṭhikato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ nivāsanaṃ otāretvā nivāsetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:821_5: Yathā nisinnassa jāṇumaṇḍalato heṭṭhā caturaṅgulamattaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hotīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:821_6: evaṃ nivāsentassa pana nivāsanaṃ pamāṇikaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:821_10: Tādisassa pana alābhe tiriyaṃ dvihatthapamāṇampi vaṭṭati jāṇumaṇḍalapaṭicchādanatthaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:821_12: Tattha ekapaṭṭacīvaraṃ evaṃ nivatthampi nivatthaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:822_0: Olambento nivāseti āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha na kevalaṃ purato ca pacchato ca olambetvā nivāsentasseva dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:822_1: ye panaññe “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gihinivatthaṃ nivāsenti hatthisoṇḍakaṃ macchavālakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:822_2: catukkaṇṇakaṃ tālavaṇṭakaṃ satavalikaṃ nivāsentī”tiādinā nayena khandhake nivāsanadosā vuttā,
atk-vin02a1:822_4: Te sabbe vuttanayena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsentassa na honti.
atk-vin02a1:823_0: Asañciccāti purato vā pacchato vā olambetvā nivāsessāmīti evaṃ asañcicca;
atk-vin02a1:823_1: atha kho parimaṇḍalaṃyeva nivāsessāmīti virajjhitvā aparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsentassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:823_3: Ajānantassāti ettha nivāsanavattaṃ ajānantassa mokkho natthi.
atk-vin02a1:823_7: tasmā uggahitavattopi yo āruḷhabhāvaṃ vā oruḷhabhāvaṃ vā na jānāti,
atk-vin02a1:823_9: Kurundiyaṃ pana “parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetuṃ ajānantassa anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:823_10: Yo pana sukkhajaṅgho vā mahāpiṇḍikamaṃso vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:823_11: tassa sāruppatthāya jāṇumaṇḍalato aṭṭhaṅgulādhikampi otāretvā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:824_0: Gilānassāti jaṅghāya vā pāde vā vaṇo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:824_1: ukkhipitvā vā otāretvā vā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:824_2: Āpadāsūti vāḷamigā vā corā vā anubandhanti,
atk-vin02a1:826_1: Parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbanti “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gihipārutaṃ pārupantī”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:826_2: vuttaṃ anekappakāraṃ gihipārupanaṃ apārupitvā idha vuttanayeneva ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā pārupanavattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:826_4: Imāni ca dve sikkhāpadāni avisesena vuttāni.
atk-vin02a1:826_5: Tasmā vihārepi antaragharepi parimaṇḍalameva nivāsetabbañca pārupitabbañcāti.
atk-vin02a1:826_6: Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbāni saddhiṃ theravādena.
atk-vin02a1:827_3: atha kho gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā anuvātantena gīvaṃ paṭicchādetvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā paṭisaṃharitvā
atk-vin02a1:827_6: galavāṭakato paṭṭhāya sīsaṃ maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya hatthe piṇḍikamaṃsato ca paṭṭhāya pāde vivaritvā nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:828_1: Vāsūpagatassāti vāsatthāya upagatassa rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā kāyaṃ vivaritvāpi nisīdato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:829_0: 580. Susaṃvutoti hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā akīḷāpento; suvinītoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:830_2: Yugamattaṃ pekkhamānoti yugayuttako hi danto ājāneyyo yugamattaṃ pekkhati,
atk-vin02a1:830_5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentoti yo taṃtaṃdisābhāgaṃ pāsādaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vīthiṃ olokento gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:830_7: Ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā hatthiassādiparissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:831_2: itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ ekato vā ubhato vā ukkhittacīvaro hutvāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:831_4: Nisinnakāle pana dhamakaraṇaṃ nīharantenāpi cīvaraṃ anukkhipitvāva nīharitabbanti.
atk-vin02a1:835_1: Appasaddo antaraghareti ettha kittāvatā appasaddo hoti?
atk-vin02a1:835_4: ante tatiyattheroti evaṃ nisinnesu saṅghatthero dutiyena saddhiṃ manteti,
atk-vin02a1:836_1: Kāyaṃ paggahetvāti niccalaṃ katvā ujukena kāyena samena iriyāpathena gantabbañceva nisīditabbañca.
atk-vin02a1:841_0: 596-8. Khambhakato nāma kaṭiyaṃ hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā katakhambho. Oguṇṭhitoti sasīsaṃ pāruto.
atk-vin02a1:842_1: Ukkuṭikāyāti ettha ukkuṭikā vuccati paṇhiyo ukkhipitvā aggapādehi vā,
atk-vin02a1:842_2: aggapāde vā ukkhipitvā paṇhīhiyeva vā bhūmiṃ phusantassa gamanaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:845_0: 603. Ākirantepīti piṇḍapātaṃ dentepi. Pattasaññīti patte saññaṃ katvā.
atk-vin02a1:846_1: Samasūpako nāma yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti.
atk-vin02a1:846_2: Muggasūpo māsasūpoti ettha kulatthādīhi katasūpāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchantiyevāti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:846_3: Rasaraseti ettha ṭhapetvā dve sūpe avasesāni oloṇīsākasūpeyyamaccharasamaṃsarasādīni rasarasāti veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a1:847_3: āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha thūpīkato nāma pattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ atikkamitvā kato;
atk-vin02a1:848_0: Tattha thūpīkataṃ nāma “pañcahi bhojanehi kata”nti abhayatthero āha.
atk-vin02a1:848_1: Tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero pana “piṇḍapāto nāma yāgupi bhattampi khādanīyampi cuṇṇapiṇḍopi dantakaṭṭhampi
atk-vin02a1:848_2: dasikasuttampī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ vatvā dasikasuttampi thūpīkataṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha.
atk-vin02a1:848_3: Tesaṃ vādaṃ sutvā bhikkhū rohaṇaṃ gantvā cūḷasumanattheraṃ pucchiṃsu –
atk-vin02a1:848_8: ahaṃ etassa sattakkhattuṃ vinayaṃ vācento na kadāci evaṃ avacaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:848_14: Tasmā yaṃkiñci yāgubhattaṃ vā phalāphalaṃ vā āmisajātikaṃ samatittikameva gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:848_18: Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ pūretvā vihāraṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:848_19: Yaṃ patte pakkhipiyamānaṃ pūvaucchukhaṇḍaphalāphalādi heṭṭhā orohati,
atk-vin02a1:848_23: Pupphavaṭaṃsakatakkolakaṭukaphalādivaṭaṃsake pana ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ thūpīkataṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:848_24: Bhattassa upari thālakaṃ vā pattaṃ vā ṭhapetvā pūretvā gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:848_27: “thālake vā paṇṇe vā pakkhipitvā taṃ pattamatthake ṭhapetvā denti,
atk-vin02a1:852_3: Sakkaccanti ca pattasaññīti cāti ubhayaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-vin02a1:853_0: 608. Sapadānanti tattha tattha odhiṃ akatvā anupaṭipāṭiyā. Samasūpake vattabbaṃ vuttameva.
atk-vin02a1:855_1: Paṭicchādetvā dentīti māghātasamayādīsu paṭicchannaṃ byañjanaṃ katvā denti.
atk-vin02a1:862_1: Sakabaḷenāti ettha dhammaṃ kathento harītakaṃ vā laṭṭhimadhukaṃ vā mukhe pakkhipitvā katheti.
atk-vin02a1:865_0: 622. Avagaṇḍakārakanti makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe katvā katvā.
atk-vin02a1:869_0: 626. Capucapukārakanti capu capūti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā.
atk-vin02a1:872_1: Surusurukārakanti surusurūti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā.
atk-vin02a1:872_10: pasusaṅgho”tiādinā nayena tīṇi ratanāni ārabbha na kātabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a1:873_2: Bhuñjantena hi aṅgulimattampi nillehituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:873_3: Ghanayāguphāṇitapāyāsādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyo mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:873_7: oṭṭhamaṃsehi eva pana gahetvā anto pavesetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:874_5: Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakanti etaṃ paṭikkūlavasena paṭikkhittaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:874_6: tasmā saṅghikampi puggalikampi gihisantakampi attano santakampi saṅkhampi sarāvampi thālakampi na gahetabbameva,
atk-vin02a1:874_8: Sace pana hatthassa ekadeso āmisamakkhito na hoti,
atk-vin02a1:875_1: Uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakato uddharitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rāsiṃ katvā udakaṃ chaḍḍeti.
atk-vin02a1:875_2: Bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udakagatikāni katvā chaḍḍeti.
atk-vin02a1:875_3: Paṭiggahe vāti paṭiggahena paṭicchanto naṃ paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti.
atk-vin02a1:876_4: Maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhanti idaṃ pana tiṇṇampi chattānaṃ pañjaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:876_5: Tāni hi maṇḍalabaddhāni ceva honti salākabaddhāni ca.
atk-vin02a1:876_8: Etesu yaṃkiñci chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi.
atk-vin02a1:876_9: So taṃ chattaṃ dhārayamāno vā aṃse vā katvā ūrumhi vā ṭhapetvā yāva hatthena na muccati,
atk-vin02a1:876_14: hatthato apagatamatte chattapāṇi nāma na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:877_1: Daṇḍapāṇissāti ettha daṇḍo nāma majjhimassa purisassa catuhatthappamāṇo daṇḍapāṇibhāvo panassa chattapāṇimhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:878_0: 636. Satthapāṇimhipi eseva nayo. Asiṃ sannahitvā ṭhitopi hi satthapāṇisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:879_3: atha kho sabbāpi dhanuvikati saddhiṃ saravikatiyā āvudhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:879_4: Tasmā saddhiṃ vā sarena dhanuṃ gahetvā suddhadhanuṃ vā suddhasaraṃ vā sajiyadhanuṃ vā nijjiyadhanuṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:879_5: gahetvā ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammo desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:879_6: Sace panassa dhanuṃ kaṇṭhepi paṭimukkaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:882_1: Akkantassāti chattadaṇḍake aṅgulantaraṃ appavesetvā kevalaṃ pādukaṃ akkamitvā ṭhitassa.
atk-vin02a1:882_4: Omukkoti panettha paṇhikabaddhaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhito vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:883_1: Yānagatassāti ettha sacepi dvīhi janehi hatthasaṅghāṭena gahito,
atk-vin02a1:883_4: visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakkamattepi nisinno yānagatotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:883_5: Sace pana dvepi ekayāne nisinnā honti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:883_6: Visuṃ nisinnesupi ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:883_8: Purime yāne nisinnena pacchime nisinnassa vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:883_9: Pacchime pana uccatarepi nisinnena desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:884_1: Sayanagatassāti antamaso kaṭasārakepi pakatibhūmiyampi nipannassa uccepi mañcapīṭhe vā bhūmipadese vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:884_2: Sayanagatena pana sayanagatassa uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:884_3: Nipannena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā desetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:884_4: nisinnenāpi ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:885_1: Pallatthikāyāti āyogapallatthikāya vā hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā yāya kāyaci pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:886_0: 643. Veṭhitasīsassāti dussaveṭhanena vā moḷiādīhi vā yathā kesanto na dissati; evaṃ veṭhitasīsassa.
atk-vin02a1:888_2: Āsane nisinnassāti antamaso vatthampi tiṇānipi santharitvā nisinnassa.
atk-vin02a1:889_4: Yatra hi nāmāti yo hi nāma.
atk-vin02a1:889_5: Sabbamidaṃ carimaṃ katanti tattheva paripatīti “sabbo ayaṃ loko saṅkaraṃ gato nimmariyādo”ti imaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:889_6: vatvā tattheva tesaṃ dvinnampi antarā rukkhato patito.
atk-vin02a1:889_7: Patitvā ca pana ubhinnampi purato ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-vin02a1:891_0: Tattha ubho atthaṃ na jānantīti dvepi janā pāḷiyā atthaṃ na jānanti.
atk-vin02a1:891_1: Dhammaṃ na passareti pāḷiṃ na passanti.
atk-vin02a1:891_5: Evaṃ brāhmaṇañca rājānañca ubhopi adhammikabhāve ṭhapesi.
atk-vin02a1:892_3: api ca kho mayā dīgharattaṃ saputtadāraparijanena rañño santako sālīnaṃ odano bhutto.
atk-vin02a1:892_5: Tasmā dhamme na vattāmīti yasmā evaṃ mayā rañño odano bhutto,
atk-vin02a1:892_7: tasmā dhamme ahaṃ na vattāmi udare baddho hutvā,
atk-vin02a1:892_9: Ayañhi dhammo ariyehi vaṇṇito pasattho thomitoti jānāmi.
atk-vin02a1:893_2: yo tayā dhanalābho ca yasalābho ca laddho,
atk-vin02a1:893_3: dhiratthu taṃ dhanalābhaṃ yasalābhañca brāhmaṇa. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a1:893_4: Yasmā ayaṃ tayā laddho lābho āyatiṃ apāyesu vinipātanahetunā sampati ca adhammacaraṇena vutti nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:893_5: Evarūpā yā vutti āyatiṃ vinipātena idha adhammacaraṇena vā nippajjati,
atk-vin02a1:896_0: Paribbaja mahābrahmeti mahābrāhmaṇa ito disā sīghaṃ palāyassu.
atk-vin02a1:896_1: Pacantaññepi pāṇinoti aññepi sattā pacanti ceva bhuñjanti ca;
atk-vin02a1:896_3: Mā tvaṃ adhammo ācarito asmā kumbhamivābhidāti sace hi tvaṃ ito aparibbajitvā imaṃ adhammaṃ ācarissasi,
atk-vin02a1:896_4: tato tvaṃ so adhammo evaṃ ācarito yathā udakakumbhaṃ pāsāṇo bhindeyya;
atk-vin02a1:898_0: Mā tvaṃ adhammo ācarito, asmā kumbhamivābhidā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:899_0: Ucce āsaneti antamaso bhūmippadesepi unnataṭṭhāne nisinnassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:900_1: Na ṭhito nisinnassāti sacepi therupaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhitaṃ daharabhikkhuṃ āsane nisinno mahāthero pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-vin02a1:900_3: Gāravena pana theraṃ uṭṭhahitvā pucchathāti vattuṃ na sakkā,
atk-vin02a1:901_1: Na pacchato gacchantenāti ettha sace purato gacchanto pacchato gacchantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-vin02a1:902_1: Na uppathenāti etthāpi sace dvepi sakaṭapathe ekekacakkapathena vā uppathena vā samadhuraṃ gacchanti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:903_1: Asañciccāti paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati,
atk-vin02a1:904_1: Na hariteti ettha yampi jīvarukkhassa mūlaṃ pathaviyaṃ dissamānaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:904_7: Appaharite katoti appaharitaṃ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ vā palālaṇḍupakaṃ vā ṭhapetvā katopi pacchā haritaṃ ottharati,
atk-vin02a1:904_9: Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi saṅgahitāti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:905_1: Na udaketi etaṃ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:907_3: chamānīcāsanaṭhānapacchatogamanauppathagamanapaṭisaṃyuttāni pañcāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānāni kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhahanti, kiriyāni,
atk-vin02a1:908_0: Sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadaṃ theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:911_1: thūpīkatapiṇḍapāte sūpabyañjanena paṭicchādane ujjhānasaññimhīti tīsu sikkhāpadesu gilāno natthīti.
atk-vin02a1:915_4: Tesaṃ vitthāro khandhake ca parivāre ca vutto,
atk-vin02a1:920_0: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṃ ciraṃ pajaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:921_0: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu medaninti.
atk-vin02a1:929_0: Kātuṃ pārājike tāva, hoti saṃvaṇṇanā ayaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:931_1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati…pe…
atk-vin02a1:931_2: sāḷho migāranattāti ettha sāḷhoti tassa nāmaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:931_9: Medhāvinīti pāḷiggahaṇe satipubbaṅgamāya paññāya atthaggahaṇe paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā samannāgatā.
atk-vin02a1:931_16: Alaṃ kātunti samatthā taṃ taṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:931_17: Alaṃ saṃvidhātunti evañca evañca idaṃ hotūti evaṃ saṃvidahitumpi samatthā.
atk-vin02a1:931_20: sā ca sundarīnandā so ca sāḷhoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:931_23: Vissaro me bhavissatīti virūpo me saro bhavissati;
atk-vin02a1:932_3: Padabhājane panassa tameva rāgaṃ gahetvā “sārattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:932_4: Tattha sārattāti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena kāyasaṃsaggarāgena suṭṭhu rattā.
atk-vin02a1:932_5: Apekkhavatīti tasseva rāgassa vasena tasmiṃ purise pavattāya apekkhāya samannāgatā.
atk-vin02a1:932_6: Paṭibaddhacittāti tena rāgena tasmiṃ purise bandhitvā ṭhapitacittā viya.
atk-vin02a1:932_11: Padabhājane pana padapaṭipāṭiyā eva “heṭṭhakkhakaṃ uparijāṇumaṇḍala”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:932_14: Purimāyo upādāyāti sādhāraṇapārājikehi pārājikāyo catasso upādāyāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:932_15: Ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikāti idaṃ pana imissā pārājikāya nāmamattaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:933_1: Evaṃ uddiṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ padānukkamena vibhajitvā idāni avassutādibhedena āpattibhedaṃ dassetuṃ “ubhatoavassute”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:933_3: bhikkhuniyā ceva purisassa ca kāyasaṃsaggarāgena avassutabhāve satīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:933_4: Kāyena kāyaṃ āmasatīti bhikkhunī yathāparicchinnena kāyena purisassa yaṃkiñci kāyaṃ puriso vā yena kenaci
atk-vin02a1:933_7: Kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhanti vuttappakāreneva attano kāyena purisassa kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:933_11: Kāyapaṭibaddhena kāyanti attano vuttappakārakāyapaṭibaddhena purisassa kāyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:934_0: Sace pana bhikkhu ceva bhikkhunī ca hoti,
atk-vin02a1:934_11: Evaṃ pana sati kiriyāsamuṭṭhānatā na dissati,
atk-vin02a1:936_1: Ekatoavassuteti ettha kiñcāpi ekatoti avisesena vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:936_2: tathāpi bhikkhuniyā eva avassute sati ayaṃ āpattibhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:937_3: Adhakkhake ubbhajāṇumaṇḍale kāyappadese kāyasaṃsaggasādiyane sati bhikkhuniyā pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:937_5: purisassa methunarāgo vā gehassitapemaṃ vā suddhacittaṃ vā hotu,
atk-vin02a1:937_8: purisassa kāyasaṃsaggarāgo vā methunarāgo vā gahessitapemaṃ vā suddhacittaṃ vā hotu, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:937_10: purisassa vuttesu catūsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotu,
atk-vin02a1:937_13: purisassa vuttesu catūsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotu, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:938_0: Sace pana bhikkhu ceva hoti bhikkhunī ca ubhinnaṃ kāyasaṃsaggarāgo,
atk-vin02a1:939_1: Anāpatti asañciccātiādīsu virajjhitvā vā āmasantiyā aññavihitāya vā “ayaṃ puriso vā itthī vā”ti ajānantiyā
atk-vin02a1:939_2: vā tena phuṭṭhāyapi taṃ phassaṃ asādiyantiyā vā āmasanepi sati anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:943_2: kacci no sāti kacci nu sā.
atk-vin02a1:945_1: Sā vā ārocetīti yā pārājikaṃ āpannā,
atk-vin02a1:945_3: Aṭṭhannaṃ pārājikānaṃ aññataranti bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇānaṃ catunnaṃ asādhāraṇānañca catunnameva aññataraṃ.
atk-vin02a1:945_6: Purimena pana saddhiṃ yugaḷattā imasmiṃ okāse ṭhapitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:945_8: Vitthārakathā panettha sappāṇakavaggamhi duṭṭhullasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:949_3: Padabhājanaṃ panassa “yena dhammena yena vinayena ukkhitto suukkhitto hotī”ti imaṃadhippāyamattaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:949_6: Saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vātiādīsu yena saṅghena kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:949_7: taṃ saṅghaṃ vā tattha sambahulapuggalasaṅkhātaṃ gaṇaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a1:949_8: ekapuggalaṃ vā taṃ kammaṃ vā na ādiyati,
atk-vin02a1:949_12: so tehi saddhiṃ natthīti ettha “ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā”ti ayaṃ tāva saṃvāso;
atk-vin02a1:949_13: samāno saṃvāso etesanti samānasaṃvāsakā.Evarūpā bhikkhū bhikkhussa tasmiṃ saṃvāse saha ayanabhāvena sahāyāti vuccanti.
atk-vin02a1:949_14: Idāni yena saṃvāsena te samānasaṃvāsakāti vuttā,
atk-vin02a1:949_15: so saṃvāso tassa ukkhittakassa tehi saddhiṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a1:949_16: Yehi ca saddhiṃ tassa so saṃvāso natthi,
atk-vin02a1:949_17: na tena te bhikkhū attano sahāyā katā honti.
atk-vin02a1:953_4: Purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṃ vātiādīsu pana yaṃ purisapuggalena hatthe gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:953_7: Hatthaggahaṇanti ettha ca hatthaggahaṇañca aññampi apārājikakkhette gahaṇañca ekajjhaṃ katvā hatthaggahaṇanti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:953_8: Tenevassa padabhājane “hatthaggahaṇaṃ vā sādiyeyyāti hattho nāma kapparaṃ upādāya yāva agganakhā,
atk-vin02a1:953_9: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya ubbhakkhakaṃ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati,
atk-vin02a1:953_13: Na hi methunassa sāmantā thullaccayaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:953_14: “Viññū paṭibalo kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjitunti vacanampi cettha sādhakaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:959_0: Imāya parivāre vuttāya sedamocakagāthāya virujjhatīti ce? Na;
atk-vin02a1:959_2: Parivāreyeva hi “methunadhammassa pubbabhāgo jānitabbo”ti “vaṇṇāvaṇṇo kāyasaṃsaggo duṭṭhullavācā attakāmapāricariyāgamanuppādana”nti
atk-vin02a1:959_3: evaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiādīni pañca sikkhāpadāni methunadhammassa pubbabhāgoti vuttāni.
atk-vin02a1:959_4: Tasmā kāyasaṃsaggo methunadhammassa pubbabhāgattā paccayo hoti.
atk-vin02a1:959_5: Iti chejjā siyā methunadhammapaccayāti ettha iminā pariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:959_7: Apica “saṅketaṃ vā gaccheyyā”ti etassa padabhājane “itthannāmaṃ āgacchā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:960_1: Aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentī assamaṇī hotīti anulomato vā paṭilomato vā ekantarikāya vā yena tena nayena
atk-vin02a1:960_3: Yā pana ekaṃ vā vatthuṃ satta vā vatthūni satakkhattumpi pūreti,
atk-vin02a1:960_10: idāni nāpajjissāmīti dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desitā gaṇanūpikā desitagaṇanaṃ upeti pārājikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:960_11: Tasmā yā ekaṃ āpannā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desetvā puna kilesavasena āpajjati,
atk-vin02a1:960_13: evaṃ aṭṭha vatthūni pūrentīpi pārājikā na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:960_14: Yā pana āpajjitvā punapi aññaṃ vatthuṃ āpajjissāmīti saussāhāva deseti,
atk-vin02a1:963_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha pārājikā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā cattāro ime ca cattāroti
atk-vin02a1:963_1: evaṃ pātimokkhuddesamaggena uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha pārājikā dhammāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:971_2: Māyyo evaṃ avacāti ayyo mā evaṃ avaca.
atk-vin02a1:972_2: Yasmā pana sā atthato aṭṭakārikā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:972_3: tasmā “ussayavādikā nāma aḍḍakārikā vuccatī”ti padabhājane vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:972_6: Dutiyaṃ vā pariyesatīti sakkhiṃ vā sahāyaṃ vā pariyesati, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:972_7: Gacchati vāti upassayo vā hotu bhikkhācāramaggo vā,
atk-vin02a1:972_9: tato vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gacchantiyā padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:972_10: Ekassa ārocetīti dvīsu janesu yassa kassaci ekassa kathaṃ yo koci vohārikānaṃ āroceti.
atk-vin02a1:973_1: yattha katthaci antamaso bhikkhunupassayaṃ āgatepi vohārike disvā bhikkhunī attano kathaṃ āroceti,
atk-vin02a1:973_10: “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti,
atk-vin02a1:973_11: so attano vā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārocetu bhikkhuniyā vā,
atk-vin02a1:973_15: “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti,
atk-vin02a1:974_1: tattha kappiyakārako vā bhikkhuniyā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārocetu,
atk-vin02a1:974_5: yathā vā tathā vā ārociyamāne paṭhame ārocane bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:974_7: Yathā vā tathā vā ārocitaṃ pana ubhinnampi kathaṃ sutvā vohārikehi vinicchaye kate aḍḍapariyosānaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:974_8: tasmiṃ aḍḍapariyosāne bhikkhuniyā jayepi parājayepi saṅghādiseso.
atk-vin02a1:974_11: Atha te bhikkhuniñca aḍḍakārakañca disvāva “tumhākaṃ kathanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a1:974_12: jānāma mayaṃ ettha pavatti”nti sayameva vinicchinitvā denti,
atk-vin02a1:975_3: Padabhājane pana adhippāyamattaṃ dassetuṃ “saha vatthujjhācārā āpajjati asamanubhāsanāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:975_7: ayaṃ paṭhamameva saha vatthujjhācārena āpajjitabbattā paṭhamāpattikoti.
atk-vin02a1:975_10: Padabhājane pana adhippāyamattaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅghamhā nissārīyatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:975_11: Tattha yaṃ āpannā bhikkhunī saṅghato nissārīyati,
atk-vin02a1:975_13: Na hi so eva dhammo saṅghamhā kenaci nissārīyati.
atk-vin02a1:976_0: Ākaḍḍhiyamānā gacchatīti aḍḍakārakamanussehi sayaṃ vā āgantvā dūtaṃ vā pesetvā ehīti vuccamānā vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:976_1: tato aḍḍakārako attano vā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārocetu bhikkhuniyā vā,
atk-vin02a1:976_5: Sacepi aḍḍakārako bhikkhuniṃ vadati “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvameva kathehī”ti;
atk-vin02a1:976_6: kathentiyāpi kathaṃ sutvā kate aḍḍapariyosānepi anāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:977_0: Rakkhaṃ yācatīti dhammikaṃ rakkhaṃ yācati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:978_1: Bhikkhunupassaye gāmadārakā dhuttādayo vā ye keci anācāraṃ vā ācaranti,
atk-vin02a1:978_5: Bhikkhunī vohārike upasaṅkamitvā “amhākaṃ upassaye idaṃ nāma kata”nti vadati.
atk-vin02a1:978_9: Tañce sutvā te vohārikā tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a1:978_11: Daṇḍaṃ gaṇhissantīti adhippāyepi sati gīvāyeva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:978_12: Sace pana tassa daṇḍaṃ gaṇhathāti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:979_0: “Kenā”ti vutte pana “asukenāti vattuṃ amhākaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:979_7: Evaṃ vutte sacepi te vohārikā kārake gavesitvā tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a1:980_0: Parikkhāraṃ harante disvā tesaṃ anatthakāmatāya coro coroti vattumpi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:980_1: Evaṃ vuttepi hi yaṃ tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a1:980_3: Attano vacanakaraṃ pana “iminā me parikkhāro gahito,
atk-vin02a1:980_5: mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karohī”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:981_1: Vuttanayeneva parehi anācārādīsu katesu bhikkhunī vohārike evaṃ vadati “amhākaṃ upassaye idañcidañca karonti,
atk-vin02a1:981_3: “Kena evaṃ kata”nti vutte ca “asukena asukena cā”ti ācikkhati.
atk-vin02a1:981_6: Tesañhi daṇḍe kate purimanayeneva sabbaṃ bhikkhuniyā gīvā.
atk-vin02a1:982_0: Sace pana vohārikā “bhikkhunupassaye evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ karontānaṃ imaṃ nāma daṇḍaṃ karomā”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā
atk-vin02a1:983_6: Yo pana “daṇḍaṃ karissantī”ti jānantopi anodissa katheti,
atk-vin02a1:983_7: te ca pariyesitvā daṇḍaṃ karontiyeva, na doso.
atk-vin02a1:983_8: Vihārasīmāya rukkhādīni chindantānaṃ vāsipharasuādīni gahetvā pāsāṇehi koṭṭenti,
atk-vin02a1:988_5: Yattha yattha hi rājāno gaṇādīnaṃ gāmanigame niyyātenti “tumheva ettha anusāsathā”ti,
atk-vin02a1:988_6: tattha tattha te eva issarā honti.
atk-vin02a1:988_8: Ettha ca rājānaṃ vā gaṇādike vā āpucchitvāpi bhikkhunisaṅgho āpucchitabbova.
atk-vin02a1:988_9: Ṭhapetvā kappanti titthiyesu vā aññabhikkhunīsu vā pabbajitapubbaṃ kappagatikaṃ ṭhapetvāti.
atk-vin02a1:989_1: kenaci karaṇīyena pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu agantvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ yathānisinnaṭṭhāneyeva attano nissitakaparisāya
atk-vin02a1:989_3: khaṇḍasīmaṃ vā nadiṃ vā gantvā vuṭṭhāpentiyā kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a1:992_1: parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyāti ettha ekaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyā thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:992_3: Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāranti ettha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ ekena pādena atikkamati thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:992_6: nikkhamitvā pana gāmantaraṃ gacchantiyā padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:992_7: ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā upacāre vā atikkantamatte thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:992_9: Tato nikkhamitvā puna sakagāmaṃ pavisantiyāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:992_10: Sace pana khaṇḍapākārena vā vatichiddena vā bhikkhunivihārabhūmiyeva sakkā hoti pavisituṃ,
atk-vin02a1:992_11: evaṃ pavisamānāya kappiyabhūmiṃ nāma paviṭṭhā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:992_13: Sacepi hatthipiṭṭhiādīhi vā iddhiyā vā pavisati,
atk-vin02a1:993_2: tattha piṇḍāya caritvā puna vihāraṃ pavisitvā sace vihāramajjhena itarassa gāmassa maggo atthi,
atk-vin02a1:993_4: Tato pana gāmato teneva maggena paccāgantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:993_7: Sakagāmato kenaci karaṇīyena bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ nikkhantāya puna pavisanakāle hatthi vā muccati,
atk-vin02a1:994_2: Pacchā taṃ gāmaṃ cattāro janā labhitvā visuṃ visuṃ vatiparikkhepaṃ katvā vibhajitvā bhuñjanti,
atk-vin02a1:994_4: Tato aparaṃ gāmaṃ dvārena vā vatichiddena vā pavisituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:995_0: Antaravāsako temiyatīti yattha yathā timaṇḍalapaṭicchādanaṃ hoti;
atk-vin02a1:995_1: evaṃ nivatthāya bhikkhuniyā vassakāle titthena vā atitthena vā otaritvā yattha katthaci uttarantiyā ekadvaṅgulamattampi antaravāsako temiyati.
atk-vin02a1:995_3: Evarūpaṃ nadiṃ titthena vā atitthena vā otaritvā uttaraṇakāle paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ uddharitvā tīre ṭhapentiyā thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:995_6: Padasā otaritvā uttaraṇakāle setuṃ ārohitvā uttarantiyāpi anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:995_7: Setunā pana gantvā uttaraṇakāle padasā gacchantiyā āpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:995_10: Rajanakammatthaṃ gantvā dārusaṅkaḍḍhanādikiccena dve tisso ubhayatīresu vicaranti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:995_11: Sace panettha kāci kalahaṃ katvā itaraṃ tīraṃ gacchati, āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:995_13: ekā majjhe nadiyā kalahaṃ katvā nivattitvā orimatīrameva āgacchati, āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:995_14: Itarissā pana ayaṃ pakkantaṭṭhāne ṭhitā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:995_16: Nhāyituṃ vā pātuṃ vā otiṇṇā tameva tīraṃ paccuttarati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:996_0: Saha aruṇuggamanāti ettha sace sajjhāyaṃ vā padhānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci kammaṃ kurumānā purearuṇeyeva dutiyikāya santikaṃ gamissāmīti ābhogaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a1:996_1: ajānantiyā eva cassā aruṇo uggacchati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:996_2: Atha pana “yāva aruṇuggamanā idheva bhavissāmī”ti vā anābhogena vā vihārassa ekadese acchati,
atk-vin02a1:997_0: Agāmake araññeti ettha “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇameva araññaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:997_3: Tādise araññe okkante dassanūpacāre vijahite sacepi savanūpacāro atthi, āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:997_4: Teneva vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace bhikkhunīsu mahābodhiaṅgaṇaṃ pavisantīsu ekā bahi tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:997_6: Lohapāsādaṃ pavisantīsupi pariveṇaṃ pavisantīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:997_7: Mahācetiyaṃ vandamānāsu ekā uttaradvārena nikkhamitvā gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:997_11: Ettha ca dassanūpacāro nāma yattha ṭhitaṃ dutiyikā passati.
atk-vin02a1:997_14: Savanūpacāro nāma yattha ṭhitā maggamūḷhasaddena viya dhammasavanārocanasaddena viya ca “ayye”ti saddāyantiyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
atk-vin02a1:997_16: So evarūpe savanūpacāre vijahite na rakkhati,
atk-vin02a1:998_1: Saussāhā ce hutvā idāni pāpuṇissāmīti anubandhati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:998_5: Dvinnaṃ gacchantīnaṃ ekā anubandhituṃ asakkontī “gacchatu aya”nti ohīyati,
atk-vin02a1:998_8: Sace pana gacchantīsu purimāpi aññaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:1002_4: Anaññāya gaṇassa chandanti tasseva kārakagaṇassa chandaṃ ajānitvā.
atk-vin02a1:1006_1: ekato avassuteti ettha “bhikkhuniyā avassutabhāvo daṭṭhabbo”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1010_2: Uyyojeti āpatti dukkaṭassātiādikā saṅghādisesapariyosānā āpattiyo kassā hontīti?
atk-vin02a1:1011_0: “Na deti na paṭiggaṇhāti, paṭiggaho tena na vijjati;
atk-vin02a1:1012_0: Āpajjati garukaṃ na lahukaṃ, tañca paribhogapaccayā;
atk-vin02a1:1014_0: Ayañhi gāthā imaṃ uyyojikaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a1:1018_0: 709. Sattame – yāvatatiyakapadattho mahāvibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1022_2: Padabhājane pana kevalaṃ adhikaraṇavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1025_3: Saṃsaṭṭhāti gihīnaṃ koṭṭanapacanagandhapisanamālāganthanādinā kāyikena sāsanapaṭisāsanāharaṇasañcarittādinā vācasikena ca saṃsaṭṭhā.
atk-vin02a1:1028_6: Paribhavenāti kiṃ imā karissantīti evaṃ paribhavitvā jānanena.
atk-vin02a1:1028_12: Sabbattha uññāya ca paribhavena cāti evaṃ samuccayattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:1030_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesāti ettha channaṃ paṭhamāpattikānaṃ anantarā sañcarittaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1030_1: dve duṭṭhadosāti imāni tīṇi sikkhāpadāni mahāvibhaṅgato pakkhipitvā nava paṭhamāpattikā,
atk-vin02a1:1030_2: catunnaṃ yāvatatiyakānaṃ anantarā mahāvibhaṅgatopi cattāro yāvatatiyake pakkhipitvā aṭṭha yāvatatiyakā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:1030_3: Evaṃ sabbepi pātimokkhuddesamaggena uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:1037_0: Ye tesaṃ dāni bhavati, ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanākkamo.
atk-vin02a1:1039_2: ekāhaṃ anadhiṭṭhahitvā vā avikappetvā vā pattaṃ ṭhapeyyāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1043_0: 738. Dutiye – duccoḷāti virūpacoḷā; jiṇṇacoḷāti attho. Apayyāhīti api ayyāhi.
atk-vin02a1:1044_1: Ādissa dinnanti sampattā bhājentūti vatvāpi idaṃ gaṇassa idaṃ tumhākaṃ dammīti vatvā vā dātukamyatāya
atk-vin02a1:1044_2: pādamūle ṭhapetvā vā dinnampi ādissa dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:1044_4: Ayyāya dammīti evaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ pana yathādāneyeva upanetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1048_2: Sayaṃ acchindatīti ekaṃ datvā ekaṃ acchindantiyā ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1052_4: telena me atthoti idaṃ kira sā āhaṭasappiṃ datvā telampi āharissatīti maññamānā āha.
atk-vin02a1:1053_1: Taññeva viññāpetīti yaṃ paṭhamaṃ viññattaṃ taṃ thokaṃ nappahoti,
atk-vin02a1:1053_4: yamakaṃ pacitabbanti ca vejjena vuttattā telena attho hoti,
atk-vin02a1:1053_5: tato telenāpi me atthoti evaṃ aññañca viññāpeti.
atk-vin02a1:1053_6: Ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvāti sace kahāpaṇassa sappi ābhataṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:1053_9: tasmā telaṃ āharāti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā viññāpetīti.
atk-vin02a1:1057_1: na me sikkhamāneti idaṃ kira sā kuladhītā “ayaṃ addhā evaṃ vuttā idaṃ telaṃ ṭhapetvā sappimpi me attano kulagharā āharissatī”ti maññamānā āha.
atk-vin02a1:1060_3: taṃ dethā”ti evaṃ paresaṃ chandañca ruciñca uppādetvā gahitaparikkhārassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1061_5: telādīhi pana attho”ti evaṃ āpucchitvā upaneti.
atk-vin02a1:1061_8: evarūpāsu āpadāsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā cetāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1065_0: 764. Sattame – saññācikenāti sayaṃ yācitakena. Etadevettha nānākaraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ chaṭṭhasadisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1068_0: 769. Aṭṭhame – mahājanikenāti gaṇassa pariccattena. Etadevettha nānākaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1071_0: 774. Navamasikkhāpade – saññācikenāti idaṃ padaṃ ito adhikataraṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1074_3: Idañca padaṃ puggalikena saññācikenāti idañca ettakameva nānākaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1077_3: Catukkaṃsaparamanti ettha kaṃso nāma catukkahāpaṇiko hoti;
atk-vin02a1:1080_0: 789. Dvādasame – lahupāvuraṇanti uṇhakāle pāvuraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ sikkhāpadadvayepi uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1083_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammāti ettha mahāvibhaṅge cīvaravaggato dhovanañca paṭiggahaṇañcāti
atk-vin02a1:1083_1: dve sikkhāpadāni apanetvā akālacīvaraṃ kālacīvaranti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājitasikkhāpadena ca parivattetvā
atk-vin02a1:1083_3: Puna eḷakalomavaggassa ādito satta sikkhāpadāni apanetvā satta aññadatthikāni pakkhipitvā dutiyavaggo pūretabbo.
atk-vin02a1:1083_4: Tatiyavaggato paṭhamapattaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ āraññakasikkhāpadanti imāni tīṇi apanetvā pattasannicayagarupāvuraṇalahupāvuraṇasikkhāpadehi
atk-vin02a1:1083_7: aṭṭhārasa ubhatopaññattānīti evaṃ sabbepi pātimokkhuddesamaggena “uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā”ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:1091_0: Saṅgītā ye ayaṃ dāni, hoti tesampi vaṇṇanā.
atk-vin02a1:1092_2: dve tayo bhaṇḍiketi dve vā tayo vā poṭṭalike;
atk-vin02a1:1092_4: Na mattaṃ jānitvāti pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā khettapālassa vārentassa bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpesi.
atk-vin02a1:1093_1: So tāsaṃ ekekanti so haṃso jātissaro ahosi,
atk-vin02a1:1093_2: atha pubbasinehena āgantvā tāsaṃ ekekaṃ pattaṃ deti,
atk-vin02a1:1094_2: Magadharaṭṭhe jātalasuṇameva hi idha lasuṇanti adhippetaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1094_5: Kurundiyaṃ pana jātadesaṃ avatvā “māgadhakaṃ nāma bhaṇḍikalasuṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1094_6: Ajjhohāre ajjhohāreti ettha sace dve tayo bhaṇḍike ekatoyeva saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharati,
atk-vin02a1:1094_8: Bhinditvā ekekaṃ miñjaṃ khādantiyā pana payogagaṇanāya pācittiyānīti.
atk-vin02a1:1095_1: Palaṇḍukādīnaṃ vaṇṇena vā miñjāya vā nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:1095_5: Miñjāya pana palaṇḍukassa ekā miñjā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:1095_15: Tañhi paccamānesu muggasūpādīsu vā macchamaṃsavikatiyā vā telādīsu vā badarasāḷavādīsu vā ambilasākādīsu
atk-vin02a1:1095_16: vā uttaribhaṅgesu vā yattha katthaci antamaso yāgubhattepi pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1099_2: Tassa vibhāgadassanatthaṃ pana “ubho upakacchakā muttakaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1099_3: Ekampi lomanti kattariyā vā saṇḍāsakena vā khurena vā yena kenaci ekapayogena vā nānāpayogena vā ekaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1099_4: vā bahūni vā saṃharāpentiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyāni,
atk-vin02a1:1100_4: kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1103_2: Antamaso uppalapattenāpīti ettha pattaṃ tāva mahantaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1104_1: Ābādhapaccayāti gaṇḍaṃ vā vaṇaṃ vā paharituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1107_5: Kassidaṃ kammanti vutte anārocitepi etā mayi āsaṅkaṃ karissantīti maññamānā evamāha –
atk-vin02a1:1108_3: yaṃkiñci pana daṇḍakaṃ pavesentiyā āpattiyeva. Tenāha –
atk-vin02a1:1111_0: 810. Pañcame – atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyantīti atianto pavesetvā udakena dhovanaṃ kurumānā.
atk-vin02a1:1112_1: Kesaggamattampi atikkāmetīti vitthārato tatiyaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā aṅgulaṃ gambhīrato dvinnaṃ pabbānaṃ upari
atk-vin02a1:1112_4: “ekissā aṅguliyā tīṇi pabbāni ādātuṃ na labhati,
atk-vin02a1:1112_5: tiṇṇaṃ vā catunnaṃ vā ekekampi pabbaṃ ādātuṃ na labhatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:1115_2: Pānīyena ca vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhitvāti ekena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ ekena bījaniṃ gahetvā bījamānā samīpe ṭhatvāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1115_4: ahaṃ evaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ karomī”ti pabbajitacārittaṃ atikkamitvā gehassitakathaṃ kathetīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1116_4: Hatthapāse tiṭṭhati āpatti pācittiyassāti idha ṭhānapaccayāva pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1117_1: Deti dāpetīti pānīyaṃ vā sūpādiṃ vā imaṃ pivatha,
atk-vin02a1:1117_5: Anupasampannaṃ āṇāpetīti upatiṭṭhanatthaṃ sāmaṇeriṃ āṇāpeti, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1121_1: bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassāti idaṃ payogadukkaṭaṃ nāma,
atk-vin02a1:1121_3: paṭiggaṇhitvā pana araññato āharaṇepi sukkhāpanepi vaddalidivase bhajjanatthāya uddhanasajjanepi kapallasajjanepi
atk-vin02a1:1121_4: dabbisajjanepi dārūni ādāya aggikaraṇepi kapallamhi dhaññapakkhipanepi dabbiyā saṅghaṭṭanesupi koṭṭanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1121_5: udukkhalamusalādisajjanesupi koṭṭanapapphoṭanadhovanādīsupi yāva mukhe ṭhapetvā ajjhoharaṇatthaṃ dantehi
atk-vin02a1:1121_9: Ettha ca viññatti ceva bhojanañca pamāṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1121_10: Tasmā sayaṃ viññāpetvā aññāya bhajjanakoṭṭanapacanāni kārāpetvā bhuñjantiyāpi āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1121_11: Aññāya viññāpetvā sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvā bhuñjantiyāpi āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1121_13: “idaṃ āmakadhaññaṃ nāma mātarampi viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pācittiyameva,
atk-vin02a1:1121_14: aviññattiyā laddhaṃ sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvā vā kārāpetvā vā bhuñjantiyā dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1121_15: Aññāya viññattiyā laddhaṃ sayaṃ vā bhajjanādīni katvā tāya vā kārāpetvā aññāya vā kārāpetvā bhuñjantiyāpi dukkaṭamevā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:1121_20: na hi bhajjanādīnaṃ karaṇe vā kārāpane vā viseso atthi.
atk-vin02a1:1121_21: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “aññāya viññattaṃ bhuñjantiyā dukkaṭa”nti avisesena vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1122_2: “Aviññattiyā labbhamānaṃ pana navakammatthāya sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1122_3: Aparaṇṇaṃ viññāpetīti ṭhapetvā satta dhaññāni muggamāsādiṃ vā lābukumbhaṇḍādiṃ vā aññaṃ yaṃkiñci ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne viññāpentiyā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1123_1: kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1126_1: nibbiṭṭho rājabhaṭo rañño bhati keṇi etenāti nibbiṭṭharājabhaṭo,
atk-vin02a1:1126_2: ekaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ keṇiyā gahetvā tato laddhaudayoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1126_3: Taññeva bhaṭapathaṃ yācissāmīti rañño keṇiṃ datvā puna taṃyeva ṭhānantaraṃ yācissāmīti cintento.
atk-vin02a1:1126_4: Paribhāsīti tā bhikkhuniyo “mā puna evaṃ karitthā”ti santajjesi.
atk-vin02a1:1127_1: Sayaṃ chaḍḍetīti cattāripi vatthūni ekapayogena chaḍḍentiyā ekāva āpatti,
atk-vin02a1:1131_1: yaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ropimanti khettaṃ vā hotu nāḷikerādiārāmo vā,
atk-vin02a1:1131_2: yattha katthaci ropimaharitaṭṭhāne etāni vatthūni chaḍḍentiyā purimanayeneva āpattibhedo veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:1131_3: Khette vā ārāme vā nisīditvā bhuñjamānā ucchuādīni vā khādantī;
atk-vin02a1:1131_8: Kasitaṭṭhāne pana nikkhittabīje yāva aṅkuraṃ na uṭṭhahati,
atk-vin02a1:1131_10: Anikkhittabījesu khettakoṇādīsu vā asañjātaropimesu khettamariyādādīsu vā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1131_12: Chaḍḍitakhetteti manussesu sassaṃ uddharitvā gatesu chaḍḍitakhettaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:1131_14: Yattha pana lāyitampi pubbaṇṇādi puna uṭṭhahissatīti rakkhanti,
atk-vin02a1:1134_1: yaṃkiñci naccanti naṭādayo vā naccantu soṇḍā vā,
atk-vin02a1:1134_4: Yaṃkiñci gītanti yaṃkiñci naṭādīnaṃ vā gītaṃ hotu,
atk-vin02a1:1134_5: ariyānaṃ parinibbānakāle ratanattayaguṇūpasaṃhitaṃ sādhukīḷitagītaṃ vā asaṃyatabhikkhūnaṃ dhammabhāṇakagītaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a1:1135_1: Dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassāti padavāragaṇanāya āpatti dukkaṭassa.
atk-vin02a1:1135_2: Yattha ṭhitā passati vā suṇāti vāti ekapayogena olokentī passati,
atk-vin02a1:1135_5: Sace pana ekaṃ disaṃ oloketvā naccaṃ passati,
atk-vin02a1:1135_6: puna aññato oloketvā gāyante passati aññato vādente,
atk-vin02a1:1135_8: Bhikkhunī sayampi naccituṃ vā gāyituṃ vā vādituṃ vā na labhati,
atk-vin02a1:1135_12: upāsakā”ti vattumpi “tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti vutte “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitumpi na labhati.
atk-vin02a1:1135_15: “Tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti vutte pana “upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṃ nāma sundara”nti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1136_1: Ārāme ṭhitāti ārāme ṭhatvā antarārāme vā bahiārāme vā naccādīni passati vā suṇāti vā, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1136_2: Sati karaṇīyeti salākabhattādīnaṃ vā atthāya aññena vā kenaci karaṇīyena gantvā gataṭṭhāne passati vā suṇāti vā, anāpatti.

atk-vin02a1:1136_4: evaṃ pavisitvā passantiyā vā suṇantiyā vā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1143_1: Arahopekkhā aññavihitāti na rahoassādāpekkhā rahoassādato aññavihitāva hutvā ñātiṃ vā pucchati,
atk-vin02a1:1146_0: 842. Dutiye – paṭicchanne okāseti idameva nānaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1149_0: 846. Tatiye – ajjhokāseti nānaṃ, sesaṃ sabbaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1152_4: Sati karaṇīyeti salākabhattādīnaṃ āharaṇatthāya vihāre vā dunnikkhittaṃ paṭisāmanatthāya.
atk-vin02a1:1156_1: Anovassakaṃ atikkāmentiyāti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1157_1: Gilānāyāti yā tādisena gelaññena āpucchituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-vin02a1:1157_2: Āpadāsūti ghare aggi vā uṭṭhito hoti, corā vā;
atk-vin02a1:1171_9: itarā vā edisā hotū”ti evamādinā nayena akkosati;
atk-vin02a1:1171_11: Ṭhapetvā pana nirayañca brahmacariyañca “sunakhī sūkarī kāṇā kuṇī”tiādinā nayena akkosantiyā vācāya vācāya dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1172_6: addhā puna evarūpāni kammāni katvā niraye uppajjissasi,
atk-vin02a1:1172_7: tiracchānayoniyā uppajjissasī”ti evaṃ anusāsaniyaṃ ṭhatvā vadantiyā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1181_4: evaṃ karaṇatthe vā sāmiatthe vā upayogavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1181_7: Tasmā udakasāṭikāya acchinnāya vā naṭṭhāya vā naggāya nhāyantiyā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1188_1: anantarāyikinīti dasasu antarāyesu ekenapi antarāyena anantarāyā.
atk-vin02a1:1188_2: Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteti dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā sacepi pacchā sibbati,
atk-vin02a1:1192_5: paribhogavasena vā otāpanavasena vā saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena saṅghāṭīti laddhanāmānaṃ pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ parivattananti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1192_7: Āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha ca ekasmiṃ cīvare ekā āpatti;
atk-vin02a1:1196_2: aññissā santakaṃ anāpucchā gahitaṃ puna paṭidātabbacīvaranti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1197_1: Āpadāsūti sace apārutaṃ vā anivatthaṃ vā corā haranti,
atk-vin02a1:1200_1: aññaṃ parikkhāranti yaṃkiñci thālakādīnaṃ vā sappitelādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1200_6: katipāhena kappāse āgate samagghaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ vatvā nivārentiyā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1204_1: pakkamiṃsūti aññāsampi āgamanaṃ āgamentī “addhā amhākampi āgamessatī”ti tattha tattha agamaṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:1205_4: tato bhājessāmī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā paṭibāhantiyā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1209_3: Laṅghakā nāma ye vaṃsavarattādīsu laṅghanakammaṃ karonti.
atk-vin02a1:1209_7: Deti āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha cīvaragaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:1213_2: Ānisaṃsanti kiñcāpi “na mayaṃ ayye sakkomā”ti vadanti,
atk-vin02a1:1213_5: addhā dassatī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā nivārentiyā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1217_1: kathinuddhāraṃ na dassantīti kīdiso kathinuddhāro dātabbo,
atk-vin02a1:1218_2: kathinānisaṃsamūlako mahālābhoti evarūpaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā paṭibāhantiyā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1227_2: saṃhārimānaṃ pāvārattharaṇakaṭasārakādīnaṃ ekaṃ antaṃ attharitvā ekaṃ pārupitvā tuvaṭṭentīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1228_1: Vavatthānaṃ dassetvāti majjhe kāsāvaṃ vā kattarayaṭṭhiṃ vā antamaso kāyabandhanampi ṭhapetvā nipajjantīnaṃ anāpattīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1231_1: uḷārasambhāvitāti uḷārakulā pabbajitattā guṇehi ca uḷārattā uḷārāti sambhāvitā.
atk-vin02a1:1231_7: Viññattīti hetūdāharaṇādīhi vividhehi nayehi ñāpanā veditabbā,
atk-vin02a1:1236_3: Pariyesitvā na labhatīti aññaṃ upaṭṭhāyikaṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a1:1240_1: aññaṃ āṇāpetīti ettha sace nikkaḍḍhāti āṇattā ekapayogena bahūnipi dvārāni atikkāmeti,
atk-vin02a1:1240_3: Atha imañcimañca dvāraṃ atikkāmehīti evaṃ āṇattā atikkāmeti,
atk-vin02a1:1251_1: Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteti sacepi dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā pacchā pakkamati,
atk-vin02a1:1251_5: Sace pana tīṇi gantvā teneva maggena paccāgacchati,
atk-vin02a1:1257_7: Tasmāyeva padabhājane “yattha katthaci rañño kīḷitu”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1257_8: Dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha padavāragaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1257_9: Yattha ṭhitā passatīti ettha pana sace ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhitā padaṃ anuddharamānā pañcapi passati,
atk-vin02a1:1257_11: Taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ oloketvā passantiyā pana pāṭekkā āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a1:1258_3: Gacchantī vā āgacchantī vāti piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya gacchantiyā maggo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:1258_5: Sati karaṇīye gantvāti rañño santikaṃ kenaci karaṇīyena gantvā passati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1258_6: Āpadāsūti kenaci upaddutā pavisitvā passati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1262_0: 982. Dutiye – abhinisīdanābhinipajjanesu payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1266_3: Kantanato pana pubbe kappāsavicinanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbapayogesu hatthavāragaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1270_2: yāguṃ vātiādīsu taṇḍulakoṭṭanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbesu pubbapayogesu payogagaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1271_1: Yāgupāneti manussehi saṅghassatthāya kariyamāne yāgupāne vā saṅghabhatte vā tesaṃ sahāyikabhāvena yaṃkiñci pacantiyā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1271_2: Cetiyapūjāya sahāyikā hutvā gandhādīni pūjeti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1271_4: yaṃkiñci bījaniṃ vā sammuñjanidaṇḍakaṃ vā kārāpetvā veyyāvaccakaraṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāva yaṃkiñci pacituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1274_2: Dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā pacchā vinicchinantī āpattiṃ āpajjitvāva vinicchināti.
atk-vin02a1:1275_1: Pariyesitvā na labhatīti sahāyikā bhikkhuniyo na labhati.
atk-vin02a1:1281_2: Āpadāsūti mahagghacīvaraṃ sarīrato mocetvā supaṭisāmitampi corā haranti,

atk-vin02a1:1286_1: Pariyesitvā na labhatīti paṭijaggikaṃ na labhati.

atk-vin02a1:1299_1: Sīsānulokikāti paṭhamaṃ pavisantīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ sīsaṃ anulokentī pavisati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1299_2: Yattha bhikkhuniyoti yattha bhikkhuniyo paṭhamataraṃ pavisitvā sajjhāyacetiyavandanādīni karonti,
atk-vin02a1:1299_3: tattha tāsaṃ santikaṃ gacchāmīti gantuṃ vaṭṭati.

atk-vin02a1:1310_4: kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

atk-vin02a1:1313_3: Kulassa avaṇṇanti taṃ kulaṃ assaddhaṃ appasannanti.
atk-vin02a1:1314_1: Santaṃyeva ādīnavanti kulassa vā bhikkhunīnaṃ vā santaṃ aguṇaṃ.

atk-vin02a1:1333_2: Adhokāyo hi yasmā tato rukkhassa sākhā viya ubho ūrū pabhijjitvā gatā,
atk-vin02a1:1334_4: cha āṇattidukkaṭāni cha ca pācittiyāni āpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:1334_9: ekavācāya cha dukkaṭāni cha pācittiyānīti dvādasa āpattiyo.

atk-vin02a1:1343_2: Mātā vā hotīti yaṃ dārakaṃ pāyeti,
atk-vin02a1:1343_3: tassa mātā vā hoti dhāti vā.
atk-vin02a1:1346_2: “Mātugāmo nāma lolo hoti dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitvā sīlāni pūrayamāno kilamati,
atk-vin02a1:1347_1: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmīti yaṃ taṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇīti paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1347_2: taṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ dve vassāni avītikkamitabbasamādānaṃ katvā samādiyāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1347_4: Imā cha sikkhāyo saṭṭhivassāyapi pabbajitāya dātabbāyeva,
atk-vin02a1:1350_3: Sace pana paṭhamaṃ vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti,

atk-vin02a1:1362_1: na anuggaṇhāpeyyāti “imissā ayye uddesādīni dehī”ti evaṃ uddesādīhi na anuggaṇhāpeyya.
atk-vin02a1:1366_1: na upaṭṭhaheyyāti cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakenāti evaṃ tena tena karaṇīyena na upaṭṭhaheyya.
atk-vin02a1:1369_2: Na vūpakāsāpeyyāti “imaṃ ayye gahetvā gacchā”ti aññaṃ na āṇāpeyya.
atk-vin02a1:1374_1: Kumāribhūtavaggassa paṭhamadutiyatatiyasikkhāpadāni tīṇi tīhi gihigatasikkhāpadehi sadisāni.
atk-vin02a1:1374_2: Yā pana tā sabbapaṭhamā dve mahāsikkhamānā,
atk-vin02a1:1374_4: Tā gihigatā vā hontu agihigatā vā,
atk-vin02a1:1374_6: gihigatāti vā kumāribhūtāti vā na vattabbā.
atk-vin02a1:1374_7: Gihigatāya dasavassakāle sikkhāsammutiṃ datvā dvādasavassakāle upasampadā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a1:1374_10: Aṭṭhārasavassakālato paṭṭhāya ca panāyaṃ gihigatātipi kumāribhūtātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:1374_13: Mahāsikkhamānā pana gihigatātipi vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:1374_15: sikkhāsammutidānavasena pana tissopi sikkhamānāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1386_1: sokāvāsanti saṅketaṃ katvā agacchamānā purisānaṃ anto sokaṃ pavesetīti sokāvāsā,
atk-vin02a1:1390_5: vācato kāyavācato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin02a1:1390_6: Abbhānakammādīsu kenacideva karaṇīyena khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ nisinnā “pakkosatha sikkhamānaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1390_9: Upassayato paṭṭhāya upasampādessāmīti vatvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ gacchantiyā kāyavācato samuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a1:1390_10: Dvīsupi ṭhānesu paṇṇattibhāvaṃ jānitvāva vītikkamaṃ karontiyā vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a1:1393_8: Tattha parisapārivāsiyaṃ nāma bhikkhū kenacideva karaṇīyena sannipatitā honti,
atk-vin02a1:1393_12: bhikkhū “anokāsā mayaṃ aññatra gacchāmā”ti chandaṃ avissajjetvāva uṭṭhahanti.
atk-vin02a1:1393_15: chandassa pana avissaṭṭhattā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1394_0: Puna bhikkhū “uposathādīni karissāmā”ti rattiṃ sannipatitvā “yāva sabbe sannipatanti,
atk-vin02a1:1394_3: Sace “cātuddasikaṃ uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti nisinnā “pannaraso”ti kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1394_4: Sace pannarasikaṃ kātuṃ nisinnā pāṭipade anuposathe uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:1395_0: Puna bhikkhū “kiñcideva abbhānādisaṅghakammaṃ karissāmā”ti nisinnā honti,
atk-vin02a1:1395_4: Te tassa vacanena chandaṃ vissajjetvā tattheva nisinnā honti.
atk-vin02a1:1395_5: Athañño āgantvā “nakkhattaṃ paṭimānentaṃ attho bālaṃ upaccagā”ti vatvā “kiṃ nakkhattena karothā”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a1:1395_7: Etasmiṃ pārivāsiye puna chandapārisuddhiṃ anānetvā kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1396_0: Vuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti chandaṃ vissajjetvā kāyena vā vācāya vā chandavissajjanamatteneva vā uṭṭhitāya parisāya.
atk-vin02a1:1397_1: Anāpatti avuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti chandaṃ avissajjetvā avuṭṭhitāya anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1403_2: ekaṃ vassaṃ dveti ekantarike ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare dve vuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-vin02a1:1408_2: sakimpi dhāreti āpatti pācittiyassāti maggagamane ekapayogeneva divasampi dhāreti,
atk-vin02a1:1408_4: Sace kaddamādīni patvā upāhanā omuñcitvā chattameva dhārentī gacchati, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1408_5: Athāpi gacchādīni disvā chattaṃ apanāmetvā upāhanāruḷhāva gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:1408_7: Sace chattampi apanāmetvā upāhanāpi omuñcitvā puna dhāreti,
atk-vin02a1:1411_1: yānena yāyantīti etthāpi orohitvā punappunaṃ abhiruhantiyā payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:1417_3: tassa tassa vasena vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:1426_1: ummaddāpeti āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha hatthaṃ amocetvā ummaddane ekāva āpatti,
atk-vin02a1:1432_3: Idaṃ pana upacāraṃ sandhāya kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1435_2: anokāsakatanti asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchāmīti evaṃ akataokāsaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1435_5: Anodissāti asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchāmīti evaṃ aniyametvā kevalaṃ “pucchitabbaṃ atthi,
atk-vin02a1:1438_2: parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyāti ekena pādena atikkante dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1442_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo chasaṭṭhisataṃ pācittiyā dhammāti ettha sabbāneva bhikkhunīnaṃ khuddakesu channavuti,
atk-vin02a1:1442_13: nisīdanaṃ vassikasāṭikanti imāni dvāvīsati sikkhāpadāni apanetvā sesāni satañca chasaṭṭhi ca sikkhāpadāni
atk-vin02a1:1443_6: bhikkhunīādīhi ummaddanaparimaddanānīti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni lokavajjāni.
atk-vin02a1:1443_9: citte pana sati akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni.
atk-vin02a1:1443_18: ekantarikavuṭṭhāpananti imāni ekūnavīsati sikkhāpadāni sacittakāni paṇṇattivajjāni,
atk-vin02a1:1450_0: Ye dhammā aṭṭha āruḷhā, saṅkhepeneva saṅgahaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:1452_1: Yāni hi ettha pāḷiyaṃ sappitelādīni niddiṭṭhāni,
atk-vin02a1:1452_6: kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a1:1455_0: Sekhiyā pana uddiṭṭhā, ye dhammā pañcasattati;
atk-vin02a1:1459_0: Yasmā tasmā visuṃ tesaṃ, dhammānaṃ atthavaṇṇanā;
atk-vin02a1:1460_0: Na vuttā tattha yā vuttā, vuttāyeva hi sā idhāti.
